[03] 249^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, mahaaraaja, pabbatasa"nkhepe udakarahado accho vippasanno anaavilo. tattha cakkhumaa puriso tiire .thito passeyya sippisambukampi sakkharakathalampi macchagumbampi carantampi ti.t.thantampi. tassa evamassa -- `aya.m kho udakarahado accho vippasanno anaavilo. tatrime sippisambukaapi sakkharakathalaapi macchagumbaapi carantipi ti.t.thantipii'ti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, bhikkhu eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti. `so ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati ^a^M1.0080^ea^, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. `ime aasavaati yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaati yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m ^a^T1.0112^ea^ vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, `vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti, `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati. ida.m ^a^P1.0085^ea^ kho, mahaaraaja, sandi.t.thika.m saama~n~naphala.m purimehi sandi.t.thikehi saama~n~naphalehi abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca. imasmaa ca pana, mahaaraaja, sandi.t.thikaa saama~n~naphalaa a~n~na.m sandi.t.thika.m saama~n~naphala.m uttaritara.m vaa pa.niitatara.m vaa natthii''ti.

[03] 250^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, raajaa maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante. seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti; evameva.m, bhante, bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito ^a^V1.0075^ea^. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata.m. accayo ma.m, bhante, accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, yoha.m pitara.m dhammika.m dhammaraajaana.m issariyakaara.naa jiivitaa voropesi.m. tassa me, bhante bhagavaa accaya.m accayato pa.tigga.nhaatu aayati.m sa.mvaraayaa''ti.

[03] 251^b^.^eb^ ``taggha tva.m, mahaaraaja, accayo accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m ^a^T1.0113^ea^ yathaaakusala.m, ya.m tva.m pitara.m dhammika.m dhammaraajaana.m jiivitaa voropesi. yato ca kho tva.m, mahaaraaja, accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikarosi, ta.m te maya.m pa.tigga.nhaama. vuddhihesaa, mahaaraaja, ariyassa vinaye, yo accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikaroti, aayati.m sa.mvara.m aapajjatii''ti.

[03] 252^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0081^ea^ vutte, raajaa maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``handa ca daani maya.m, bhante, gacchaama bahukiccaa maya.m bahukara.niiyaa''ti. ``yassadaani tva.m, mahaaraaja, kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti. atha kho raajaa maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] 253^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa acirapakkantassa ra~n~no maagadhassa ^a^P1.0086^ea^ ajaatasattussa vedehiputtassa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``khataaya.m, bhikkhave, raajaa. upahataaya.m, bhikkhave, raajaa. sacaaya.m, bhikkhave, raajaa pitara.m dhammika.m dhammaraajaana.m jiivitaa na voropessatha, imasmi~n~neva aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m uppajjissathaa''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] saama~n~naphalasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dutiya.m.

[03] 254^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0082^ea^ ^a^V1.0076^ea^ ^a^P1.0087^ea^ ^a^T1.0114^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi yena icchaana"ngala.m naama kosalaana.m braahma.nagaamo tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa icchaana"ngale viharati icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.de.

[03] 255^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena braahma.no pokkharasaati ukka.t.tha.m {pokkharasaatii (sii0), pokkharasaadi (pii0)} ajjhaavasati sattussada.m sati.naka.t.thodaka.m sadha~n~na.m raajabhogga.m ra~n~naa pasenadinaa kosalena dinna.m raajadaaya.m brahmadeyya.m. assosi kho braahma.no pokkharasaati -- ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi icchaana"ngala.m anuppatto icchaana"ngale viharati icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.de. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa' {bhagavaati (syaa0 ka.m0), upariso.nada.n.dasuttaadiisupi buddhagu.nakathaaya.m evameva dissati}. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m, saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m ^a^P1.0088^ea^ ^a^T1.0115^ea^ pakaaseti. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m hotii''ti.

[03] 256^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena braahma.nassa pokkharasaatissa amba.t.tho naama maa.navo antevaasii hoti ajjhaayako mantadharo ti.n.na.m vedaana.m {bedaana.m (ka0)} paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m ^a^V1.0077^ea^ itihaasapa~ncamaana.m padako veyyaakara.no lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo anu~n~naatapa.ti~n~naato sake aacariyake tevijjake paavacane ^a^M1.0083^ea^ -- ``yamaha.m jaanaami, ta.m tva.m jaanaasi; ya.m tva.m jaanaasi tamaha.m jaanaamii''ti.

[03] 257^b^.^eb^ atha kho braahma.no pokkharasaati amba.t.tha.m maa.nava.m aamantesi -- ``aya.m, taata amba.t.tha, sama.no gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi icchaana"ngala.m anuppatto icchaana"ngale viharati icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.de. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa, araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m, saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m hotiiti. ehi tva.m taata amba.t.tha, yena sama.no gotamo tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^T1.0116^ea^ sama.na.m gotama.m jaanaahi, yadi vaa ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m tathaasanta.myeva saddo abbhuggato, yadi vaa no tathaa. yadi vaa so bhava.m gotamo taadiso, yadi vaa na taadiso, tathaa maya.m ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m vedissaamaa''ti.

[03] 258^b^.^eb^ ``yathaa katha.m panaaha.m, bho, ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m jaanissaami -- `yadi vaa ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m tathaasanta.myeva saddo abbhuggato, yadi vaa no tathaa. yadi vaa so bhava.m gotamo taadiso, yadi vaa na taadiso'''ti?

[03] ``aagataani kho, taata amba.t.tha, amhaaka.m mantesu dvatti.msa mahaapurisalakkha.naani, yehi samannaagatassa mahaapurisassa dveyeva gatiyo bhavanti ana~n~naa. sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa caaturanto vijitaavii janapadatthaavariyappatto sattaratanasamannaagato ^a^P1.0089^ea^. tassimaani satta ratanaani bhavanti. seyyathida.m -- cakkaratana.m, hatthiratana.m, assaratana.m, ma.niratana.m, itthiratana.m, gahapatiratana.m, pari.naayakaratanameva sattama.m. parosahassa.m kho panassa puttaa bhavanti ^a^M1.0084^ea^ suuraa viira"ngaruupaa parasenappamaddanaa. so ima.m pathavi.m saagarapariyanta.m ada.n.dena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhaavasati. sace kho pana agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati ^a^V1.0078^ea^, araha.m hoti sammaasambuddho loke viva.t.tacchado. aha.m kho pana, taata amba.t.tha, mantaana.m daataa; tva.m mantaana.m pa.tiggahetaa''ti.

[03] 259^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m, bho''ti kho amba.t.tho maa.navo braahma.nassa pokkharasaatissa pa.tissutvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa braahma.na.m pokkharasaati.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa va.lavaarathamaaruyha ^a^T1.0117^ea^ sambahulehi maa.navakehi saddhi.m yena icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.do tena paayaasi. yaavatikaa yaanassa bhuumi yaanena gantvaa yaanaa paccorohitvaa pattikova aaraama.m paavisi. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa bhikkhuu abbhokaase ca"nkamanti. atha kho amba.t.tho maa.navo yena te bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa te bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``kaha.m nu kho, bho, etarahi so bhava.m gotamo viharati? ta~nhi maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m dassanaaya idhuupasa"nkantaa''ti.

[03] 260^b^.^eb^ atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho amba.t.tho maa.navo abhi~n~naatakola~n~no ceva abhi~n~naatassa ca braahma.nassa pokkharasaatissa antevaasii. agaru kho pana bhagavato evaruupehi kulaputtehi saddhi.m kathaasallaapo hotii''ti. te amba.t.tha.m maa.nava.m etadavocu.m -- ``eso amba.t.tha vihaaro sa.mvutadvaaro, tena appasaddo upasa"nkamitvaa ataramaano aa.linda.m pavisitvaa ukkaasitvaa agga.la.m aako.tehi, vivarissati te bhagavaa dvaara''nti.

[03] 261^b^.^eb^ atha kho amba.t.tho maa.navo yena so vihaaro sa.mvutadvaaro, tena appasaddo upasa"nkamitvaa ataramaano aa.linda.m pavisitvaa ukkaasitvaa agga.la.m aako.tesi. vivari bhagavaa dvaara.m. paavisi amba.t.tho maa.navo. maa.navakaapi pavisitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.msu, sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. amba.t.tho pana maa.navo ca"nkamantopi nisinnena bhagavataa ka~nci ^a^P1.0090^ea^ ^a^T1.0118^ea^ ka~nci {ki~nci ki~nci (ka0)} katha.m ^a^M1.0085^ea^ saara.niiya.m viitisaareti, .thitopi nisinnena bhagavataa ki~nci ki~nci katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaareti.

[03] 262^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa amba.t.tha.m maa.nava.m etadavoca -- ``eva.m nu te, amba.t.tha, braahma.nehi vuddhehi mahallakehi aacariyapaacariyehi saddhi.m kathaasallaapo hoti, yathayida.m cara.m ti.t.tha.m nisinnena mayaa ki~nci ki~nci katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretii''ti?

[03] 263^b^.^eb^ ``no ^a^V1.0079^ea^ hida.m, bho gotama. gacchanto vaa hi, bho gotama, gacchantena braahma.no braahma.nena saddhi.m sallapitumarahati, .thito vaa hi, bho gotama, .thitena braahma.no braahma.nena saddhi.m sallapitumarahati, nisinno vaa hi, bho gotama, nisinnena braahma.no braahma.nena saddhi.m sallapitumarahati, sayaano vaa hi, bho gotama, sayaanena braahma.no braahma.nena saddhi.m sallapitumarahati. ye ca kho te, bho gotama, mu.n.dakaa sama.nakaa ibbhaa ka.nhaa {ki.nhaa (ka0 sii0 pii0)} bandhupaadaapaccaa, tehipi me saddhi.m eva.m kathaasallaapo hoti, yathariva bhotaa gotamenaa''ti. ``atthikavato kho pana te, amba.t.tha, idhaagamana.m ahosi, yaayeva kho panatthaaya aagaccheyyaatha {aagaccheyyaatho (sii0 pii0)}, tameva attha.m saadhuka.m manasi kareyyaatha {manasikareyyaatho (sii0 pii0)}. avusitavaayeva kho pana bho aya.m amba.t.tho maa.navo vusitamaanii kima~n~natra avusitattaa''ti.

[03] 264^b^.^eb^ atha kho amba.t.tho maa.navo bhagavataa avusitavaadena vuccamaano kupito anattamano bhagavanta.myeva khu.msento bhagavanta.myeva vambhento bhagavanta.myeva upavadamaano -- ``sama.no ca me, bho, gotamo paapito bhavissatii''ti bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ca.n.daa, bho gotama, sakyajaati; pharusaa, bho gotama, sakyajaati; lahusaa, bho ^a^P1.0091^ea^ ^a^T1.0119^ea^ gotama, sakyajaati; bhassaa, bho gotama, sakyajaati; ibbhaa santaa ibbhaa samaanaa na braahma.ne sakkaronti, na braahma.ne garu.m karonti {garukaronti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, na braahma.ne ^a^M1.0086^ea^ maanenti, na braahma.ne puujenti, na braahma.ne apacaayanti. tayida.m, bho gotama, nacchanna.m, tayida.m nappatiruupa.m, yadime sakyaa ibbhaa santaa ibbhaa samaanaa na braahma.ne sakkaronti, na braahma.ne garu.m karonti, na braahma.ne maanenti, na braahma.ne puujenti, na braahma.ne apacaayantii''ti. itiha amba.t.tho maa.navo ida.m pa.thama.m sakyesu ibbhavaada.m nipaatesi.

[03] 265^b^.^eb^ ``ki.m pana te, amba.t.tha, sakyaa aparaddhu''nti? ``ekamidaaha.m, bho gotama, samaya.m aacariyassa braahma.nassa pokkharasaatissa kenacideva kara.niiyena kapilavatthu.m agamaasi.m. yena sakyaana.m sandhaagaara.m tenupasa"nkami.m. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa sakyaa ceva sakyakumaaraa ca sandhaagaare {santhaagaare (sii0 pii0)} uccesu aasanesu nisinnaa honti a~n~nama~n~na.m a"ngulipatodakehi {a"ngulipatodakena (pii0)} sa~njagghantaa sa.mkii.lantaa, a~n~nadatthu mama~n~neva ma~n~ne anujagghantaa, na ma.m koci aasanenapi nimantesi. tayida.m, bho gotama, nacchanna.m, tayida.m nappatiruupa.m, yadime sakyaa ibbhaa santaa ibbhaa ^a^V1.0080^ea^ samaanaa na braahma.ne sakkaronti, na braahma.ne garu.m karonti, na braahma.ne maanenti, na braahma.ne puujenti, na braahma.ne apacaayantii''ti. itiha amba.t.tho maa.navo ida.m dutiya.m sakyesu ibbhavaada.m nipaatesi.

[03] 266^b^.^eb^ ``la.tukikaapi ^a^T1.0120^ea^ kho, amba.t.tha, saku.nikaa sake kulaavake kaamalaapinii hoti. saka.m kho paneta.m, amba.t.tha, sakyaana.m yadida.m kapilavatthu.m, naarahataayasmaa amba.t.tho imaaya appamattaaya abhisajjitu''nti. ``cattaarome, bho gotama, va.n.naa -- khattiyaa braahma.naa vessaa suddaa. imesa~nhi, bho gotama, catunna.m va.n.naana.m tayo va.n.naa -- khattiyaa ca vessaa ca suddaa ca -- a~n~nadatthu braahma.nasseva paricaarakaa sampajjanti. tayida.m, bho gotama ^a^P1.0092^ea^, nacchanna.m, tayida.m nappatiruupa.m, yadime sakyaa ibbhaa santaa ibbhaa samaanaa na braahma.ne sakkaronti, na braahma.ne garu.m karonti, na braahma.ne maanenti, na braahma.ne puujenti, na braahma.ne apacaayantii''ti. itiha amba.t.tho maa.navo ida.m tatiya.m sakyesu ibbhavaada.m nipaatesi.

[03] 267^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M1.0087^ea^ kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``atibaa.lha.m kho aya.m amba.t.tho maa.navo sakyesu ibbhavaadena nimmaadeti, ya.mnuunaaha.m gotta.m puccheyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa amba.t.tha.m maa.nava.m etadavoca -- ``katha.m gottosi, amba.t.thaa''ti? ``ka.nhaayanohamasmi, bho gotamaa''ti. poraa.na.m kho pana te amba.t.tha maataapettika.m naamagotta.m anussarato ayyaputtaa sakyaa bhavanti; daasiputto tvamasi sakyaana.m. sakyaa kho pana, amba.t.tha, raajaana.m okkaaka.m pitaamaha.m dahanti.

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m, amba.t.tha, raajaa okkaako yaa saa mahesii piyaa ^a^T1.0121^ea^ manaapaa, tassaa puttassa rajja.m pari.naametukaamo je.t.thakumaare ra.t.thasmaa pabbaajesi -- okkaamukha.m karaka.n.da.m {ukkaamukha.m karaka.n.du.m (sii0 syaa0)} hatthinika.m sinisuura.m {sinipura.m (sii0 syaa0)}. te ra.t.thasmaa pabbaajitaa himavantapasse pokkhara.niyaa tiire mahaasaakasa.n.do, tattha vaasa.m kappesu.m. te jaatisambhedabhayaa sakaahi bhaginiihi saddhi.m sa.mvaasa.m kappesu.m.

[03] ``atha kho, amba.t.tha, raajaa okkaako amacce paarisajje aamantesi -- `kaha.m nu kho, bho, etarahi kumaaraa sammantii'ti? `atthi, deva, himavantapasse pokkhara.niyaa tiire mahaasaakasa.n.do ^a^V1.0081^ea^, tatthetarahi kumaaraa sammanti. te jaatisambhedabhayaa sakaahi bhaginiihi saddhi.m sa.mvaasa.m kappentii'ti. atha kho, amba.t.tha, raajaa okkaako udaana.m udaanesi -- `sakyaa ^a^P1.0093^ea^ vata, bho, kumaaraa, paramasakyaa vata, bho, kumaaraa'ti. tadagge kho pana amba.t.tha sakyaa pa~n~naayanti; so ca nesa.m pubbapuriso.

[03] ``ra~n~no kho pana, amba.t.tha, okkaakassa disaa naama daasii ahosi. saa ka.nha.m naama {saa ka.nha.m (pii0)} janesi. jaato ka.nho pabyaahaasi -- `dhovatha ma.m, amma, nahaapetha ma.m amma, imasmaa ma.m asucismaa parimocetha, atthaaya vo bhavissaamii'ti. yathaa kho pana amba.t.tha etarahi manussaa pisaace disvaa `pisaacaa'ti sa~njaananti; evameva kho, amba.t.tha, tena kho pana samayena manussaa pisaace `ka.nhaa'ti sa~njaananti. te evamaaha.msu -- `aya.m jaato pabyaahaasi, ka.nho jaato, pisaaco jaato'ti. tadagge kho pana, amba.t.tha ka.nhaayanaa pa~n~naayanti, so ca ^a^T1.0122^ea^ ka.nhaayanaana.m pubbapuriso. iti kho te ^a^M1.0088^ea^, amba.t.tha, poraa.na.m maataapettika.m naamagotta.m anussarato ayyaputtaa sakyaa bhavanti, daasiputto tvamasi sakyaana''nti.

[03] 268^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, te maa.navakaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``maa bhava.m gotamo amba.t.tha.m atibaa.lha.m daasiputtavaadena nimmaadesi. sujaato ca, bho gotama amba.t.tho maa.navo, kulaputto ca amba.t.tho maa.navo, bahussuto ca amba.t.tho maa.navo, kalyaa.navaakkara.no ca amba.t.tho maa.navo, pa.n.dito ca amba.t.tho maa.navo, pahoti ca amba.t.tho maa.navo bhotaa gotamena saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetu''nti.

[03] 269^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa te maa.navake etadavoca -- ``sace kho tumhaaka.m maa.navakaana.m eva.m hoti -- `dujjaato ca amba.t.tho maa.navo, akulaputto ca amba.t.tho maa.navo, appassuto ^a^P1.0094^ea^ ca amba.t.tho maa.navo, akalyaa.navaakkara.no ca amba.t.tho maa.navo, duppa~n~no ca amba.t.tho maa.navo, na ca pahoti amba.t.tho maa.navo sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetu'nti, ti.t.thatu amba.t.tho maa.navo, tumhe mayaa saddhi.m mantavho asmi.m vacane. sace pana tumhaaka.m maa.navakaana.m eva.m hoti -- `sujaato ca amba.t.tho maa.navo, kulaputto ca amba.t.tho maa.navo, bahussuto ca amba.t.tho maa.navo, kalyaa.navaakkara.no ca amba.t.tho maa.navo, pa.n.dito ca amba.t.tho maa.navo, pahoti ca amba.t.tho maa.navo sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetu'nti, ti.t.thatha ^a^T1.0123^ea^ tumhe; amba.t.tho maa.navo mayaa saddhi.m pa.timantetuu''ti.

[03] ``sujaato ca, bho gotama, amba.t.tho maa.navo, kulaputto ca amba.t.tho maa.navo, bahussuto ca amba.t.tho maa.navo, kalyaa.navaakkara.no ^a^V1.0082^ea^ ca amba.t.tho maa.navo, pa.n.dito ca amba.t.tho maa.navo, pahoti ca amba.t.tho maa.navo bhotaa gotamena saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetu.m, tu.nhii maya.m bhavissaama, amba.t.tho maa.navo bhotaa gotamena saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetuu''ti.

[03] 270^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa amba.t.tha.m maa.nava.m etadavoca -- ``aya.m kho pana te, amba.t.tha, sahadhammiko pa~nho aagacchati, akaamaa byaakaatabbo. sace tva.m na byaakarissasi, a~n~nena vaa a~n~na.m pa.ticarissasi, tu.nhii vaa bhavissasi, pakkamissasi ^a^M1.0089^ea^ vaa ettheva te sattadhaa muddhaa phalissati. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, amba.t.tha, kinti te suta.m braahma.naana.m vuddhaana.m mahallakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m kutopabhutikaa ka.nhaayanaa, ko ca ka.nhaayanaana.m pubbapuriso''ti?

[03] eva.m vutte, amba.t.tho maa.navo tu.nhii ahosi. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa amba.t.tha.m maa.nava.m etadavoca -- ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, amba.t.tha, kinti te suta.m braahma.naana.m vuddhaana.m mahallakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m kutopabhutikaa ka.nhaayanaa, ko ca ka.nhaayanaana.m ^a^P1.0095^ea^ pubbapuriso''ti? dutiyampi kho amba.t.tho maa.navo tu.nhii ahosi. atha kho bhagavaa amba.t.tha.m maa.nava.m etadavoca -- ``byaakarohi daani amba.t.tha, na daani, te tu.nhiibhaavassa kaalo. yo ^a^T1.0124^ea^ kho, amba.t.tha, tathaagatena yaavatatiyaka.m sahadhammika.m pa~nha.m pu.t.tho na byaakaroti, etthevassa sattadhaa muddhaa phalissatii''ti.

[03] 271^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena vajirapaa.nii yakkho mahanta.m ayokuu.ta.m aadaaya aaditta.m sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m {sa~njotibhuuta.m (syaa0)} amba.t.thassa maa.navassa upari vehaasa.m .thito hoti -- ``sacaaya.m amba.t.tho maa.navo bhagavataa yaavatatiyaka.m sahadhammika.m pa~nha.m pu.t.tho na byaakarissati, etthevassa sattadhaa muddha.m phaalessaamii''ti. ta.m kho pana vajirapaa.ni.m yakkha.m bhagavaa ceva passati amba.t.tho ca maa.navo.

[03] 272^b^.^eb^ atha kho amba.t.tho maa.navo bhiito sa.mviggo lomaha.t.thajaato bhagavanta.myeva taa.na.m gavesii bhagavanta.myeva le.na.m gavesii bhagavanta.myeva sara.na.m gavesii -- upanisiiditvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kimeta.m {ki.m me ta.m (ka0)} bhava.m gotamo aaha? punabhava.m gotamo bravituu''ti {bruutu (syaa0)}.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, amba.t.tha, kinti te suta.m braahma.naana.m vuddhaana.m mahallakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m ^a^V1.0083^ea^ bhaasamaanaana.m kutopabhutikaa ka.nhaayanaa, ko ca ka.nhaayanaana.m pubbapuriso''ti? ``evameva me, bho gotama, suta.m yatheva bhava.m gotamo aaha. tatopabhutikaa ka.nhaayanaa; so ca ka.nhaayanaana.m pubbapuriso''ti.

[03] 273^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0090^ea^ vutte, te maa.navakaa unnaadino uccaasaddamahaasaddaa ahesu.m -- ``dujjaato kira, bho, amba.t.tho maa.navo; akulaputto kira, bho, amba.t.tho maa.navo; daasiputto kira, bho, amba.t.tho maa.navo sakyaana.m. ayyaputtaa kira, bho, amba.t.thassa maa.navassa sakyaa ^a^T1.0125^ea^ bhavanti. dhammavaadi.myeva kira maya.m sama.na.m gotama.m apasaadetabba.m ama~n~nimhaa''ti.

[03] 274^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``atibaa.lha.m kho ime ^a^P1.0096^ea^ maa.navakaa amba.t.tha.m maa.nava.m daasiputtavaadena nimmaadenti, ya.mnuunaaha.m parimoceyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa te maa.navake etadavoca -- ``maa kho tumhe, maa.navakaa, amba.t.tha.m maa.nava.m atibaa.lha.m daasiputtavaadena nimmaadetha. u.laaro so ka.nho isi ahosi. so dakkhi.najanapada.m gantvaa brahmamante adhiiyitvaa raajaana.m okkaaka.m upasa"nkamitvaa maddaruupi.m dhiitara.m yaaci. tassa raajaa okkaako -- `ko neva.m re aya.m mayha.m daasiputto samaano maddaruupi.m dhiitara.m yaacatii''' ti, kupito anattamano khurappa.m sannayhi {sannahi (ka0)}. so ta.m khurappa.m neva asakkhi mu~ncitu.m, no pa.tisa.mharitu.m.

[03] ``atha kho, maa.navakaa, amaccaa paarisajjaa ka.nha.m isi.m upasa"nkamitvaa etadavocu.m -- `sotthi, bhaddante {bhadante (sii0 syaa0)}, hotu ra~n~no; sotthi, bhaddante, hotu ra~n~no'ti. `sotthi bhavissati ra~n~no, api ca raajaa yadi adho khurappa.m mu~ncissati, yaavataa ra~n~no vijita.m, ettaavataa pathavii undriyissatii'ti. `sotthi, bhaddante, hotu ra~n~no, sotthi janapadassaa'ti. `sotthi bhavissati ra~n~no, sotthi janapadassa, api ca raajaa yadi uddha.m khurappa.m mu~ncissati, yaavataa ra~n~no vijita.m, ettaavataa satta vassaani devo na vassissatii'ti. `sotthi, bhaddante, hotu ra~n~no sotthi janapadassa devo ca vassatuu'ti. `sotthi bhavissati ra~n~no sotthi janapadassa ^a^T1.0126^ea^ devo ca vassissati, api ca raajaa je.t.thakumaare khurappa.m pati.t.thaapetu, sotthi kumaaro pallomo bhavissatii'ti. atha kho, maa.navakaa, amaccaa okkaakassa aarocesu.m -- `okkaako je.t.thakumaare khurappa.m pati.t.thaapetu. sotthi kumaaro pallomo bhavissatii'ti. atha kho raajaa okkaako ^a^V1.0084^ea^ je.t.thakumaare khurappa.m pati.t.thapesi, sotthi kumaaro pallomo ^a^M1.0091^ea^ samabhavi. atha kho tassa raajaa okkaako bhiito sa.mviggo lomaha.t.thajaato brahmada.n.dena ^a^P1.0097^ea^ tajjito maddaruupi.m dhiitara.m adaasi. maa kho tumhe, maa.navakaa, amba.t.tha.m maa.nava.m atibaa.lha.m daasiputtavaadena nimmaadetha, u.laaro so ka.nho isi ahosii''ti.

[03] 275^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa amba.t.tha.m maa.nava.m aamantesi -- ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, amba.t.tha, idha khattiyakumaaro braahma.naka~n~naaya saddhi.m sa.mvaasa.m kappeyya, tesa.m sa.mvaasamanvaaya putto jaayetha. yo so khattiyakumaarena braahma.naka~n~naaya putto uppanno, api nu so labhetha braahma.nesu aasana.m vaa udaka.m vaa''ti? ``labhetha, bho gotama''. ``apinu na.m braahma.naa bhojeyyu.m saddhe vaa thaalipaake vaa ya~n~ne vaa paahune vaa''ti? ``bhojeyyu.m, bho gotama''. ``apinu na.m braahma.naa mante vaaceyyu.m vaa no vaa''ti? ``vaaceyyu.m, bho gotama''. ``apinussa itthiisu aava.ta.m vaa assa anaava.ta.m vaa''ti? ``anaava.ta.m hissa, bho gotama''. ``apinu na.m khattiyaa khattiyaabhisekena abhisi~nceyyu''nti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``maatito hi, bho gotama, anupapanno''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, amba.t.tha, idha braahma.nakumaaro khattiyaka~n~naaya ^a^T1.0127^ea^ saddhi.m sa.mvaasa.m kappeyya, tesa.m sa.mvaasamanvaaya putto jaayetha. yo so braahma.nakumaarena khattiyaka~n~naaya putto uppanno, apinu so labhetha braahma.nesu aasana.m vaa udaka.m vaa''ti? ``labhetha, bho gotama''. ``apinu na.m braahma.naa bhojeyyu.m saddhe vaa thaalipaake vaa ya~n~ne vaa paahune vaa''ti? ``bhojeyyu.m, bho gotama''. ``apinu na.m braahma.naa mante vaaceyyu.m vaa no vaa''ti? ``vaaceyyu.m, bho gotama''. ``apinussa ^a^P1.0098^ea^ itthiisu aava.ta.m vaa assa anaava.ta.m vaa''ti? ``anaava.ta.m hissa, bho gotama''. ``apinu na.m khattiyaa khattiyaabhisekena abhisi~nceyyu''nti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``pitito hi, bho gotama, anupapanno''ti.

[03] 276^b^.^eb^ ``iti kho, amba.t.tha, itthiyaa vaa itthi.m karitvaa purisena vaa purisa.m karitvaa khattiyaava se.t.thaa, hiinaa braahma.naa. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, amba.t.tha, idha braahma.naa braahma.na.m kismi~ncideva pakara.ne khuramu.n.da.m karitvaa bhassapu.tena ^a^M1.0092^ea^ vadhitvaa ra.t.thaa vaa nagaraa vaa pabbaajeyyu.m. apinu so labhetha braahma.nesu aasana.m vaa udaka.m vaa''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama'' ^a^V1.0085^ea^. ``apinu na.m braahma.naa bhojeyyu.m saddhe vaa thaalipaake vaa ya~n~ne vaa paahune vaa''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''. ``apinu na.m braahma.naa mante vaaceyyu.m vaa no vaa''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''. ``apinussa itthiisu aava.ta.m vaa assa anaava.ta.m vaa''ti? ``aava.ta.m hissa, bho gotama''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, amba.t.tha, idha khattiyaa khattiya.m kismi~ncideva pakara.ne ^a^T1.0128^ea^ khuramu.n.da.m karitvaa bhassapu.tena vadhitvaa ra.t.thaa vaa nagaraa vaa pabbaajeyyu.m. apinu so labhetha braahma.nesu aasana.m vaa udaka.m vaa''ti? ``labhetha, bho gotama''. ``apinu na.m braahma.naa bhojeyyu.m saddhe vaa thaalipaake vaa ya~n~ne vaa paahune vaa''ti? ``bhojeyyu.m, bho gotama''. ``apinu na.m braahma.naa mante vaaceyyu.m vaa no vaa''ti? ``vaaceyyu.m, bho gotama''. ``apinussa itthiisu aava.ta.m vaa assa anaava.ta.m vaa''ti? ``anaava.ta.m hissa, bho gotama''.

[03] 277^b^.^eb^ ``ettaavataa kho, amba.t.tha, khattiyo paramanihiinata.m patto ^a^P1.0099^ea^ hoti, yadeva na.m khattiyaa khuramu.n.da.m karitvaa bhassapu.tena vadhitvaa ra.t.thaa vaa nagaraa vaa pabbaajenti. iti kho, amba.t.tha, yadaa khattiyo paramanihiinata.m patto hoti, tadaapi khattiyaava se.t.thaa, hiinaa braahma.naa. brahmunaa pesaa, amba.t.tha {brahmunaapi amba.t.tha (ka0), brahmunaapi eso amba.t.tha (pii0)}, sana"nkumaarena gaathaa bhaasitaa --
[21] `khattiyo se.t.tho janetasmi.m,
[27] ye gottapa.tisaarino.
[26] vijjaacara.nasampanno,
[22] so se.t.tho devamaanuse'ti..

[03] ``saa kho panesaa, amba.t.tha, brahmunaa sana"nkumaarena gaathaa sugiitaa no duggiitaa, subhaasitaa no dubbhaasitaa, atthasa.mhitaa no anatthasa.mhitaa, anumataa mayaa. ahampi hi, amba.t.tha, eva.m vadaami --
[21] `khattiyo ^a^M1.0093^ea^ ^a^V1.0086^ea^ se.t.tho janetasmi.m,
[27] ye gottapa.tisaarino.
[26] vijjaacara.nasampanno,
[22] so se.t.tho devamaanuse'ti..
[06] bhaa.navaaro pa.thamo.

[03] 278^b^.^eb^ ``katama.m ^a^T1.0129^ea^ pana ta.m, bho gotama, cara.na.m, katamaa ca pana saa vijjaa''ti? ``na kho, amba.t.tha, anuttaraaya vijjaacara.nasampadaaya jaativaado vaa vuccati, gottavaado vaa vuccati, maanavaado vaa vuccati -- `arahasi vaa ma.m tva.m, na vaa ma.m tva.m arahasii'ti. yattha kho, amba.t.tha, aavaaho vaa hoti, vivaaho vaa hoti, aavaahavivaaho vaa hoti, ettheta.m vuccati jaativaado vaa itipi gottavaado vaa itipi maanavaado vaa itipi -- `arahasi vaa ma.m tva.m, na vaa ma.m tva.m arahasii'ti. ye hi keci amba.t.tha jaativaadavinibaddhaa vaa gottavaadavinibaddhaa vaa maanavaadavinibaddhaa vaa aavaahavivaahavinibaddhaa vaa, aarakaa te anuttaraaya vijjaacara.nasampadaaya. pahaaya kho, amba.t.tha, jaativaadavinibaddha~nca gottavaadavinibaddha~nca maanavaadavinibaddha~nca aavaahavivaahavinibaddha~nca ^a^P1.0100^ea^ anuttaraaya vijjaacara.nasampadaaya sacchikiriyaa hotii''ti.

[03] 279^b^.^eb^ ``katama.m pana ta.m, bho gotama, cara.na.m, katamaa ca saa vijjaa''ti? ``idha, amba.t.tha, tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. ta.m dhamma.m su.naati gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa a~n~natarasmi.m vaa kule paccaajaato. so ta.m dhamma.m sutvaa tathaagate ^a^M1.0094^ea^ saddha.m pa.tilabhati. so tena ^a^V1.0087^ea^ saddhaapa.tilaabhena samannaagato iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati...pe0... (yathaa 191 aadayo anucchedaa, eva.m vitthaaretabba.m)....
[03] ``so vivicceva kaamehi, vivicca akusalehi dhammehi, savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati...pe0... idampissa hoti cara.nasmi.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, amba.t.tha, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati...pe0... idampissa hoti cara.nasmi.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, amba.t.tha, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- ``upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti, tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati...pe0... idampissa hoti cara.nasmi.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, amba.t.tha, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa, pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati...pe0... idampissa hoti cara.nasmi.m. ida.m kho ta.m, amba.t.tha, cara.na.m.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte ~naa.nadassanaaya ^a^T1.0130^ea^ citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti...pe0... idampissa hoti vijjaaya...pe0... ^a^V1.0088^ea^ naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaati, idampissa hoti vijjaaya. aya.m kho saa, amba.t.tha, vijjaa.

[03] ``aya.m vuccati, amba.t.tha, bhikkhu `vijjaasampanno' itipi, `cara.nasampanno' itipi, `vijjaacara.nasampanno' itipi. imaaya ca amba.t.tha vijjaasampadaaya cara.nasampadaaya ca a~n~naa vijjaasampadaa ca cara.nasampadaa ca uttaritaraa vaa pa.niitataraa vaa natthi.

[03] 280^b^.^eb^ ``imaaya kho, amba.t.tha, anuttaraaya vijjaacara.nasampadaaya ^a^P1.0101^ea^ cattaari apaayamukhaani bhavanti. katamaani cattaari? idha, amba.t.tha, ekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa ima~n~neva anuttara.m vijjaacara.nasampada.m anabhisambhu.namaano khaarividhamaadaaya ^a^M1.0095^ea^ {khaarivividhamaadaaya (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ara~n~naayatana.m ajjhogaahati -- `pavattaphalabhojano bhavissaamii'ti. so a~n~nadatthu vijjaacara.nasampannasseva paricaarako sampajjati. imaaya kho, amba.t.tha, anuttaraaya vijjaacara.nasampadaaya ida.m pa.thama.m apaayamukha.m bhavati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, amba.t.tha, idhekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa ^a^T1.0131^ea^ ima~nceva anuttara.m vijjaacara.nasampada.m anabhisambhu.namaano pavattaphalabhojanata~nca anabhisambhu.namaano kudaalapi.taka.m {kuddaalapi.taka.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} aadaaya ara~n~navana.m ajjhogaahati -- `kandamuulaphalabhojano bhavissaamii'ti. so a~n~nadatthu vijjaacara.nasampannasseva paricaarako sampajjati. imaaya kho, amba.t.tha, anuttaraaya vijjaacara.nasampadaaya ida.m dutiya.m apaayamukha.m bhavati.

[03] ``puna ^a^V1.0089^ea^ capara.m, amba.t.tha, idhekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa ima~nceva anuttara.m vijjaacara.nasampada.m anabhisambhu.namaano pavattaphalabhojanata~nca anabhisambhu.namaano kandamuulaphalabhojanata~nca anabhisambhu.namaano gaamasaamanta.m vaa nigamasaamanta.m vaa agyaagaara.m karitvaa aggi.m paricaranto acchati. so a~n~nadatthu vijjaacara.nasampannasseva paricaarako sampajjati. imaaya kho, amba.t.tha, anuttaraaya vijjaacara.nasampadaaya ida.m tatiya.m apaayamukha.m bhavati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, amba.t.tha, idhekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa ima.m ceva anuttara.m vijjaacara.nasampada.m anabhisambhu.namaano pavattaphalabhojanata~nca anabhisambhu.namaano kandamuulaphalabhojanata~nca anabhisambhu.namaano aggipaaricariya~nca anabhisambhu.namaano caatumahaapathe ^a^P1.0102^ea^ catudvaara.m agaara.m karitvaa acchati -- `yo imaahi catuuhi disaahi aagamissati sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa, tamaha.m yathaasatti yathaabala.m pa.tipuujessaamii'ti. so a~n~nadatthu vijjaacara.nasampannasseva paricaarako sampajjati. imaaya kho, amba.t.tha, anuttaraaya vijjaacara.nasampadaaya ida.m catuttha.m apaayamukha.m bhavati. imaaya kho, amba.t.tha, anuttaraaya vijjaacara.nasampadaaya imaani cattaari apaayamukhaani bhavanti.

[03] 281^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, amba.t.tha, apinu tva.m imaaya anuttaraaya vijjaacara.nasampadaaya sandissasi saacariyako''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''. `kocaaha.m, bho ^a^M1.0096^ea^ gotama, saacariyako, kaa ca anuttaraa vijjaacara.nasampadaa? aarakaaha.m, bho gotama, anuttaraaya vijjaacara.nasampadaaya ^a^T1.0132^ea^ saacariyako''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, amba.t.tha, apinu tva.m ima~nceva anuttara.m vijjaacara.nasampada.m anabhisambhu.namaano khaarividhamaadaaya ara~n~navanamajjhogaahasi saacariyako -- `pavattaphalabhojano bhavissaamii'''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, amba.t.tha, apinu tva.m ima~nceva anuttara.m vijjaacara.nasampada.m anabhisambhu.namaano pavattaphalabhojanata~nca anabhisambhu.namaano kudaalapi.taka.m aadaaya ara~n~navanamajjhogaahasi saacariyako -- `kandamuulaphalabhojano bhavissaamii'''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^V1.0090^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, amba.t.tha, apinu tva.m ima~nceva anuttara.m vijjaacara.nasampada.m anabhisambhu.namaano pavattaphalabhojanata~nca anabhisambhu.namaano kandamuulaphalabhojanata~nca anabhisambhu.namaano gaamasaamanta.m vaa nigamasaamanta.m vaa agyaagaara.m karitvaa aggi.m paricaranto acchasi saacariyako''ti? ``no ^a^P1.0103^ea^ hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, amba.t.tha, apinu tva.m ima~nceva anuttara.m vijjaacara.nasampada.m anabhisambhu.namaano pavattaphalabhojanata~nca anabhisambhu.namaano kandamuulaphalabhojanata~nca anabhisambhu.namaano aggipaaricariya~nca anabhisambhu.namaano caatumahaapathe catudvaara.m agaara.m karitvaa acchasi saacariyako -- `yo imaahi catuuhi disaahi aagamissati sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa, ta.m maya.m yathaasatti yathaabala.m pa.tipuujessaamaa'''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] 282^b^.^eb^ ``iti kho, amba.t.tha, imaaya ceva tva.m anuttaraaya vijjaacara.nasampadaaya parihiino saacariyako. ye cime anuttaraaya vijjaacara.nasampadaaya cattaari apaayamukhaani bhavanti ^a^T1.0133^ea^, tato ca tva.m parihiino saacariyako. bhaasitaa kho pana te esaa, amba.t.tha, aacariyena braahma.nena pokkharasaatinaa vaacaa -- `ke ca mu.n.dakaa sama.nakaa ibbhaa ka.nhaa bandhupaadaapaccaa, kaa ca tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m saakacchaa'ti attanaa aapaayikopi aparipuuramaano. passa, amba.t.tha, yaava aparaddha~nca te ida.m aacariyassa braahma.nassa pokkharasaatissa.

[03] 283^b^.^eb^ ``braahma.no ^a^M1.0097^ea^ kho pana, amba.t.tha, pokkharasaati ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa dattika.m bhu~njati. tassa raajaa pasenadi kosalo sammukhiibhaavampi na dadaati. yadaapi tena manteti, tirodussantena manteti. yassa kho pana, amba.t.tha, dhammika.m payaata.m bhikkha.m pa.tigga.nheyya, katha.m tassa raajaa pasenadi kosalo sammukhiibhaavampi na dadeyya. passa, amba.t.tha, yaava aparaddha~nca te ida.m aacariyassa braahma.nassa pokkharasaatissa.

[03] 284^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, amba.t.tha, idha raajaa pasenadi kosalo hatthigiivaaya vaa nisinno assapi.t.the vaa nisinno rathuupatthare vaa .thito uggehi vaa raaja~n~nehi vaa ki~ncideva mantana.m ^a^P1.0104^ea^ manteyya. so tamhaa padesaa apakkamma ekamanta.m ti.t.theyya. atha aagaccheyya suddo vaa ^a^V1.0091^ea^ suddadaaso vaa, tasmi.m padese .thito tadeva mantana.m manteyya -- `evampi raajaa pasenadi kosalo aaha, evampi raajaa pasenadi kosalo aahaa'ti. apinu so raajabha.nita.m vaa bha.nati raajamantana.m vaa manteti? ettaavataa so ^a^T1.0134^ea^ assa raajaa vaa raajamatto vaa''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] 285^b^.^eb^ ``evameva kho tva.m, amba.t.tha, ye te ahesu.m braahma.naana.m pubbakaa isayo mantaana.m kattaaro mantaana.m pavattaaro, yesamida.m etarahi braahma.naa poraa.na.m mantapada.m giita.m pavutta.m samihita.m, tadanugaayanti tadanubhaasanti bhaasitamanubhaasanti vaacitamanuvaacenti, seyyathida.m -- a.t.thako vaamako vaamadevo vessaamitto yamataggi {yamadaggi (ka0)} a"ngiiraso bhaaradvaajo vaase.t.tho kassapo bhagu -- `tyaaha.m mante adhiyaami saacariyako'ti, taavataa tva.m bhavissasi isi vaa isitthaaya vaa pa.tipannoti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] 286^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, amba.t.tha, kinti te suta.m braahma.naana.m vuddhaana.m mahallakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m -- ye te ahesu.m braahma.naana.m pubbakaa isayo mantaana.m kattaaro mantaana.m pavattaaro, yesamida.m ^a^M1.0098^ea^ etarahi braahma.naa poraa.na.m mantapada.m giita.m pavutta.m samihita.m, tadanugaayanti tadanubhaasanti bhaasitamanubhaasanti vaacitamanuvaacenti, seyyathida.m -- a.t.thako vaamako vaamadevo vessaamitto yamataggi a"ngiiraso bhaaradvaajo vaase.t.tho kassapo bhagu, eva.m su te sunhaataa suvilittaa kappitakesamassuu aamukkama.niku.n.dalaabhara.naa {aamuttamaalaabhara.naa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} odaatavatthavasanaa pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappitaa sama"ngiibhuutaa paricaarenti, seyyathaapi tva.m etarahi saacariyako''ti? ``no ^a^P1.0105^ea^ hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] ``...pe0... eva.m su te saaliina.m odana.m sucima.msuupasecana.m vicitakaa.laka.m anekasuupa.m anekabya~njana.m paribhu~njanti, seyyathaapi tva.m etarahi saacariyako''ti ^a^T1.0135^ea^? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.
[03] ``...pe0... eva.m su te ve.thakanatapassaahi naariihi paricaarenti, seyyathaapi tva.m etarahi saacariyako''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] ``...pe0... eva.m su te kuttavaalehi va.lavaarathehi diighaahi patodala.t.thiihi vaahane vitudentaa ^a^V1.0092^ea^ vipariyaayanti, seyyathaapi tva.m etarahi saacariyako''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] ``...pe0... eva.m su te ukki.n.naparikhaasu okkhittapalighaasu nagaruupakaarikaasu diighaasivudhehi {diighaasibaddhehi (syaa0 pii0)} purisehi rakkhaapenti, seyyathaapi tva.m etarahi saacariyako''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.
[03] ``iti kho, amba.t.tha, neva tva.m isi na isitthaaya pa.tipanno saacariyako. yassa kho pana, amba.t.tha, mayi ka"nkhaa vaa vimati vaa so ma.m pa~nhena, aha.m veyyaakara.nena sodhissaamii''ti.

[03] 287^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa vihaaraa nikkhamma ca"nkama.m abbhu.t.thaasi. amba.t.thopi maa.navo vihaaraa nikkhamma ca"nkama.m abbhu.t.thaasi. atha kho amba.t.tho maa.navo bhagavanta.m ca"nkamanta.m anuca"nkamamaano bhagavato kaaye dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani samannesi. addasaa kho amba.t.tho maa.navo bhagavato kaaye ^a^M1.0099^ea^ dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani yebhuyyena .thapetvaa dve ^a^P1.0106^ea^. dviisu mahaapurisalakkha.nesu ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati -- kosohite ca vatthaguyhe pahuutajivhataaya ca.

[03] 288^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``passati kho me aya.m amba.t.tho maa.navo dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani yebhuyyena .thapetvaa dve. dviisu ^a^T1.0136^ea^ mahaapurisalakkha.nesu ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati -- kosohite ca vatthaguyhe pahuutajivhataaya caa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa tathaaruupa.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkhaasi yathaa addasa amba.t.tho maa.navo bhagavato kosohita.m vatthaguyha.m. atha kho bhagavaa jivha.m ninnaametvaa ubhopi ka.n.nasotaani anumasi pa.timasi, ubhopi naasikasotaani anumasi pa.timasi, kevalampi nalaa.tama.n.dala.m jivhaaya chaadesi. atha kho amba.t.thassa maa.navassa etadahosi -- ``samannaagato kho sama.no gotamo dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nehi paripu.n.nehi, no aparipu.n.nehii''ti. bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``handa ca daani maya.m, bho gotama, gacchaama, bahukiccaa maya.m bahukara.niiyaa''ti ^a^V1.0093^ea^. ``yassadaani tva.m, amba.t.tha, kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti. atha kho amba.t.tho maa.navo va.lavaarathamaaruyha pakkaami.

[03] 289^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena braahma.no pokkharasaati ukka.t.thaaya nikkhamitvaa mahataa braahma.naga.nena saddhi.m sake aaraame nisinno hoti amba.t.tha.myeva maa.nava.m pa.timaanento. atha kho amba.t.tho maa.navo yena sako aaraamo tena paayaasi. yaavatikaa yaanassa bhuumi, yaanena gantvaa yaanaa paccorohitvaa pattikova yena braahma.no pokkharasaati tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa braahma.na.m pokkharasaati.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.

[03] 290^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho amba.t.tha.m maa.nava.m ^a^T1.0137^ea^ braahma.no pokkharasaati etadavoca -- ``kacci, taata amba.t.tha, addasa ta.m bhavanta.m gotama''nti? ``addasaama kho maya.m, bho, ta.m bhavanta.m gotama''nti. ``kacci, taata amba.t.tha, ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m tathaa santa.myeva ^a^P1.0107^ea^ saddo abbhuggato no a~n~nathaa; kacci pana so bhava.m gotamo taadiso no a~n~naadiso''ti ^a^M1.0100^ea^? ``tathaa santa.myeva, bho, ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m saddo abbhuggato no a~n~nathaa, taadisova so bhava.m gotamo no a~n~naadiso. samannaagato ca so bhava.m gotamo dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nehi paripu.n.nehi no aparipu.n.nehii''ti. ``ahu pana te, taata amba.t.tha, sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m kocideva kathaasallaapo''ti? ``ahu kho me, bho, sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m kocideva kathaasallaapo''ti. ``yathaa katha.m pana te, taata amba.t.tha, ahu sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m kocideva kathaasallaapo''ti? atha kho amba.t.tho maa.navo yaavatako {yaavatiko (ka0 pii0)} ahosi bhagavataa saddhi.m kathaasallaapo, ta.m sabba.m braahma.nassa pokkharasaatissa aarocesi.

[03] 291^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, braahma.no pokkharasaati amba.t.tha.m maa.nava.m etadavoca -- ``aho vata re amhaaka.m pa.n.ditaka {pa.n.ditakaa}, aho vata re amhaaka.m bahussutaka {bahussutakaa}, aho vata re amhaaka.m tevijjaka {tevijjakaa}, evaruupena kira, bho, puriso atthacarakena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyya. yadeva kho tva.m, amba.t.tha, ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m aasajja aasajja avacaasi, atha kho so bhava.m gotamo amhepi eva.m ^a^T1.0138^ea^ upaneyya upaneyya avaca. aho vata re amhaaka.m pa.n.ditaka, aho vata re amhaaka.m bahussutaka, aho vata re amhaaka.m tevijjaka, evaruupena kira, bho, puriso atthacarakena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyyaa''ti, kupito {so kupito (pii0)} anattamano amba.t.tha.m maa.nava.m padasaayeva pavattesi. icchati ca taavadeva bhagavanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m.

[03] 292^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V1.0094^ea^ ^a^P1.0108^ea^ kho te braahma.naa braahma.na.m pokkharasaati.m etadavocu.m -- ``ativikaalo kho, bho, ajja sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. svedaani {daani sve (sii0 ka0)} bhava.m pokkharasaati sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissatii''ti. atha kho braahma.no pokkharasaati sake nivesane pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa yaane aaropetvaa ukkaasu dhaariyamaanaasu ^a^M1.0101^ea^ ukka.t.thaaya niyyaasi, yena icchaana"ngalavanasa.n.do tena paayaasi. yaavatikaa yaanassa bhuumi yaanena gantvaa, yaanaa paccorohitvaa pattikova yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami. upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi, sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.

[03] 293^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m nisinno kho braahma.no pokkharasaati bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aagamaa nu kho idha, bho gotama, amhaaka.m antevaasii amba.t.tho maa.navo''ti? ``aagamaa kho te {tedha (syaa0), te idha (pii0)}, braahma.na, antevaasii amba.t.tho maa.navo''ti. ``ahu pana te, bho gotama, amba.t.thena maa.navena saddhi.m kocideva kathaasallaapo''ti? ``ahu kho me, braahma.na, amba.t.thena maa.navena ^a^T1.0139^ea^ saddhi.m kocideva kathaasallaapo''ti. ``yathaakatha.m pana te, bho gotama, ahu amba.t.thena maa.navena saddhi.m kocideva kathaasallaapo''ti? atha kho bhagavaa yaavatako ahosi amba.t.thena maa.navena saddhi.m kathaasallaapo, ta.m sabba.m braahma.nassa pokkharasaatissa aarocesi. eva.m vutte, braahma.no pokkharasaati bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``baalo, bho gotama, amba.t.tho maa.navo, khamatu bhava.m gotamo amba.t.thassa maa.navassaa''ti. ``sukhii hotu, braahma.na, amba.t.tho maa.navo''ti.

[03] 294^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P1.0109^ea^ kho braahma.no pokkharasaati bhagavato kaaye dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani samannesi. addasaa kho braahma.no pokkharasaati bhagavato kaaye dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani yebhuyyena .thapetvaa dve. dviisu mahaapurisalakkha.nesu ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati -- kosohite ca vatthaguyhe pahuutajivhataaya ca.

[03] 295^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``passati kho me aya.m braahma.no pokkharasaati dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.naani yebhuyyena .thapetvaa dve. dviisu mahaapurisalakkha.nesu ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati -- kosohite ca vatthaguyhe, pahuutajivhataaya caa''ti. atha kho bhagavaa tathaaruupa.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkhaasi yathaa addasa braahma.no pokkharasaati bhagavato kosohita.m vatthaguyha.m. atha kho ^a^M1.0102^ea^ bhagavaa jivha.m ninnaametvaa ubhopi ka.n.nasotaani ^a^V1.0095^ea^ anumasi pa.timasi, ubhopi naasikasotaani anumasi pa.timasi, kevalampi nalaa.tama.n.dala.m jivhaaya chaadesi.

[03] 296^b^.^eb^ atha kho braahma.nassa pokkharasaatissa etadahosi ^a^T1.0140^ea^ -- ``samannaagato kho sama.no gotamo dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nehi paripu.n.nehi no aparipu.n.nehii''ti. bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu me bhava.m gotamo ajjatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] 297^b^.^eb^ atha kho braahma.no pokkharasaati bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocesi -- ``kaalo, bho gotama, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena yena braahma.nassa pokkharasaatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho braahma.no pokkharasaati bhagavanta.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi, maa.navakaapi bhikkhusa"ngha.m. atha kho braahma.no pokkharasaati bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m a~n~natara.m niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.

[03] 298^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m nisinnassa kho braahma.nassa pokkharasaatissa ^a^P1.0110^ea^ bhagavaa anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi, seyyathida.m -- daanakatha.m siilakatha.m saggakatha.m; kaamaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m, nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. yadaa bhagavaa a~n~naasi braahma.na.m pokkharasaati.m kallacitta.m muducitta.m viniivara.nacitta.m udaggacitta.m pasannacitta.m, atha yaa buddhaana.m saamukka.msikaa dhammadesanaa, ta.m pakaasesi -- dukkha.m samudaya.m nirodha.m magga.m. seyyathaapi naama suddha.m vattha.m apagatakaa.laka.m sammadeva rajana.m pa.tigga.nheyya; evameva braahma.nassa pokkharasaatissa tasmi~n~neva ^a^T1.0141^ea^ aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ``ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti.

[03] 299^b^.^eb^ atha kho braahma.no pokkharasaati di.t.thadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogaa.lhadhammo ti.n.navicikiccho vigatakatha.mkatho vesaarajjappatto ^a^M1.0103^ea^ aparappaccayo satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama. seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya ^a^V1.0096^ea^, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya, `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti; evameva.m bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bho gotama, saputto sabhariyo sapariso saamacco bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata.m. yathaa ca bhava.m gotamo ukka.t.thaaya a~n~naani upaasakakulaani upasa"nkamati, evameva bhava.m gotamo pokkharasaatikula.m upasa"nkamatu. tattha ye te maa.navakaa vaa maa.navikaa vaa bhavanta.m gotama.m abhivaadessanti vaa paccu.t.thissanti {paccu.t.thassanti (pii0)} vaa aasana.m vaa udaka.m vaa dassanti citta.m vaa pasaadessanti, tesa.m ta.m bhavissati diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti. ``kalyaa.na.m vuccati, braahma.naa''ti.
[06] amba.t.thasutta.m ni.t.thita.m tatiya.m.

[03] 300^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0104^ea^ ^a^V1.0097^ea^ ^a^P1.0111^ea^ ^a^T1.0142^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa a"ngesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi yena campaa tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa campaaya.m viharati gaggaraaya pokkhara.niyaa tiire. tena kho pana samayena so.nada.n.do braahma.no campa.m ajjhaavasati sattussada.m sati.naka.t.thodaka.m sadha~n~na.m raajabhogga.m ra~n~naa maagadhena seniyena bimbisaarena dinna.m raajadaaya.m brahmadeyya.m.

[03] 301^b^.^eb^ assosu.m kho campeyyakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa -- ``sama.no khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito a"ngesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi campa.m anuppatto campaaya.m viharati gaggaraaya pokkhara.niyaa tiire. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m ^a^T1.0143^ea^ hotii''ti. atha ^a^P1.0112^ea^ kho campeyyakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa campaaya nikkhamitvaa sa"nghasa"nghii {sa"nghaa sa"nghii (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ga.niibhuutaa yena gaggaraa pokkhara.nii tenupasa"nkamanti.

[03] 302^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena so.nada.n.do braahma.no uparipaasaade divaaseyya.m upagato hoti. addasaa kho so.nada.n.do braahma.no campeyyake braahma.nagahapatike campaaya nikkhamitvaa sa"nghasa"nghii ^a^V1.0098^ea^ {sa"nghe sa"nghii (sii0 pii0) sa"nghaa sa"nghii (syaa0)} ga.niibhuute yena gaggaraa pokkhara.nii tenupasa"nkamante. disvaa khatta.m aamantesi -- ``ki.m nu kho, bho khatte, campeyyakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa campaaya ^a^M1.0105^ea^ nikkhamitvaa sa"nghasa"nghii ga.niibhuutaa yena gaggaraa pokkhara.nii tenupasa"nkamantii''ti? ``atthi kho, bho, sama.no gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito a"ngesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi campa.m anuppatto campaaya.m viharati gaggaraaya pokkhara.niyaa tiire. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. tamete bhavanta.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamantii''ti. ``tena hi, bho khatte, yena campeyyakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa tenupasa"nkama, upasa"nkamitvaa campeyyake braahma.nagahapatike eva.m vadehi -- `so.nada.n.do, bho, braahma.no evamaaha -- aagamentu kira bhavanto, so.nada.n.dopi braahma.no sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissatii'''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho so khattaa so.nada.n.dassa ^a^T1.0144^ea^ braahma.nassa pa.tissutvaa yena campeyyakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa campeyyake braahma.nagahapatike etadavoca -- ``so.nada.n.do ^a^P1.0113^ea^ bho braahma.no evamaaha -- `aagamentu kira bhavanto, so.nada.n.dopi braahma.no sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissatii'''ti.

[03] 303^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena naanaaverajjakaana.m braahma.naana.m pa~ncamattaani braahma.nasataani campaaya.m pa.tivasanti kenacideva kara.niiyena. assosu.m kho te braahma.naa -- ``so.nada.n.do kira braahma.no sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissatii''ti. atha kho te braahma.naa yena so.nada.n.do braahma.no tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa so.nada.n.da.m braahma.na.m etadavocu.m -- ``sacca.m kira bhava.m so.nada.n.do sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissatii''ti? ``eva.m kho me, bho, hoti -- `ahampi sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissaamii'''ti.

[03] ``maa bhava.m so.nada.n.do sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkami. na arahati bhava.m so.nada.n.do sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. sace bhava.m so.nada.n.do sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissati, bhoto ^a^M1.0106^ea^ so.nada.n.dassa yaso haayissati, sama.nassa gotamassa yaso abhiva.d.dhissati. yampi bhoto so.nada.n.dassa yaso haayissati, sama.nassa gotamassa yaso abhiva.d.dhissati ^a^V1.0099^ea^, iminaapa"ngena na arahati bhava.m so.nada.n.do sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m; sama.notveva gotamo arahati bhavanta.m so.nada.n.da.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m.

[03] ``bhava~nhi so.nada.n.do ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena. yampi bhava.m so.nada.n.do ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena, iminaapa"ngena na arahati bhava.m so.nada.n.do sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m; sama.notveva gotamo arahati bhavanta.m so.nada.n.da.m dassanaaya ^a^T1.0145^ea^ upasa"nkamitu.m.
[03] ``bhava~nhi so.nada.n.do a.d.dho mahaddhano mahaabhogo...pe0...

[03] ``bhava~nhi so.nada.n.do ajjhaayako ^a^P1.0114^ea^, mantadharo, ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m padako veyyaakara.no, lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo...pe0...

[03] ``bhava~nhi so.nada.n.do abhiruupo dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato brahmava.n.nii brahmavacchasii {brahma.d.dhii (sii0), brahmavaccasii (pii0)} akhuddaavakaaso dassanaaya...pe0...
[03] ``bhava~nhi so.nada.n.do siilavaa vuddhasiilii vuddhasiilena samannaagato...pe0...

[03] ``bhava~nhi so.nada.n.do kalyaa.navaaco kalyaa.navaakkara.no poriyaa vaacaaya samannaagato vissa.t.thaaya anelagalaaya {ane.lagalaaya (sii0 pii0), anelaga.laaya (ka)} atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa...pe0...

[03] ``bhava~nhi so.nada.n.do bahuuna.m aacariyapaacariyo tii.ni maa.navakasataani mante vaaceti. bahuu kho pana naanaadisaa naanaajanapadaa maa.navakaa aagacchanti ^a^M1.0107^ea^ bhoto so.nada.n.dassa santike mantatthikaa mante adhiyitukaamaa ^a^T1.0146^ea^ ...pe0...
[03] ``bhava~nhi so.nada.n.do ji.n.no vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto; sama.no gotamo taru.no ceva taru.napabbajito ca...pe0...
[03] ``bhava~nhi ^a^V1.0100^ea^ so.nada.n.do ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa sakkato garukato maanito puujito apacito...pe0...
[03] ``bhava~nhi so.nada.n.do braahma.nassa pokkharasaatissa sakkato garukato maanito puujito apacito...pe0...

[03] ``bhava~nhi so.nada.n.do campa.m ajjhaavasati sattussada.m sati.naka.t.thodaka.m sadha~n~na.m raajabhogga.m, ra~n~naa maagadhena seniyena bimbisaarena dinna.m, raajadaaya.m brahmadeyya.m. yampi bhava.m so.nada.n.do campa.m ajjhaavasati sattussada.m sati.naka.t.thodaka.m sadha~n~na.m raajabhogga.m, ra~n~naa maagadhena seniyena bimbisaarena dinna.m, raajadaaya.m brahmadeyya.m. iminaapa"ngena na arahati bhava.m so.nada.n.do sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m; sama.notveva gotamo arahati bhavanta.m so.nada.n.da.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu''nti.
[03] 304^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, so.nada.n.do braahma.no te braahma.ne etadavoca --

[03] ``tena ^a^P1.0115^ea^ hi, bho, mamapi su.naatha, yathaa mayameva arahaama ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m; natveva arahati so bhava.m gotamo amhaaka.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa, akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena. yampi bho sama.no gotamo ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa ^a^T1.0147^ea^ pitaamahayugaa, akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena, iminaapa"ngena na arahati so bhava.m gotamo amhaaka.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m ^a^M1.0108^ea^; atha kho mayameva arahaama ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m.
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo mahanta.m ~naatisa"ngha.m ohaaya pabbajito...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo pahuuta.m hira~n~nasuva.n.na.m ohaaya pabbajito bhuumigata~nca vehaasa.t.tha.m ca...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no ^a^V1.0101^ea^ khalu, bho, gotamo daharova samaano yuvaa susukaa.lakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannaagato pa.thamena vayasaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo akaamakaana.m maataapituuna.m assumukhaana.m rudantaana.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo abhiruupo dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato, brahmava.n.nii, brahmavacchasii, akhuddaavakaaso dassanaaya...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo siilavaa ariyasiilii kusalasiilii kusalasiilena samannaagato...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo kalyaa.navaaco kalyaa.navaakkara.no poriyaa vaacaaya samannaagato vissa.t.thaaya anelagalaaya atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo bahuuna.m aacariyapaacariyo...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo khii.nakaamaraago vigatacaapallo...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo kammavaadii kiriyavaadii apaapapurekkhaaro brahma~n~naaya pajaaya...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo uccaa kulaa pabbajito asambhinnakhattiyakulaa...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo a.d.dhaa ^a^T1.0148^ea^ kulaa pabbajito mahaddhanaa mahaabhogaa...pe0...
[03] ``sama.na.m ^a^M1.0109^ea^ ^a^P1.0116^ea^ khalu, bho, gotama.m tirora.t.thaa tirojanapadaa pa~nha.m pucchitu.m aagacchanti...pe0...
[03] ``sama.na.m khalu, bho, gotama.m anekaani devataasahassaani paa.nehi sara.na.m gataani...pe0...

[03] ``sama.na.m ^a^V1.0102^ea^ khalu, bho, gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa' ti...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nehi samannaagato...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo ehisvaagatavaadii sakhilo sammodako abbhaaku.tiko uttaanamukho pubbabhaasii...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo catunna.m parisaana.m sakkato garukato maanito puujito apacito...pe0...
[03] ``sama.ne khalu, bho, gotame bahuu devaa ca manussaa ca abhippasannaa...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo yasmi.m gaame vaa nigame vaa pa.tivasati, na tasmi.m gaame vaa nigame vaa amanussaa manusse vihe.thenti...pe0...

[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo sa"nghii ga.nii ga.naacariyo puthutitthakaraana.m aggamakkhaayati. yathaa kho pana, bho, etesa.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m yathaa vaa tathaa vaa yaso samudaagacchati, na heva.m sama.nassa gotamassa yaso samudaagato. atha kho anuttaraaya vijjaacara.nasampadaaya sama.nassa gotamassa yaso samudaagato...pe0...
[03] ``sama.na.m khalu, bho, gotama.m raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro saputto sabhariyo sapariso ^a^T1.0149^ea^ saamacco paa.nehi sara.na.m gato...pe0...
[03] ``sama.na.m ^a^M1.0110^ea^ khalu, bho, gotama.m raajaa pasenadi kosalo saputto sabhariyo sapariso saamacco paa.nehi sara.na.m gato...pe0...
[03] ``sama.na.m khalu, bho, gotama.m braahma.no pokkharasaati saputto sabhariyo sapariso saamacco paa.nehi sara.na.m gato...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no ^a^V1.0103^ea^ khalu, bho, gotamo ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa sakkato garukato maanito puujito apacito...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa sakkato garukato maanito puujito apacito...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo braahma.nassa pokkharasaatissa sakkato garukato maanito puujito apacito...pe0...

[03] ``sama.no ^a^P1.0117^ea^ khalu, bho, gotamo campa.m anuppatto, campaaya.m viharati gaggaraaya pokkhara.niyaa tiire. ye kho pana, bho, keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa amhaaka.m gaamakhetta.m aagacchanti atithii no te honti. atithii kho panamhehi sakkaatabbaa garukaatabbaa maanetabbaa puujetabbaa apacetabbaa. yampi, bho, sama.no gotamo campa.m anuppatto campaaya.m viharati gaggaraaya pokkhara.niyaa tiire, atithimhaaka.m sama.no gotamo; atithi kho panamhehi sakkaatabbo garukaatabbo maanetabbo puujetabbo apacetabbo. iminaapa"ngena na arahati so bhava.m gotamo amhaaka.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. atha kho mayameva arahaama ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. ettake kho aha.m, bho, tassa bhoto gotamassa va.n.ne pariyaapu.naami, no ca kho so bhava.m gotamo ettakava.n.no. aparimaa.nava.n.no hi so bhava.m gotamo''ti.

[03] 305^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0150^ea^ vutte, te braahma.naa so.nada.n.da.m braahma.na.m etadavocu.m -- ``yathaa kho bhava.m so.nada.n.do sama.nassa gotamassa va.n.ne bhaasati ito cepi so bhava.m gotamo yojanasate viharati, alameva saddhena kulaputtena dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m api pu.tosenaa''ti. ``tena hi, bho, sabbeva maya.m sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissaamaa''ti.

[03] 306^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M1.0111^ea^ kho so.nada.n.do braahma.no mahataa braahma.naga.nena saddhi.m yena gaggaraa pokkhara.nii tenupasa"nkami. atha kho so.nada.n.dassa braahma.nassa tirovanasa.n.dagatassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``aha~nceva kho pana sama.na.m gotama.m pa~nha.m puccheyya.m; tatra ce ma.m sama.no gotamo eva.m vadeyya -- `na kho esa, braahma.na, pa~nho eva.m pucchitabbo, eva.m naamesa, braahma.na ^a^V1.0104^ea^, pa~nho pucchitabbo'ti, tena ma.m aya.m parisaa paribhaveyya ^a^T1.0151^ea^ -- `baalo so.nada.n.do braahma.no abyatto, naasakkhi sama.na.m gotama.m yoniso pa~nha.m pucchitu'nti. ya.m kho panaaya.m parisaa paribhaveyya, yasopi tassa haayetha. yassa kho pana yaso haayetha, bhogaapi tassa haayeyyu.m. yasoladdhaa kho panamhaaka.m bhogaa. mama~nceva kho pana sama.no gotamo pa~nha.m puccheyya, tassa caaha.m pa~nhassa veyyaakara.nena citta.m na aaraadheyya.m; tatra ce ma.m sama.no gotamo eva.m vadeyya -- `na kho esa, braahma.na, pa~nho eva.m byaakaatabbo, eva.m naamesa, braahma.na, pa~nho byaakaatabbo'ti, tena ma.m aya.m parisaa paribhaveyya -- `baalo so.nada.n.do braahma.no abyatto, naasakkhi ^a^P1.0118^ea^ sama.nassa gotamassa pa~nhassa veyyaakara.nena citta.m aaraadhetu'nti. ya.m kho panaaya.m parisaa paribhaveyya, yasopi tassa haayetha. yassa kho pana yaso haayetha, bhogaapi tassa haayeyyu.m. yasoladdhaa kho panamhaaka.m bhogaa. aha~nceva kho pana eva.m samiipagato samaano adisvaava sama.na.m gotama.m nivatteyya.m, tena ma.m aya.m parisaa paribhaveyya -- `baalo so.nada.n.do braahma.no abyatto maanathaddho bhiito ca, no visahati sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m, katha~nhi naama eva.m samiipagato samaano adisvaa sama.na.m gotama.m nivattissatii'ti. ya.m kho panaaya.m parisaa paribhaveyya, yasopi tassa haayetha. yassa kho pana yaso haayetha, bhogaapi tassa haayeyyu.m, yasoladdhaa kho panamhaaka.m bhogaa''ti.

[03] 307^b^.^eb^ atha kho so.nada.n.do braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. campeyyakaapi kho braahma.nagahapatikaa ^a^M1.0112^ea^ appekacce bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu; appekacce bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.msu; sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu; appekacce yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu; appekacce naamagotta.m saavetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu; appekacce tu.nhiibhuutaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu.

[03] 308^b^.^eb^ tatrapi ^a^P1.0119^ea^ suda.m so.nada.n.do braahma.no etadeva bahulamanuvitakkento nisinno hoti -- ``aha~nceva kho ^a^T1.0152^ea^ pana sama.na.m gotama.m pa~nha.m puccheyya.m; tatra ce ma.m sama.no gotamo eva.m vadeyya -- `na kho esa, braahma.na, pa~nho eva.m pucchitabbo, eva.m naamesa, braahma.na, pa~nho pucchitabbo'ti, tena ma.m aya.m parisaa paribhaveyya -- `baalo so.nada.n.do braahma.no abyatto, naasakkhi sama.na.m gotama.m yoniso pa~nha.m pucchitu'nti. ya.m kho panaaya.m parisaa paribhaveyya, yasopi tassa haayetha. yassa kho pana yaso haayetha, bhogaapi tassa haayeyyu.m. yasoladdhaa kho panamhaaka.m bhogaa. mama~nceva kho pana sama.no gotamo pa~nha.m puccheyya, tassa caaha.m pa~nhassa veyyaakara.nena ^a^V1.0105^ea^ citta.m na aaraadheyya.m; tatra ce ma.m sama.no gotamo eva.m vadeyya -- `na kho esa, braahma.na, pa~nho eva.m byaakaatabbo, eva.m naamesa, braahma.na, pa~nho byaakaatabbo'ti, tena ma.m aya.m parisaa paribhaveyya -- `baalo so.nada.n.do braahma.no abyatto, naasakkhi sama.nassa gotamassa pa~nhassa veyyaakara.nena citta.m aaraadhetu'nti. ya.m kho panaaya.m parisaa paribhaveyya, yasopi tassa haayetha. yassa kho pana yaso haayetha, bhogaapi tassa haayeyyu.m. yasoladdhaa kho panamhaaka.m bhogaa. aho vata ma.m sama.no gotamo sake aacariyake tevijjake pa~nha.m puccheyya, addhaa vatassaaha.m citta.m aaraadheyya.m pa~nhassa veyyaakara.nenaa''ti.

[03] 309^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavato so.nada.n.dassa braahma.nassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya etadahosi -- ``viha~n~nati kho aya.m so.nada.n.do braahma.no ^a^T1.0153^ea^ sakena cittena. ya.mnuunaaha.m so.nada.n.da.m braahma.na.m sake aacariyake tevijjake pa~nha.m puccheyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa so.nada.n.da.m ^a^M1.0113^ea^ braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``katihi pana, braahma.na, a"ngehi samannaagata.m braahma.naa braahma.na.m pa~n~napenti; `braahma.nosmii'ti ca vadamaano sammaa vadeyya, na ca pana musaavaada.m aapajjeyyaa''ti?

[03] 310^b^.^eb^ atha kho so.nada.n.dassa braahma.nassa etadahosi -- ``ya.m ^a^P1.0120^ea^ vata no ahosi icchita.m, ya.m aaka"nkhita.m, ya.m adhippeta.m, ya.m abhipatthita.m -- `aho vata ma.m sama.no gotamo sake aacariyake tevijjake pa~nha.m puccheyya, addhaa vatassaaha.m citta.m aaraadheyya.m pa~nhassa veyyaakara.nenaa'ti, tatra ma.m sama.no gotamo sake aacariyake tevijjake pa~nha.m pucchati. addhaa vatassaaha.m citta.m aaraadhessaami pa~nhassa veyyaakara.nenaa''ti.

[03] 311^b^.^eb^ atha kho so.nada.n.do braahma.no abbhunnaametvaa kaaya.m anuviloketvaa parisa.m bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``pa~ncahi, bho gotama, a"ngehi samannaagata.m braahma.naa braahma.na.m pa~n~napenti; `braahma.nosmii'ti ca vadamaano sammaa vadeyya, na ca pana musaavaada.m aapajjeyya. katamehi pa~ncahi? idha, bho gotama, braahma.no ubhato sujaato hoti maatito ca pitito ca, sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena; ajjhaayako hoti mantadharo ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m padako veyyaakara.no lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo; abhiruupo hoti ^a^V1.0106^ea^ ^a^T1.0154^ea^ dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato brahmava.n.nii brahmavacchasii akhuddaavakaaso dassanaaya; siilavaa hoti vuddhasiilii vuddhasiilena samannaagato; pa.n.dito ca hoti medhaavii pa.thamo vaa dutiyo vaa suja.m pagga.nhantaana.m. imehi kho, bho gotama, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagata.m braahma.naa braahma.na.m pa~n~napenti; `braahma.nosmii'ti ca vadamaano sammaa vadeyya, na ca pana musaavaada.m aapajjeyyaa''ti.

[03] ``imesa.m pana, braahma.na, pa~ncanna.m a"ngaana.m sakkaa eka.m a"nga.m .thapayitvaa catuuha"ngehi samannaagata.m braahma.naa braahma.na.m pa~n~napetu.m; `braahma.nosmii'ti ca vadamaano sammaa vadeyya, na ca pana musaavaada.m aapajjeyyaa''ti? ``sakkaa ^a^M1.0114^ea^, bho gotama. imesa~nhi, bho gotama, pa~ncanna.m a"ngaana.m va.n.na.m .thapayaama. ki~nhi va.n.no karissati? yato kho, bho gotama, braahma.no ubhato sujaato hoti maatito ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa ^a^P1.0121^ea^ akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena; ajjhaayako ca hoti mantadharo ca ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m padako veyyaakara.no lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo; siilavaa ca hoti vuddhasiilii vuddhasiilena samannaagato; pa.n.dito ca hoti medhaavii pa.thamo vaa dutiyo vaa suja.m pagga.nhantaana.m. imehi kho bho gotama catuuha"ngehi samannaagata.m braahma.naa braahma.na.m pa~n~napenti; `braahma.nosmii'ti ca vadamaano ^a^T1.0155^ea^ sammaa vadeyya, na ca pana musaavaada.m aapajjeyyaa''ti.

[03] 312^b^.^eb^ ``imesa.m pana, braahma.na, catunna.m a"ngaana.m sakkaa eka.m a"nga.m .thapayitvaa tiiha"ngehi samannaagata.m braahma.naa braahma.na.m pa~n~napetu.m; `braahma.nosmii'ti ca vadamaano sammaa vadeyya, na ca pana musaavaada.m aapajjeyyaa''ti? ``sakkaa, bho gotama. imesa~nhi, bho gotama, catunna.m a"ngaana.m mante .thapayaama. ki~nhi mantaa karissanti? yato kho, bho gotama, braahma.no ubhato sujaato hoti maatito ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena; siilavaa ca hoti vuddhasiilii vuddhasiilena samannaagato; pa.n.dito ca hoti medhaavii pa.thamo vaa dutiyo vaa suja.m pagga.nhantaana.m. imehi kho, bho gotama, tiiha"ngehi samannaagata.m braahma.naa braahma.na.m pa~n~napenti; `braahma.nosmii'ti ca vadamaano sammaa vadeyya, na ca pana musaavaada.m aapajjeyyaa''ti.

[03] ``imesa.m pana, braahma.na, ti.n.na.m a"ngaana.m sakkaa eka.m a"nga.m .thapayitvaa dviiha"ngehi samannaagata.m braahma.naa braahma.na.m pa~n~napetu.m; `braahma.nosmii'ti ca vadamaano sammaa vadeyya, na ca pana ^a^V1.0107^ea^ musaavaada.m aapajjeyyaa''ti? ``sakkaa, bho gotama. imesa~nhi, bho gotama, ti.n.na.m a"ngaana.m jaati.m .thapayaama. ki~nhi jaati karissati? yato kho, bho gotama, braahma.no siilavaa hoti vuddhasiilii vuddhasiilena samannaagato; pa.n.dito ca hoti ^a^M1.0115^ea^ medhaavii pa.thamo vaa dutiyo vaa suja.m pagga.nhantaana.m. imehi ^a^T1.0156^ea^ kho, bho gotama, dviiha"ngehi samannaagata.m braahma.naa braahma.na.m pa~n~napenti; `braahma.nosmii'ti ca vadamaano sammaa vadeyya, na ca pana musaavaada.m aapajjeyyaa''ti.

[03] 313^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P1.0122^ea^ vutte, te braahma.naa so.nada.n.da.m braahma.na.m etadavocu.m -- ``maa bhava.m so.nada.n.do eva.m avaca, maa bhava.m so.nada.n.do eva.m avaca. apavadateva bhava.m so.nada.n.do va.n.na.m, apavadati mante, apavadati jaati.m eka.msena. bhava.m so.nada.n.do sama.nasseva gotamassa vaada.m anupakkhandatii''ti.

[03] 314^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa te braahma.ne etadavoca -- ``sace kho tumhaaka.m braahma.naana.m eva.m hoti -- `appassuto ca so.nada.n.do braahma.no, akalyaa.navaakkara.no ca so.nada.n.do braahma.no, duppa~n~no ca so.nada.n.do braahma.no, na ca pahoti so.nada.n.do braahma.no sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetu'nti, ti.t.thatu so.nada.n.do braahma.no, tumhe mayaa saddhi.m mantavho asmi.m vacane. sace pana tumhaaka.m braahma.naana.m eva.m hoti -- `bahussuto ca so.nada.n.do braahma.no, kalyaa.navaakkara.no ca so.nada.n.do braahma.no, pa.n.dito ca so.nada.n.do braahma.no, pahoti ca so.nada.n.do braahma.no sama.nena gotamena saddhi.m asmi.m vacane pa.timantetu'nti, ti.t.thatha tumhe, so.nada.n.do braahma.no mayaa saddhi.m pa.timantetuu''ti.

[03] 315^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, so.nada.n.do braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ti.t.thatu bhava.m gotamo, tu.nhii bhava.m gotamo hotu, ahameva tesa.m sahadhammena ^a^T1.0157^ea^ pa.tivacana.m karissaamii''ti. atha kho so.nada.n.do braahma.no te braahma.ne etadavoca -- ``maa bhavanto eva.m avacuttha, maa bhavanto eva.m avacuttha -- `apavadateva bhava.m so.nada.n.do va.n.na.m, apavadati mante, apavadati jaati.m eka.msena. bhava.m so.nada.n.do ^a^P1.0123^ea^ sama.nasseva gotamassa vaada.m anupakkhandatii'ti. naaha.m, bho, apavadaami va.n.na.m vaa mante vaa jaati.m vaa''ti.

[03] 316^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M1.0116^ea^ kho pana samayena so.nada.n.dassa braahma.nassa bhaagineyyo a"ngako naama maa.navako tassa.m parisaaya.m nisinno hoti. atha kho so.nada.n.do braahma.no te braahma.ne etadavoca ^a^V1.0108^ea^ -- ``passanti no bhonto ima.m a"ngaka.m maa.navaka.m amhaaka.m bhaagineyya''nti? ``eva.m, bho''. ``a"ngako kho, bho, maa.navako abhiruupo dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato brahmava.n.nii brahmavacchasii akhuddaavakaaso dassanaaya, naassa imissa.m parisaaya.m samasamo atthi va.n.nena .thapetvaa sama.na.m gotama.m. a"ngako kho maa.navako ajjhaayako mantadharo, ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m padako veyyaakara.no lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo. ahamassa mante vaacetaa. a"ngako kho maa.navako ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena. ahamassa maataapitaro jaanaami. a"ngako kho maa.navako paa.nampi haneyya, adinnampi aadiyeyya ^a^T1.0158^ea^, paradaarampi gaccheyya, musaavaadampi bha.neyya, majjampi piveyya, ettha daani, bho, ki.m va.n.no karissati, ki.m mantaa, ki.m jaati? yato kho, bho, braahma.no siilavaa ca hoti vuddhasiilii vuddhasiilena samannaagato, pa.n.dito ca hoti medhaavii pa.thamo vaa dutiyo vaa suja.m pagga.nhantaana.m. imehi kho, bho, dviiha"ngehi samannaagata.m braahma.naa braahma.na.m pa~n~napenti; `braahma.nosmii'ti ca vadamaano sammaa vadeyya, na ca pana musaavaada.m aapajjeyyaa''ti.

[03] 317^b^.^eb^ ``imesa.m pana, braahma.na, dvinna.m a"ngaana.m sakkaa eka.m a"nga.m .thapayitvaa ekena a"ngena samannaagata.m braahma.naa braahma.na.m pa~n~napetu.m; `braahma.nosmii'ti ca vadamaano sammaa vadeyya, na ca pana musaavaada.m aapajjeyyaa''ti? ``no ^a^P1.0124^ea^ hida.m, bho gotama. siilaparidhotaa hi, bho gotama, pa~n~naa; pa~n~naaparidhota.m siila.m. yattha siila.m tattha pa~n~naa, yattha pa~n~naa tattha siila.m. siilavato pa~n~naa, pa~n~navato siila.m. siilapa~n~naa.na~nca pana lokasmi.m aggamakkhaayati. seyyathaapi, bho gotama, hatthena vaa hattha.m dhoveyya, paadena vaa paada.m dhoveyya; evameva kho, bho gotama, siilaparidhotaa pa~n~naa, pa~n~naaparidhota.m ^a^M1.0117^ea^ siila.m. yattha siila.m tattha pa~n~naa, yattha pa~n~naa tattha siila.m. siilavato pa~n~naa, pa~n~navato siila.m. siilapa~n~naa.na~nca pana lokasmi.m aggamakkhaayatii''ti. ``evameta.m, braahma.na, evameta.m, braahma.na, siilaparidhotaa hi, braahma.na, pa~n~naa, pa~n~naaparidhota.m siila.m. yattha siila.m tattha pa~n~naa, yattha pa~n~naa tattha siila.m. siilavato pa~n~naa, pa~n~navato siila.m. siilapa~n~naa.na~nca pana lokasmi.m aggamakkhaayati. seyyathaapi, braahma.na, hatthena vaa hattha.m dhoveyya, paadena vaa paada.m dhoveyya; evameva kho, braahma.na, siilaparidhotaa pa~n~naa, pa~n~naaparidhota.m ^a^V1.0109^ea^ siila.m. yattha siila.m tattha pa~n~naa, yattha pa~n~naa tattha siila.m. siilavato pa~n~naa, pa~n~navato siila.m. siilapa~n~naa.na~nca pana lokasmi.m aggamakkhaayati ^a^T1.0159^ea^.

[03] 318^b^.^eb^ ``katama.m pana ta.m, braahma.na, siila.m? katamaa saa pa~n~naa''ti? ``ettakaparamaava maya.m, bho gotama, etasmi.m atthe. saadhu vata bhavanta.myeva gotama.m pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho''ti. ``tena hi, braahma.na, su.nohi; saadhuka.m manasikarohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho so.nada.n.do braahma.no bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``idha, braahma.na, tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho...pe0... (yathaa 190-212 anucchedesu tathaa vitthaaretabba.m). eva.m kho, braahma.na, bhikkhu siilasampanno hoti. ida.m kho ta.m, braahma.na, siila.m...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati...pe0... ~naa.nadassanaaya citta.m abhiniiharati, abhininnaameti. idampissa hoti pa~n~naaya...pe0... ^a^V1.0110^ea^ naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaati, idampissa hoti pa~n~naaya aya.m kho saa, braahma.na, pa~n~naa''ti.

[03] 319^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, so.nada.n.do braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m ^a^T1.0160^ea^, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama ^a^P1.0125^ea^. seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya, `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti; evameva.m bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami, dhamma~nca, bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata.m ^a^M1.0118^ea^. adhivaasetu ca me bhava.m gotamo svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] 320^b^.^eb^ atha kho so.nada.n.do braahma.no bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho so.nada.n.do braahma.no tassaa rattiyaa accayena sake nivesane pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bho gotama, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena yena so.nada.n.dassa braahma.nassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami ^a^V1.0111^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho so.nada.n.do braahma.no buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi.

[03] 321^b^.^eb^ atha kho so.nada.n.do braahma.no bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m a~n~natara.m niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m ^a^T1.0161^ea^ nisinno kho so.nada.n.do braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aha~nceva kho pana, bho gotama, parisagato samaano aasanaa vu.t.thahitvaa bhavanta.m gotama.m abhivaadeyya.m, tena ma.m saa parisaa paribhaveyya. ya.m kho pana saa parisaa paribhaveyya, yasopi tassa haayetha. yassa kho pana yaso haayetha, bhogaapi tassa haayeyyu.m. yasoladdhaa kho panamhaaka.m bhogaa. aha~nceva kho pana, bho gotama, parisagato samaano a~njali.m pagga.nheyya.m, aasanaa me ta.m bhava.m gotamo paccu.t.thaana.m dhaaretu. aha~nceva ^a^P1.0126^ea^ kho pana, bho gotama, parisagato samaano ve.thana.m omu~nceyya.m, sirasaa me ta.m bhava.m gotamo abhivaadana.m dhaaretu. aha~nceva kho pana, bho gotama, yaanagato samaano yaanaa paccorohitvaa bhavanta.m gotama.m abhivaadeyya.m, tena ma.m saa parisaa paribhaveyya. ya.m kho pana saa parisaa paribhaveyya, yasopi tassa haayetha, yassa kho pana yaso haayetha, bhogaapi tassa haayeyyu.m. yasoladdhaa kho panamhaaka.m bhogaa. aha~nceva kho pana, bho gotama, yaanagato samaano patodala.t.thi.m abbhunnaameyya.m, yaanaa me ta.m bhava.m gotamo paccorohana.m dhaaretu. aha~nceva ^a^M1.0119^ea^ kho pana, bho gotama, yaanagato samaano chatta.m apanaameyya.m, sirasaa me ta.m bhava.m gotamo abhivaadana.m dhaaretuu''ti.
[03] 322^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa so.nada.n.da.m braahma.na.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaamiiti.
[06] so.nada.n.dasutta.m ni.t.thita.m catuttha.m.

[03] 323^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0120^ea^ ^a^V1.0112^ea^ ^a^P1.0127^ea^ ^a^T1.0162^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa magadhesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi yena khaa.numata.m naama magadhaana.m braahma.nagaamo tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa khaa.numate viharati ambala.t.thikaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena kuu.tadanto braahma.no khaa.numata.m ajjhaavasati sattussada.m sati.naka.t.thodaka.m sadha~n~na.m raajabhogga.m ra~n~naa maagadhena seniyena bimbisaarena dinna.m raajadaaya.m brahmadeyya.m. tena kho pana samayena kuu.tadantassa braahma.nassa mahaaya~n~no upakkha.to hoti. satta ca usabhasataani satta ca vacchatarasataani satta ca vacchatariisataani satta ca ajasataani satta ca urabbhasataani thuu.nuupaniitaani honti ya~n~natthaaya.
