[03] 324^b^.^eb^ assosu.m kho khaa.numatakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa -- ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito magadhesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi khaa.numata.m anuppatto khaa.numate viharati ambala.t.thikaaya.m. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti ^a^P1.0128^ea^. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m ^a^T1.0163^ea^ sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m hotii''ti.
[03] 325^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V1.0113^ea^ kho khaa.numatakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa khaa.numataa nikkhamitvaa sa"nghasa"nghii ga.niibhuutaa yena ambala.t.thikaa tenupasa"nkamanti.

[03] 326^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M1.0121^ea^ kho pana samayena kuu.tadanto braahma.no uparipaasaade divaaseyya.m upagato hoti. addasaa kho kuu.tadanto braahma.no khaa.numatake braahma.nagahapatike khaa.numataa nikkhamitvaa sa"nghasa"nghii ga.niibhuute yena ambala.t.thikaa tenupasa"nkamante. disvaa khatta.m aamantesi -- ``ki.m nu kho, bho khatte, khaa.numatakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa khaa.numataa nikkhamitvaa sa"nghasa"nghii ga.niibhuutaa yena ambala.t.thikaa tenupasa"nkamantii''ti?

[03] 327^b^.^eb^ ``atthi kho, bho, sama.no gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito magadhesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi khaa.numata.m anuppatto, khaa.numate viharati ambala.t.thikaaya.m. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. tamete bhavanta.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamantii''ti.

[03] 328^b^.^eb^ atha kho kuu.tadantassa braahma.nassa etadahosi -- ``suta.m kho pana meta.m -- `sama.no ^a^T1.0164^ea^ gotamo tividha.m ya~n~nasampada.m so.lasaparikkhaara.m jaanaatii'ti. na kho panaaha.m jaanaami tividha.m ya~n~nasampada.m so.lasaparikkhaara.m. icchaami caaha.m mahaaya~n~na.m yajitu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m ^a^P1.0129^ea^ sama.na.m gotama.m upasa"nkamitvaa tividha.m ya~n~nasampada.m so.lasaparikkhaara.m puccheyya''nti.

[03] 329^b^.^eb^ atha kho kuu.tadanto braahma.no khatta.m aamantesi -- ``tena hi, bho khatte, yena khaa.numatakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa tenupasa"nkama. upasa"nkamitvaa khaa.numatake braahma.nagahapatike eva.m vadehi -- `kuu.tadanto, bho, braahma.no evamaaha -- ``aagamentu kira bhavanto, kuu.tadantopi braahma.no sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissatii'''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho so khattaa kuu.tadantassa braahma.nassa pa.tissutvaa yena khaa.numatakaa braahma.nagahapatikaa tenupasa"nkami. upasa"nkamitvaa khaa.numatake braahma.nagahapatike etadavoca -- ``kuu.tadanto, bho, braahma.no evamaaha -- `aagamentu kira bhonto, kuu.tadantopi braahma.no sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissatii'''ti.

[03] 330^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M1.0122^ea^ ^a^V1.0114^ea^ kho pana samayena anekaani braahma.nasataani khaa.numate pa.tivasanti -- ``kuu.tadantassa braahma.nassa mahaaya~n~na.m anubhavissaamaa''ti. assosu.m kho te braahma.naa -- ``kuu.tadanto kira braahma.no sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissatii''ti. atha kho te braahma.naa yena kuu.tadanto braahma.no tenupasa"nkami.msu.

[03] 331^b^.^eb^ upasa"nkamitvaa kuu.tadanta.m braahma.na.m etadavocu.m -- ``sacca.m kira bhava.m kuu.tadanto sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissatii''ti? ``eva.m kho me, bho, hoti -- `ahampi sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya ^a^T1.0165^ea^ upasa"nkamissaamii'''ti.

[03] ``maa bhava.m kuu.tadanto sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkami. na arahati bhava.m kuu.tadanto sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. sace bhava.m kuu.tadanto sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissati, bhoto kuu.tadantassa yaso haayissati, sama.nassa gotamassa yaso abhiva.d.dhissati. yampi bhoto kuu.tadantassa yaso haayissati, sama.nassa gotamassa yaso abhiva.d.dhissati, iminaapa"ngena na arahati bhava.m kuu.tadanto sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. sama.no tveva gotamo arahati bhavanta.m kuu.tadanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m ^a^P1.0130^ea^.

[03] ``bhava~nhi kuu.tadanto ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena. yampi bhava.m kuu.tadanto ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena, iminaapa"ngena na arahati bhava.m kuu.tadanto sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. sama.no tveva gotamo arahati bhavanta.m kuu.tadanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m.
[03] ``bhava~nhi kuu.tadanto a.d.dho mahaddhano mahaabhogo pahuutavittuupakara.no pahuutajaataruuparajato...pe0...

[03] ``bhava~nhi kuu.tadanto ajjhaayako mantadharo ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m padako veyyaakara.no lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo...pe0...

[03] ``bhava~nhi ^a^M1.0123^ea^ ^a^V1.0115^ea^ kuu.tadanto abhiruupo dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato brahmava.n.nii brahmavacchasii akhuddaavakaaso ^a^T1.0166^ea^ dassanaaya...pe0...
[03] ``bhava~nhi kuu.tadanto siilavaa vuddhasiilii vuddhasiilena samannaagato...pe0...
[03] ``bhava~nhi kuu.tadanto kalyaa.navaaco kalyaa.navaakkara.no poriyaa vaacaaya samannaagato vissa.t.thaaya anelagalaaya atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa...pe0...

[03] ``bhava~nhi kuu.tadanto bahuuna.m aacariyapaacariyo tii.ni maa.navakasataani mante vaaceti, bahuu kho pana naanaadisaa naanaajanapadaa maa.navakaa aagacchanti bhoto kuu.tadantassa santike mantatthikaa mante adhiyitukaamaa...pe0...
[03] ``bhava~nhi kuu.tadanto ji.n.no vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto. sama.no gotamo taru.no ceva taru.napabbajito ca...pe0...
[03] ``bhava~nhi kuu.tadanto ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa sakkato garukato maanito puujito apacito...pe0...
[03] ``bhava~nhi kuu.tadanto braahma.nassa pokkharasaatissa sakkato garukato maanito puujito apacito...pe0...

[03] ``bhava~nhi ^a^P1.0131^ea^ kuu.tadanto khaa.numata.m ajjhaavasati sattussada.m sati.naka.t.thodaka.m sadha~n~na.m raajabhogga.m ra~n~naa maagadhena seniyena bimbisaarena dinna.m raajadaaya.m brahmadeyya.m. yampi bhava.m kuu.tadanto khaa.numata.m ajjhaavasati sattussada.m sati.naka.t.thodaka.m sadha~n~na.m raajabhogga.m, ra~n~naa maagadhena seniyena bimbisaarena dinna.m raajadaaya.m brahmadeyya.m, iminaapa"ngena na arahati bhava.m kuu.tadanto sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. sama.notveva gotamo arahati bhavanta.m kuu.tadanta.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu''nti.
[03] 332^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V1.0116^ea^ vutte kuu.tadanto braahma.no te braahma.ne etadavoca --

[03] ``tena ^a^M1.0124^ea^ hi, bho, mamapi su.naatha, yathaa mayameva arahaama ta.m bhavanta.m ^a^T1.0167^ea^ gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m, na tveva arahati so bhava.m gotamo amhaaka.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena. yampi, bho, sama.no gotamo ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena, iminaapa"ngena na arahati so bhava.m gotamo amhaaka.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. atha kho mayameva arahaama ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m.
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo mahanta.m ~naatisa"ngha.m ohaaya pabbajito...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo pahuuta.m hira~n~nasuva.n.na.m ohaaya pabbajito bhuumigata~nca vehaasa.t.tha.m ca...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo daharova samaano yuvaa susukaa.lakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannaagato pa.thamena vayasaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo akaamakaana.m maataapituuna.m assumukhaana.m rudantaana.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo abhiruupo dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato brahmava.n.nii brahmavacchasii akhuddaavakaaso dassanaaya ^a^P1.0132^ea^ ...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo siilavaa ariyasiilii kusalasiilii kusalasiilena samannaagato...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no ^a^V1.0117^ea^ khalu, bho, gotamo kalyaa.navaaco kalyaa.navaakkara.no poriyaa vaacaaya samannaagato vissa.t.thaaya ^a^T1.0168^ea^ anelagalaaya atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no ^a^M1.0125^ea^ khalu, bho, gotamo bahuuna.m aacariyapaacariyo...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo khii.nakaamaraago vigatacaapallo...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo kammavaadii kiriyavaadii apaapapurekkhaaro brahma~n~naaya pajaaya...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo uccaa kulaa pabbajito asambhinnakhattiyakulaa...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo a.d.dhaa kulaa pabbajito mahaddhanaa mahaabhogaa...pe0...
[03] ``sama.na.m khalu, bho, gotama.m tirora.t.thaa tirojanapadaa pa~nha.m pucchitu.m aagacchanti...pe0...
[03] ``sama.na.m khalu, bho, gotama.m anekaani devataasahassaani paa.nehi sara.na.m gataani...pe0...

[03] ``sama.na.m khalu, bho, gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa' ti...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nehi samannaagato...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo ehisvaagatavaadii sakhilo sammodako abbhaaku.tiko uttaanamukho pubbabhaasii...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo catunna.m parisaana.m sakkato garukato maanito puujito apacito...pe0...
[03] ``sama.ne ^a^V1.0118^ea^ khalu, bho, gotame bahuu devaa ca manussaa ca abhippasannaa...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo yasmi.m gaame vaa nigame vaa pa.tivasati na tasmi.m gaame vaa nigame vaa amanussaa manusse vihe.thenti...pe0...

[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo sa"nghii ga.nii ga.naacariyo puthutitthakaraana.m aggamakkhaayati, yathaa kho pana, bho, etesa.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m yathaa ^a^M1.0126^ea^ vaa tathaa vaa yaso samudaagacchati, na ^a^T1.0169^ea^ heva.m sama.nassa gotamassa yaso samudaagato. atha kho anuttaraaya vijjaacara.nasampadaaya sama.nassa gotamassa yaso samudaagato...pe0...
[03] ``sama.na.m khalu, bho, gotama.m raajaa maagadho seniyo bimbisaaro saputto sabhariyo sapariso ^a^P1.0133^ea^ saamacco paa.nehi sara.na.m gato...pe0...
[03] ``sama.na.m khalu, bho, gotama.m raajaa pasenadi kosalo saputto sabhariyo sapariso saamacco paa.nehi sara.na.m gato...pe0...
[03] ``sama.na.m khalu, bho, gotama.m braahma.no pokkharasaati saputto sabhariyo sapariso saamacco paa.nehi sara.na.m gato...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo ra~n~no maagadhassa seniyassa bimbisaarassa sakkato garukato maanito puujito apacito...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa sakkato garukato maanito puujito apacito...pe0...
[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo braahma.nassa pokkharasaatissa sakkato garukato maanito puujito apacito...pe0...

[03] ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo khaa.numata.m anuppatto khaa.numate viharati ambala.t.thikaaya.m. ye kho pana, bho, keci sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa amhaaka.m gaamakhetta.m aagacchanti, atithii no ^a^V1.0119^ea^ te honti. atithii kho panamhehi sakkaatabbaa garukaatabbaa maanetabbaa puujetabbaa apacetabbaa. yampi, bho, sama.no gotamo khaa.numata.m anuppatto khaa.numate viharati ambala.t.thikaaya.m, atithimhaaka.m sama.no gotamo. atithi kho panamhehi sakkaatabbo garukaatabbo maanetabbo puujetabbo apacetabbo. iminaapa"ngena naarahati so bhava.m gotamo amhaaka.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. atha kho mayameva arahaama ^a^T1.0170^ea^ ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m. ettake kho aha.m, bho, tassa bhoto gotamassa va.n.ne pariyaapu.naami, no ca kho so bhava.m gotamo ettakava.n.no. aparimaa.nava.n.no hi so bhava.m gotamo''ti.

[03] 333^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0127^ea^ vutte, te braahma.naa kuu.tadanta.m braahma.na.m etadavocu.m -- ``yathaa kho bhava.m kuu.tadanto sama.nassa gotamassa va.n.ne bhaasati, ito cepi so bhava.m gotamo yojanasate viharati, alameva saddhena kulaputtena dassanaaya upasa"nkamitu.m api pu.tosenaa''ti. ``tena hi, bho, sabbeva maya.m sama.na.m gotama.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamissaamaa''ti.

[03] 334^b^.^eb^ atha kho kuu.tadanto braahma.no mahataa braahma.naga.nena saddhi.m yena ambala.t.thikaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi ^a^P1.0134^ea^. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. khaa.numatakaapi kho braahma.nagahapatikaa appekacce bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu; appekacce bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.msu, sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu; appekacce yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu; appekacce naamagotta.m saavetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu; appekacce tu.nhiibhuutaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu.

[03] 335^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m nisinno kho kuu.tadanto braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bho gotama -- `sama.no gotamo tividha.m ya~n~nasampada.m so.lasaparikkhaara.m jaanaatii'ti. na kho panaaha.m jaanaami tividha.m ya~n~nasampada.m so.lasaparikkhaara.m. icchaami caaha.m mahaaya~n~na.m ^a^T1.0171^ea^ yajitu.m. saadhu me bhava.m gotamo tividha.m ya~n~nasampada.m so.lasaparikkhaara.m desetuu''ti.

[03] 336^b^.^eb^ ``tena hi, braahma.na, su.naahi saadhuka.m manasikarohi, bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho kuu.tadanto braahma.no bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``bhuutapubba.m, braahma.na ^a^V1.0120^ea^, raajaa mahaavijito naama ahosi a.d.dho mahaddhano mahaabhogo pahuutajaataruuparajato pahuutavittuupakara.no pahuutadhanadha~n~no paripu.n.nakosako.t.thaagaaro. atha kho, braahma.na, ra~n~no mahaavijitassa rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `adhigataa kho me vipulaa maanusakaa bhogaa, mahanta.m pathavima.n.dala.m abhivijiya ajjhaavasaami ^a^M1.0128^ea^, ya.mnuunaaha.m mahaaya~n~na.m yajeyya.m, ya.m mama assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa'ti.

[03] 337^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, braahma.na, raajaa mahaavijito purohita.m braahma.na.m aamantetvaa etadavoca -- `idha mayha.m, braahma.na, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- adhigataa kho me vipulaa maanusakaa bhogaa ^a^P1.0135^ea^, mahanta.m pathavima.n.dala.m abhivijiya ajjhaavasaami. ya.mnuunaaha.m mahaaya~n~na.m yajeyya.m ya.m mama assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa'ti. icchaamaha.m, braahma.na, mahaaya~n~na.m yajitu.m. anusaasatu ma.m bhava.m ya.m mama assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa'''ti.

[03] 338^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m vutte, braahma.na, purohito braahma.no raajaana.m mahaavijita.m etadavoca -- `bhoto kho ra~n~no janapado saka.n.tako sauppii.lo, gaamaghaataapi dissanti, nigamaghaataapi dissanti, nagaraghaataapi dissanti ^a^T1.0172^ea^, panthaduhanaapi dissanti. bhava.m kho pana raajaa eva.m saka.n.take janapade sauppii.le balimuddhareyya, akiccakaarii assa tena bhava.m raajaa. siyaa kho pana bhoto ra~n~no evamassa -- ``ahameta.m dassukhiila.m vadhena vaa bandhena vaa jaaniyaa vaa garahaaya vaa pabbaajanaaya vaa samuuhanissaamii''ti, na kho panetassa dassukhiilassa eva.m sammaa samugghaato hoti. ye te hataavasesakaa bhavissanti, te pacchaa ra~n~no janapada.m vihe.thessanti. api ca kho ida.m sa.mvidhaana.m aagamma evametassa dassukhiilassa sammaa samugghaato hoti. tena hi bhava.m raajaa ye bhoto ra~n~no janapade ussahanti kasigorakkhe, tesa.m bhava.m raajaa biijabhatta.m anuppadetu. ye bhoto ra~n~no janapade ussahanti vaa.nijjaaya, tesa.m bhava.m raajaa paabhata.m anuppadetu. ye bhoto ra~n~no janapade ussahanti raajaporise, tesa.m bhava.m raajaa bhattavetana.m pakappetu. te ca manussaa sakammapasutaa ra~n~no janapada.m na vihe.thessanti; mahaa ca ra~n~no raasiko bhavissati. khema.t.thitaa janapadaa aka.n.takaa anuppii.laa. manussaa mudaa modamaanaa ure putte naccentaa apaarutagharaa ma~n~ne viharissantii'ti. `eva.m, bho'ti kho, braahma.na, raajaa mahaavijito purohitassa braahma.nassa pa.tissutvaa ye ra~n~no janapade ussahi.msu ^a^P1.0136^ea^ kasigorakkhe, tesa.m raajaa mahaavijito biijabhatta.m anuppadaasi. ye ^a^M1.0129^ea^ ca ra~n~no janapade ussahi.msu vaa.nijjaaya, tesa.m raajaa mahaavijito paabhata.m anuppadaasi. ye ca ra~n~no janapade ^a^T1.0173^ea^ ussahi.msu ^a^V1.0121^ea^ raajaporise, tesa.m raajaa mahaavijito bhattavetana.m pakappesi. te ca manussaa sakammapasutaa ra~n~no janapada.m na vihe.thi.msu, mahaa ca ra~n~no raasiko ahosi. khema.t.thitaa janapadaa aka.n.takaa anuppii.laa manussaa mudaa modamaanaa ure putte naccentaa apaarutagharaa ma~n~ne vihari.msu. atha kho, braahma.na, raajaa mahaavijito purohita.m braahma.na.m aamantetvaa etadavoca -- `samuuhato kho me bhoto dassukhiilo, bhoto sa.mvidhaana.m aagamma mahaa ca me raasiko. khema.t.thitaa janapadaa aka.n.takaa anuppii.laa manussaa mudaa modamaanaa ure putte naccentaa apaarutagharaa ma~n~ne viharanti. icchaamaha.m braahma.na mahaaya~n~na.m yajitu.m. anusaasatu ma.m bhava.m ya.m mama assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa'ti.

[03] 339^b^.^eb^ ``tena hi bhava.m raajaa ye bhoto ra~n~no janapade khattiyaa aanuyantaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca te bhava.m raajaa aamantayata.m -- `icchaamaha.m, bho, mahaaya~n~na.m yajitu.m, anujaanantu me bhavanto ya.m mama assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa'ti. ye bhoto ra~n~no janapade amaccaa paarisajjaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca...pe0... braahma.namahaasaalaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca...pe0... gahapatinecayikaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca, te bhava.m raajaa aamantayata.m -- `icchaamaha.m, bho, mahaaya~n~na.m yajitu.m, anujaanantu me bhavanto ya.m mama assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa'ti. `eva.m, bho'ti kho, braahma.na, raajaa mahaavijito purohitassa braahma.nassa pa.tissutvaa ^a^T1.0174^ea^ ye ra~n~no janapade khattiyaa aanuyantaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca, te raajaa mahaavijito aamantesi ^a^P1.0137^ea^ -- `icchaamaha.m, bho, mahaaya~n~na.m yajitu.m, anujaanantu me bhavanto ya.m mama assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti. `yajata.m bhava.m raajaa ya~n~na.m, ya~n~nakaalo mahaaraajaa'ti. ye ra~n~no janapade amaccaa paarisajjaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca...pe0... braahma.namahaasaalaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca...pe0... gahapatinecayikaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca, te raajaa mahaavijito aamantesi -- `icchaamaha.m, bho ^a^M1.0130^ea^, mahaaya~n~na.m yajitu.m. anujaanantu me bhavanto ya.m mama assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa'ti. `yajata.m bhava.m raajaa ya~n~na.m, ya~n~nakaalo mahaaraajaa'ti. itime cattaaro anumatipakkhaa tasseva ya~n~nassa parikkhaaraa bhavanti.

[03] 340^b^.^eb^ ``raajaa ^a^V1.0122^ea^ mahaavijito a.t.thaha"ngehi samannaagato, ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena abhiruupo dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato brahmava.n.nii brahmavacchasii akhuddaavakaaso dassanaaya; a.d.dho mahaddhano mahaabhogo pahuutajaataruuparajato pahuutavittuupakara.no pahuutadhanadha~n~no paripu.n.nakosako.t.thaagaaro; balavaa catura"nginiyaa senaaya samannaagato assavaaya ovaadapa.tikaraaya sahati {patapati (sii0 pii0), tapati (syaa0)} ma~n~ne paccatthike yasasaa; saddho daayako daanapati anaava.tadvaaro sama.nabraahma.nakapa.naddhikava.nibbakayaacakaana.m opaanabhuuto pu~n~naani karoti; bahussuto tassa tassa sutajaatassa, tassa tasseva ^a^T1.0175^ea^ kho pana bhaasitassa attha.m jaanaati `aya.m imassa bhaasitassa attho aya.m imassa bhaasitassa attho'ti; pa.n.dito, viyatto, medhaavii, pa.tibalo, atiitaanaagatapaccuppanne atthe cintetu.m. raajaa mahaavijito imehi a.t.thaha"ngehi samannaagato. iti imaanipi a.t.tha"ngaani tasseva ya~n~nassa parikkhaaraa bhavanti.

[03] 341^b^.^eb^ ``purohito ^a^P1.0138^ea^ {purohitopi (ka0 sii0 ka0)} braahma.no catuha"ngehi samannaagato. ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena; ajjhaayako mantadharo ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m padako veyyaakara.no lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo; siilavaa vuddhasiilii vuddhasiilena ^a^M1.0131^ea^ samannaagato; pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii pa.thamo vaa dutiyo vaa suja.m pagga.nhantaana.m. purohito braahma.no imehi catuuha"ngehi samannaagato. iti imaani cattaari a"ngaani tasseva ya~n~nassa parikkhaaraa bhavanti.

[03] 342^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, braahma.na, purohito braahma.no ra~n~no mahaavijitassa pubbeva ya~n~naa tisso vidhaa desesi. siyaa kho pana bhoto ra~n~no mahaaya~n~na.m ^a^T1.0176^ea^ yi.t.thukaamassa {yi.t.thakaamassa (ka0)} kocideva vippa.tisaaro -- `mahaa vata me bhogakkhandho vigacchissatii'ti, so bhotaa ra~n~naa vippa.tisaaro na kara.niiyo. siyaa kho pana bhoto ra~n~no mahaaya~n~na.m yajamaanassa kocideva vippa.tisaaro -- `mahaa ^a^V1.0123^ea^ vata me bhogakkhandho vigacchatii'ti, so bhotaa ra~n~naa vippa.tisaaro na kara.niiyo. siyaa kho pana bhoto ra~n~no mahaaya~n~na.m yi.t.thassa kocideva vippa.tisaaro -- `mahaa vata me bhogakkhandho vigato'ti, so bhotaa ra~n~naa vippa.tisaaro na kara.niiyo''ti. imaa kho, braahma.na, purohito braahma.no ra~n~no mahaavijitassa pubbeva ya~n~naa tisso vidhaa desesi.

[03] 343^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, braahma.na, purohito braahma.no ra~n~no mahaavijitassa pubbeva ya~n~naa dasahaakaarehi pa.tiggaahakesu vippa.tisaara.m pa.tivinesi. `aagamissanti kho bhoto ya~n~na.m paa.naatipaatinopi paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirataapi. ye tattha paa.naatipaatino, tesa~n~neva tena. ye tattha paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirataa, te aarabbha yajata.m bhava.m, sajjata.m bhava.m, modata.m bhava.m, cittameva bhava.m antara.m pasaadetu. aagamissanti kho bhoto ya~n~na.m adinnaadaayinopi adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirataapi...pe0... ^a^T1.0177^ea^ kaamesu micchaacaarinopi kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirataapi... musaavaadinopi musaavaadaa pa.tivirataapi... pisu.navaacinopi pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirataapi... pharusavaacinopi pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirataapi... samphappalaapinopi samphappalaapaa ^a^M1.0132^ea^ pa.tivirataapi ^a^P1.0139^ea^... abhijjhaalunopi anabhijjhaalunopi... byaapannacittaapi abyaapannacittaapi... micchaadi.t.thikaapi sammaadi.t.thikaapi.... ye tattha micchaadi.t.thikaa, tesa~n~neva tena. ye tattha sammaadi.t.thikaa, te aarabbha yajata.m bhava.m, sajjata.m bhava.m, modata.m bhava.m, cittameva bhava.m antara.m pasaadetuu'ti. imehi kho, braahma.na, purohito braahma.no ra~n~no mahaavijitassa pubbeva ya~n~naa dasahaakaarehi pa.tiggaahakesu vippa.tisaara.m pa.tivinesi.

[03] 344^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, braahma.na, purohito braahma.no ra~n~no mahaavijitassa mahaaya~n~na.m yajamaanassa so.lasahaakaarehi citta.m sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi siyaa kho pana bhoto ra~n~no mahaaya~n~na.m yajamaanassa kocideva vattaa -- `raajaa kho mahaavijito mahaaya~n~na.m yajati, no ca kho tassa aamantitaa khattiyaa aanuyantaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca; atha ca pana bhava.m raajaa evaruupa.m mahaaya~n~na.m yajatii'ti ^a^T1.0179^ea^. evampi bhoto ra~n~no vattaa dhammato natthi. bhotaa kho pana ra~n~naa aamantitaa khattiyaa aanuyantaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca ^a^V1.0124^ea^. iminaapeta.m bhava.m raajaa jaanaatu, yajata.m bhava.m, sajjata.m bhava.m, modata.m bhava.m, cittameva bhava.m antara.m pasaadetu.

[03] ``siyaa kho pana bhoto ra~n~no mahaaya~n~na.m yajamaanassa kocideva vattaa -- `raajaa kho mahaavijito mahaaya~n~na.m yajati, no ca kho tassa aamantitaa amaccaa paarisajjaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca...pe0... braahma.namahaasaalaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca...pe0... gahapatinecayikaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca, atha ca pana bhava.m raajaa evaruupa.m mahaaya~n~na.m yajatii'ti. evampi bhoto ra~n~no vattaa dhammato natthi. bhotaa kho pana ra~n~naa aamantitaa gahapatinecayikaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca. iminaapeta.m bhava.m raajaa jaanaatu, yajata.m bhava.m, sajjata.m bhava.m, modata.m bhava.m, cittameva bhava.m antara.m pasaadetu.

[03] ``siyaa kho pana bhoto ra~n~no mahaaya~n~na.m yajamaanassa kocideva vattaa -- `raajaa kho mahaavijito mahaaya~n~na.m yajati, no ca kho ubhato ^a^M1.0133^ea^ sujaato maatito ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena, atha ca pana bhava.m raajaa evaruupa.m mahaaya~n~na.m yajatii'ti. evampi bhoto ra~n~no vattaa dhammato natthi. bhava.m kho pana raajaa ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa ^a^P1.0140^ea^ ^a^T1.0180^ea^ akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena. iminaapeta.m bhava.m raajaa jaanaatu, yajata.m bhava.m, sajjata.m bhava.m, modata.m bhava.m, cittameva bhava.m antara.m pasaadetu.

[03] ``siyaa kho pana bhoto ra~n~no mahaaya~n~na.m yajamaanassa kocideva vattaa -- `raajaa kho mahaavijito mahaaya~n~na.m yajati no ca kho abhiruupo dassaniiyo paasaadiko paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato brahmava.n.nii brahmavacchasii akhuddaavakaaso dassanaaya...pe0... no ca kho a.d.dho mahaddhano mahaabhogo pahuutajaataruuparajato pahuutavittuupakara.no pahuutadhanadha~n~no paripu.n.nakosako.t.thaagaaro...pe0... no ca kho balavaa catura"nginiyaa senaaya samannaagato assavaaya ovaadapa.tikaraaya sahati ma~n~ne paccatthike yasasaa...pe0... no ca kho saddho daayako daanapati anaava.tadvaaro sama.nabraahma.nakapa.naddhikava.nibbakayaacakaana.m opaanabhuuto pu~n~naani karoti...pe0... no ca kho bahussuto tassa tassa sutajaatassa...pe0... no ca kho tassa tasseva kho pana bhaasitassa attha.m jaanaati ``aya.m imassa bhaasitassa attho, aya.m imassa bhaasitassa attho''ti...pe0... no ca kho pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii pa.tibalo atiitaanaagatapaccuppanne atthe cintetu.m, atha ca pana bhava.m raajaa evaruupa.m mahaaya~n~na.m yajatii'ti ^a^V1.0125^ea^. evampi bhoto ra~n~no vattaa dhammato natthi. bhava.m kho pana raajaa pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii pa.tibalo atiitaanaagatapaccuppanne atthe cintetu.m. iminaapeta.m bhava.m raajaa jaanaatu ^a^T1.0181^ea^, yajata.m bhava.m, sajjata.m bhava.m, modata.m bhava.m, cittameva bhava.m antara.m pasaadetu.

[03] ``siyaa kho pana bhoto ra~n~no mahaaya~n~na.m yajamaanassa kocideva vattaa -- `raajaa kho mahaavijito mahaaya~n~na.m yajati. no ca khvassa purohito braahma.no ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko ^a^M1.0134^ea^ yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena; atha ca pana bhava.m raajaa evaruupa.m mahaaya~n~na.m yajatii'ti. evampi ^a^P1.0141^ea^ bhoto ra~n~no vattaa dhammato natthi. bhoto kho pana ra~n~no purohito braahma.no ubhato sujaato maatito ca pitito ca sa.msuddhagaha.niko yaava sattamaa pitaamahayugaa akkhitto anupakku.t.tho jaativaadena. iminaapeta.m bhava.m raajaa jaanaatu, yajata.m bhava.m, sajjata.m bhava.m, modata.m bhava.m, cittameva bhava.m antara.m pasaadetu.

[03] ``siyaa kho pana bhoto ra~n~no mahaaya~n~na.m yajamaanassa kocideva vattaa -- `raajaa kho mahaavijito mahaaya~n~na.m yajati. no ca khvassa purohito braahma.no ajjhaayako mantadharo ti.n.na.m vedaana.m paaraguu sanigha.n.duke.tubhaana.m saakkharappabhedaana.m itihaasapa~ncamaana.m padako veyyaakara.no lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo...pe0... no ca khvassa purohito braahma.no siilavaa vuddhasiilii vuddhasiilena samannaagato...pe0... no ca khvassa purohito braahma.no pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii pa.thamo vaa dutiyo vaa suja.m pagga.nhantaana.m, atha ca pana bhava.m raajaa ^a^T1.0182^ea^ evaruupa.m mahaaya~n~na.m yajatii'ti. evampi bhoto ra~n~no vattaa dhammato natthi. bhoto kho pana ra~n~no purohito braahma.no pa.n.dito viyatto medhaavii pa.thamo vaa dutiyo vaa suja.m pagga.nhantaana.m. iminaapeta.m bhava.m raajaa jaanaatu, yajata.m bhava.m, sajjata.m bhava.m, modata.m bhava.m, cittameva bhava.m antara.m pasaadetuuti. imehi kho, braahma.na, purohito braahma.no ra~n~no mahaavijitassa mahaaya~n~na.m yajamaanassa so.lasahi aakaarehi citta.m sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi.

[03] 345^b^.^eb^ ``tasmi.m kho, braahma.na, ya~n~ne neva gaavo ha~n~ni.msu, na aje.lakaa ha~n~ni.msu, na kukku.tasuukaraa ha~n~ni.msu, na vividhaa paa.naa sa.mghaata.m aapajji.msu, na rukkhaa chijji.msu yuupatthaaya, na dabbhaa luuyi.msu barihisatthaaya {parihi.msatthaaya (syaa0 ka0 sii0 ka0), parahi.msatthaaya (ka0)}. yepissa ahesu.m daasaati vaa pessaati vaa kammakaraati vaa, tepi na da.n.datajjitaa na ^a^M1.0135^ea^ bhayatajjitaa na assumukhaa rudamaanaa parikammaani ^a^V1.0126^ea^ aka.msu. atha kho ye icchi.msu, te aka.msu, ye na icchi.msu, na te aka.msu; ya.m icchi.msu, ta.m aka.msu, ya.m na icchi.msu, na ta.m aka.msu. sappitelanavaniitadadhimadhuphaa.nitena ceva so ya~n~no ni.t.thaanamagamaasi.

[03] 346^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^P1.0142^ea^ kho, braahma.na, khattiyaa aanuyantaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca, amaccaa paarisajjaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca, braahma.namahaasaalaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca, gahapatinecayikaa negamaa ^a^T1.0183^ea^ ceva jaanapadaa ca pahuuta.m saapateyya.m aadaaya raajaana.m mahaavijita.m upasa"nkamitvaa evamaaha.msu -- `ida.m, deva, pahuuta.m saapateyya.m deva~n~neva uddissaabhata.m, ta.m devo pa.tigga.nhaatuu'ti. `ala.m, bho, mamaapida.m pahuuta.m saapateyya.m dhammikena balinaa abhisa"nkhata.m; ta~nca vo hotu, ito ca bhiyyo harathaa'ti. te ra~n~naa pa.tikkhittaa ekamanta.m apakkamma eva.m samacintesu.m -- `na kho eta.m amhaaka.m patiruupa.m, ya.m maya.m imaani saapateyyaani punadeva sakaani gharaani pa.tihareyyaama. raajaa kho mahaavijito mahaaya~n~na.m yajati, handassa maya.m anuyaagino homaa'ti.

[03] 347^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, braahma.na, puratthimena ya~n~navaa.tassa {ya~n~naavaa.tassa (sii0 pii0 ka0)} khattiyaa aanuyantaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca daanaani pa.t.thapesu.m. dakkhi.nena ya~n~navaa.tassa amaccaa paarisajjaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca daanaani pa.t.thapesu.m. pacchimena ya~n~navaa.tassa braahma.namahaasaalaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca daanaani pa.t.thapesu.m. uttarena ya~n~navaa.tassa gahapatinecayikaa negamaa ceva jaanapadaa ca daanaani pa.t.thapesu.m.

[03] ``tesupi kho, braahma.na, ya~n~nesu neva gaavo ha~n~ni.msu, na aje.lakaa ha~n~ni.msu, na kukku.tasuukaraa ha~n~ni.msu, na vividhaa paa.naa sa.mghaata.m aapajji.msu, na rukkhaa chijji.msu yuupatthaaya, na dabbhaa luuyi.msu barihisatthaaya. yepi nesa.m ahesu.m daasaati vaa pessaati vaa kammakaraati vaa, tepi na da.n.datajjitaa na bhayatajjitaa na assumukhaa rudamaanaa parikammaani ^a^T1.0184^ea^ aka.msu. atha kho ye icchi.msu, te aka.msu, ye na icchi.msu, na te aka.msu; ya.m icchi.msu, ta.m aka.msu, ya.m na icchi.msu na ta.m aka.msu. sappitelanavaniitadadhimadhuphaa.nitena ceva te ya~n~naa ni.t.thaanamagama.msu.

[03] ``iti ^a^M1.0136^ea^ ^a^P1.0143^ea^ cattaaro ca anumatipakkhaa, raajaa mahaavijito a.t.thaha"ngehi samannaagato, purohito ^a^V1.0127^ea^ braahma.no catuuha"ngehi samannaagato; tisso ca vidhaa aya.m vuccati braahma.na tividhaa ya~n~nasampadaa so.lasaparikkhaaraa''ti.

[03] 348^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, te braahma.naa unnaadino uccaasaddamahaasaddaa ahesu.m -- ``aho ya~n~no, aho ya~n~nasampadaa''ti! kuu.tadanto pana braahma.no tuu.nhiibhuutova nisinno hoti. atha kho te braahma.naa kuu.tadanta.m braahma.na.m etadavocu.m -- ``kasmaa pana bhava.m kuu.tadanto sama.nassa gotamassa subhaasita.m subhaasitato naabbhanumodatii''ti? ``naaha.m, bho, sama.nassa gotamassa subhaasita.m subhaasitato naabbhanumodaami. muddhaapi tassa vipateyya, yo sama.nassa gotamassa subhaasita.m subhaasitato naabbhanumodeyya. api ca me, bho, eva.m hoti -- sama.no gotamo na evamaaha -- `eva.m me suta'nti vaa `eva.m arahati bhavitu'nti vaa; api ca sama.no gotamo -- `eva.m tadaa aasi, ittha.m tadaa aasi' tveva bhaasati. tassa mayha.m bho eva.m hoti -- `addhaa sama.no gotamo tena samayena raajaa vaa ahosi mahaavijito ya~n~nassaami purohito vaa braahma.no tassa ya~n~nassa yaajetaa'ti. abhijaanaati pana bhava.m gotamo evaruupa.m ya~n~na.m yajitvaa vaa ^a^T1.0185^ea^ yaajetvaa vaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjitaati''? ``abhijaanaamaha.m, braahma.na, evaruupa.m ya~n~na.m yajitvaa vaa yaajetvaa vaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjitaa, aha.m tena samayena purohito braahma.no ahosi.m tassa ya~n~nassa yaajetaa''ti.

[03] 349^b^.^eb^ ``atthi pana, bho gotama, a~n~no ya~n~no imaaya tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya {tividhaya~n~nasampadaaya (ka0)} so.lasaparikkhaaraaya appa.t.thataro {appatthataro (syaa0 ka.m0)} ca appasamaarambhataro {appasamaarabbhataro (sii0 pii0 ka0)} ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro caa''ti?

[03] ``atthi ^a^M1.0137^ea^ ^a^P1.0144^ea^ kho, braahma.na, a~n~no ya~n~no imaaya tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya so.lasaparikkhaaraaya appa.t.thataro ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro caa''ti.

[03] ``katamo pana so, bho gotama, ya~n~no imaaya tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya so.lasaparikkhaaraaya ^a^V1.0128^ea^ appa.t.thataro ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro caa''ti?

[03] ``yaani kho pana taani, braahma.na, niccadaanaani anukulaya~n~naani siilavante pabbajite uddissa diyyanti; aya.m kho, braahma.na, ya~n~no imaaya tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya so.lasaparikkhaaraaya appa.t.thataro ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro caa''ti.

[03] ``ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo, yena ta.m niccadaana.m anukulaya~n~na.m imaaya tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya so.lasaparikkhaaraaya appa.t.thatara~nca appasamaarambhatara~nca mahapphalatara~nca mahaanisa.msatara~ncaa''ti ^a^T1.0186^ea^?

[03] ``na kho, braahma.na, evaruupa.m ya~n~na.m upasa"nkamanti arahanto vaa arahattamagga.m vaa samaapannaa. ta.m kissa hetu? dissanti hettha, braahma.na, da.n.dappahaaraapi galaggahaapi, tasmaa evaruupa.m ya~n~na.m na upasa"nkamanti arahanto vaa arahattamagga.m vaa samaapannaa. yaani kho pana taani, braahma.na, niccadaanaani anukulaya~n~naani siilavante pabbajite uddissa diyyanti; evaruupa.m kho, braahma.na, ya~n~na.m upasa"nkamanti arahanto vaa arahattamagga.m vaa samaapannaa. ta.m kissa hetu? na hettha, braahma.na, dissanti da.n.dappahaaraapi galaggahaapi, tasmaa evaruupa.m ya~n~na.m upasa"nkamanti arahanto vaa arahattamagga.m vaa samaapannaa. aya.m kho, braahma.na, hetu aya.m paccayo, yena ta.m niccadaana.m anukulaya~n~na.m imaaya tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya so.lasaparikkhaaraaya appa.t.thatara~nca appasamaarambhatara~nca mahapphalatara~nca mahaanisa.msatara~ncaa''ti.

[03] 350^b^.^eb^ ``atthi pana, bho gotama, a~n~no ya~n~no imaaya ca tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya so.lasaparikkhaaraaya iminaa ca niccadaanena anukulaya~n~nena appa.t.thataro ca appasamaarambhataro ^a^P1.0145^ea^ ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro caa''ti?

[03] ``atthi ^a^M1.0138^ea^ kho, braahma.na, a~n~no ya~n~no imaaya ca tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya so.lasaparikkhaaraaya iminaa ca niccadaanena anukulaya~n~nena appa.t.thataro ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro caa''ti.

[03] ``katamo ^a^V1.0129^ea^ pana so, bho gotama, ya~n~no imaaya ca tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya so.lasaparikkhaaraaya iminaa ca niccadaanena anukulaya~n~nena appa.t.thataro ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro caa''ti?

[03] ``yo kho, braahma.na, caatuddisa.m sa"ngha.m uddissa vihaara.m karoti, aya.m kho ^a^T1.0187^ea^, braahma.na, ya~n~no imaaya ca tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya so.lasaparikkhaaraaya iminaa ca niccadaanena anukulaya~n~nena appa.t.thataro ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro caa''ti.

[03] 351^b^.^eb^ ``atthi pana, bho gotama, a~n~no ya~n~no imaaya ca tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya so.lasaparikkhaaraaya iminaa ca niccadaanena anukulaya~n~nena iminaa ca vihaaradaanena appa.t.thataro ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro caa''ti?

[03] ``atthi kho, braahma.na, a~n~no ya~n~no imaaya ca tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya so.lasaparikkhaaraaya iminaa ca niccadaanena anukulaya~n~nena iminaa ca vihaaradaanena appa.t.thataro ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro caa''ti.

[03] ``katamo pana so, bho gotama, ya~n~no imaaya ca tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya so.lasaparikkhaaraaya iminaa ca niccadaanena anukulaya~n~nena iminaa ca vihaaradaanena appa.t.thataro ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro caa''ti?

[03] ``yo kho, braahma.na, pasannacitto buddha.m sara.na.m gacchati, dhamma.m sara.na.m gacchati, sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gacchati; aya.m kho, braahma.na, ya~n~no imaaya ca tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya so.lasaparikkhaaraaya iminaa ca niccadaanena anukulaya~n~nena iminaa ca vihaaradaanena appa.t.thataro ^a^P1.0146^ea^ ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro caa''ti.

[03] 352^b^.^eb^ ``atthi ^a^M1.0139^ea^ pana, bho gotama, a~n~no ya~n~no imaaya ca tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya so.lasaparikkhaaraaya iminaa ca niccadaanena anukulaya~n~nena iminaa ca vihaaradaanena imehi ca sara.nagamanehi appa.t.thataro ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro caa''ti?

[03] ``atthi ^a^V1.0130^ea^ kho, braahma.na, a~n~no ya~n~no imaaya ca tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya so.lasaparikkhaaraaya iminaa ca niccadaanena anukulaya~n~nena iminaa ca vihaaradaanena imehi ca sara.nagamanehi appa.t.thataro ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro caa''ti.

[03] ``katamo pana so, bho gotama, ya~n~no imaaya ca tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya so.lasaparikkhaaraaya iminaa ca niccadaanena anukulaya~n~nena iminaa ca vihaaradaanena imehi ca sara.nagamanehi appa.t.thataro ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro caa''ti?

[03] ``yo kho, braahma.na, pasannacitto sikkhaapadaani samaadiyati -- paa.naatipaataa verama.ni.m, adinnaadaanaa verama.ni.m, kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.ni.m, musaavaadaa verama.ni.m, suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa verama.ni.m. aya.m kho, braahma.na, ya~n~no ^a^T1.0188^ea^ imaaya ca tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya so.lasaparikkhaaraaya iminaa ca niccadaanena anukulaya~n~nena iminaa ca vihaaradaanena imehi ca sara.nagamanehi appa.t.thataro ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro caa''ti.

[03] 353^b^.^eb^ ``atthi pana, bho gotama, a~n~no ya~n~no imaaya ca tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya so.lasaparikkhaaraaya iminaa ca niccadaanena anukulaya~n~nena iminaa ca vihaaradaanena imehi ca sara.nagamanehi imehi ca sikkhaapadehi appa.t.thataro ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro caa''ti?

[03] ``atthi kho, braahma.na, a~n~no ya~n~no imaaya ca tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya so.lasaparikkhaaraaya iminaa ca niccadaanena anukulaya~n~nena iminaa ca vihaaradaanena imehi ca sara.nagamanehi imehi ca sikkhaapadehi appa.t.thataro ^a^M1.0140^ea^ ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro caa''ti.

[03] ``katamo ^a^P1.0147^ea^ pana so, bho gotama, ya~n~no imaaya ca tividhaaya ya~n~nasampadaaya so.lasaparikkhaaraaya iminaa ca niccadaanena anukulaya~n~nena iminaa ca vihaaradaanena imehi ca ^a^V1.0131^ea^ sara.nagamanehi imehi ca sikkhaapadehi appa.t.thataro ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro caa''ti?

[03] ``idha, braahma.na, tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho...pe0... (yathaa 190-212 anucchedesu, eva.m vitthaaretabba.m). eva.m kho, braahma.na, bhikkhu siilasampanno hoti...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m kho, braahma.na, ya~n~no purimehi ya~n~nehi appa.t.thataro ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro ^a^T1.0189^ea^ ca...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ayampi kho, braahma.na, ya~n~no purimehi ya~n~nehi appa.t.thataro ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro caati. ~naa.nadassanaaya citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti...pe0... ayampi kho, braahma.na, ya~n~no purimehi ya~n~nehi appa.t.thataro ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro ca...pe0... ^a^V1.0132^ea^ naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaati. ayampi kho, braahma.na, ya~n~no purimehi ya~n~nehi appa.t.thataro ca appasamaarambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahaanisa.msataro ca. imaaya ca, braahma.na, ya~n~nasampadaaya a~n~naa ya~n~nasampadaa uttaritaraa vaa pa.niitataraa vaa natthii''ti.

[03] 354^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, kuu.tadanto braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! seyyathaapi bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti; evameva.m bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo ^a^M1.0141^ea^ pakaasito. esaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata.m. esaaha.m bho gotama ^a^P1.0148^ea^ satta ca usabhasataani satta ca vacchatarasataani satta ca vacchatariisataani satta ca ajasataani satta ca urabbhasataani mu~ncaami, jiivita.m demi, haritaani ceva ti.naani khaadantu, siitaani ca paaniiyaani pivantu, siito ca nesa.m vaato upavaayatuu''ti.

[03] 355^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa kuu.tadantassa braahma.nassa anupubbi.m katha.m kathesi, seyyathida.m, daanakatha.m siilakatha.m saggakatha.m; kaamaana.m aadiinava.m okaara.m sa.mkilesa.m ^a^T1.0190^ea^ nekkhamme aanisa.msa.m pakaasesi. yadaa bhagavaa a~n~naasi kuu.tadanta.m braahma.na.m kallacitta.m muducitta.m viniivara.nacitta.m udaggacitta.m pasannacitta.m, atha yaa buddhaana.m saamukka.msikaa dhammadesanaa, ta.m pakaasesi -- dukkha.m samudaya.m nirodha.m magga.m. seyyathaapi naama suddha.m vattha.m apagatakaa.laka.m sammadeva rajana.m pa.tigga.nheyya, evameva ^a^V1.0133^ea^ kuu.tadantassa braahma.nassa tasmi~n~neva aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ``ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti.

[03] 356^b^.^eb^ atha kho kuu.tadanto braahma.no di.t.thadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogaa.lhadhammo ti.n.navicikiccho vigatakatha.mkatho vesaarajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusaasane bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu me bhava.m gotamo svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] 357^b^.^eb^ atha kho kuu.tadanto braahma.no bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho kuu.tadanto braahma.no tassaa rattiyaa accayena sake ya~n~navaa.te pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa bhagavato kaala.m aarocaapesi -- ``kaalo, bho gotama; ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti.

[03] 358^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M1.0142^ea^ kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena yena kuu.tadantassa braahma.nassa ya~n~navaa.to tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi.

[03] atha kho kuu.tadanto braahma.no ^a^P1.0149^ea^ ^a^T1.0191^ea^ buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi. atha kho kuu.tadanto braahma.no bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m a~n~natara.m niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho kuu.tadanta.m braahma.na.m bhagavaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaamiiti.
[06] kuu.tadantasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa~ncama.m.

[03] 359^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0143^ea^ ^a^V1.0134^ea^ ^a^P1.0150^ea^ ^a^T1.0192^ea^ me suta.m -- ueka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa kosalakaa ca braahma.naduutaa maagadhakaa ca braahma.naduutaa vesaaliya.m pa.tivasanti kenacideva kara.niiyena. assosu.m kho te kosalakaa ca braahma.naduutaa maagadhakaa ca braahma.naduutaa -- ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m hotii''ti.

[03] 360^b^.^eb^ atha kho te kosalakaa ca braahma.naduutaa maagadhakaa ca braahma.naduutaa yena mahaavana.m kuu.taagaarasaalaa tenupasa"nkami.msu. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa naagito bhagavato upa.t.thaako hoti. atha kho te kosalakaa ca braahma.naduutaa maagadhakaa ca braahma.naduutaa yenaayasmaa naagito tenupasa"nkami.msu. upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m naagita.m etadavocu.m -- ``kaha.m nu kho, bho naagita, etarahi so bhava.m gotamo viharati? dassanakaamaa hi maya.m ta.m bhavanta.m gotama''nti. ``akaalo ^a^P1.0151^ea^ kho, aavuso, bhagavanta.m dassanaaya, pa.tisalliino bhagavaa''ti. atha kho te kosalakaa ca braahma.naduutaa maagadhakaa ca braahma.naduutaa tattheva ekamanta.m ^a^T1.0193^ea^ nisiidi.msu -- ``disvaava maya.m ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m gamissaamaa''ti.

[03] 361^b^.^eb^ o.t.thaddhopi ^a^M1.0144^ea^ ^a^V1.0135^ea^ licchavii mahatiyaa licchaviiparisaaya saddhi.m yena mahaavana.m kuu.taagaarasaalaa yenaayasmaa naagito tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m naagita.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho o.t.thaddhopi licchavii aayasmanta.m naagita.m etadavoca -- ``kaha.m nu kho, bhante naagita, etarahi so bhagavaa viharati araha.m sammaasambuddho, dassanakaamaa hi maya.m ta.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha''nti. ``akaalo kho, mahaali, bhagavanta.m dassanaaya, pa.tisalliino bhagavaa''ti. o.t.thaddhopi licchavii tattheva ekamanta.m nisiidi -- ``disvaava aha.m ta.m bhagavanta.m gamissaami arahanta.m sammaasambuddha''nti.

[03] 362^b^.^eb^ atha kho siiho sama.nuddeso yenaayasmaa naagito tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m naagita.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho siiho sama.nuddeso aayasmanta.m naagita.m etadavoca -- ``ete, bhante kassapa, sambahulaa kosalakaa ca braahma.naduutaa maagadhakaa ca braahma.naduutaa idhuupasa"nkantaa bhagavanta.m dassanaaya; o.t.thaddhopi licchavii mahatiyaa licchaviiparisaaya saddhi.m idhuupasa"nkanto bhagavanta.m dassanaaya, saadhu, bhante kassapa, labhata.m esaa janataa bhagavanta.m dassanaayaa''ti.

[03] ``tena hi, siiha, tva~n~neva bhagavato aarocehii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho siiho sama.nuddeso aayasmato naagitassa pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m ^a^T1.0194^ea^ .thito kho siiho sama.nuddeso bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ete, bhante, sambahulaa kosalakaa ca braahma.naduutaa maagadhakaa ca braahma.naduutaa idhuupasa"nkantaa bhagavanta.m dassanaaya, o.t.thaddhopi licchavii mahatiyaa licchaviiparisaaya ^a^P1.0152^ea^ saddhi.m idhuupasa"nkanto bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. saadhu, bhante, labhata.m esaa janataa bhagavanta.m dassanaayaa''ti. ``tena hi, siiha, vihaarapacchaayaaya.m aasana.m pa~n~napehii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho siiho sama.nuddeso bhagavato pa.tissutvaa vihaarapacchaayaaya.m aasana.m pa~n~napesi.

[03] 363^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M1.0145^ea^ kho bhagavaa vihaaraa nikkhamma vihaarapacchaayaaya.m pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho te kosalakaa ca braahma.naduutaa maagadhakaa ca braahma.naduutaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ^a^V1.0136^ea^ ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. o.t.thaddhopi licchavii mahatiyaa licchaviiparisaaya saddhi.m yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.

[03] 364^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m nisinno kho o.t.thaddho licchavii bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``purimaani, bhante, divasaani purimataraani sunakkhatto licchaviputto yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m etadavoca -- `yadagge aha.m, mahaali, bhagavanta.m upanissaaya viharaami, na cira.m tii.ni vassaani, dibbaani hi kho ruupaani passaami piyaruupaani kaamuupasa.mhitaani rajaniiyaani, no ca kho dibbaani saddaani su.naami piyaruupaani kaamuupasa.mhitaani rajaniiyaanii'ti. santaaneva nu kho, bhante, sunakkhatto licchaviputto dibbaani saddaani naassosi ^a^T1.0195^ea^ piyaruupaani kaamuupasa.mhitaani rajaniiyaani, udaahu asantaanii''ti?

[03] 365^b^.^eb^ ``santaaneva kho, mahaali, sunakkhatto licchaviputto dibbaani saddaani naassosi piyaruupaani kaamuupasa.mhitaani rajaniiyaani, no asantaanii''ti. ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena santaaneva sunakkhatto licchaviputto dibbaani saddaani naassosi piyaruupaani kaamuupasa.mhitaani rajaniiyaani, no asantaanii''ti?

[03] 366^b^.^eb^ ``idha ^a^P1.0153^ea^, mahaali, bhikkhuno puratthimaaya disaaya eka.msabhaavito samaadhi hoti dibbaana.m ruupaana.m dassanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m, no ca kho dibbaana.m saddaana.m savanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m. so puratthimaaya disaaya eka.msabhaavite samaadhimhi dibbaana.m ruupaana.m dassanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m, no ca kho dibbaana.m saddaana.m savanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m. puratthimaaya disaaya dibbaani ruupaani passati piyaruupaani kaamuupasa.mhitaani rajaniiyaani, no ca kho dibbaani saddaani su.naati piyaruupaani kaamuupasa.mhitaani rajaniiyaani. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, mahaali, hoti bhikkhuno ^a^M1.0146^ea^ puratthimaaya disaaya eka.msabhaavite samaadhimhi dibbaana.m ruupaana.m dassanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m, no ca kho dibbaana.m saddaana.m savanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m.

[03] 367^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, mahaali, bhikkhuno dakkhi.naaya disaaya...pe0... pacchimaaya ^a^T1.0196^ea^ disaaya ^a^V1.0137^ea^... uttaraaya disaaya... uddhamadho tiriya.m eka.msabhaavito samaadhi hoti dibbaana.m ruupaana.m dassanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m, no ca kho dibbaana.m saddaana.m savanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m. so uddhamadho tiriya.m eka.msabhaavite samaadhimhi dibbaana.m ruupaana.m dassanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m, no ca kho dibbaana.m saddaana.m savanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m. uddhamadho tiriya.m dibbaani ruupaani passati piyaruupaani kaamuupasa.mhitaani rajaniiyaani, no ca kho dibbaani saddaani su.naati ^a^T1.0197^ea^ piyaruupaani kaamuupasa.mhitaani rajaniiyaani. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, mahaali, hoti bhikkhuno uddhamadho tiriya.m eka.msabhaavite samaadhimhi dibbaana.m ruupaana.m dassanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m, no ca kho dibbaana.m saddaana.m savanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m.

[03] 368^b^.^eb^ ``idha ^a^P1.0154^ea^, mahaali, bhikkhuno puratthimaaya disaaya eka.msabhaavito samaadhi hoti dibbaana.m saddaana.m savanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m, no ca kho dibbaana.m ruupaana.m dassanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m. so puratthimaaya disaaya eka.msabhaavite samaadhimhi dibbaana.m saddaana.m savanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m, no ca kho dibbaana.m ruupaana.m dassanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m. puratthimaaya disaaya dibbaani saddaani su.naati piyaruupaani kaamuupasa.mhitaani rajaniiyaani, no ca kho dibbaani ruupaani passati piyaruupaani kaamuupasa.mhitaani rajaniiyaani. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, mahaali, hoti bhikkhuno puratthimaaya disaaya eka.msabhaavite samaadhimhi dibbaana.m saddaana.m savanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m, no ca kho dibbaana.m ruupaana.m dassanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m.

[03] 369^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, mahaali, bhikkhuno dakkhi.naaya disaaya...pe0... pacchimaaya disaaya... uttaraaya disaaya... uddhamadho tiriya.m eka.msabhaavito samaadhi ^a^M1.0147^ea^ hoti dibbaana.m saddaana.m savanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m, no ca kho dibbaana.m ruupaana.m dassanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m. so uddhamadho tiriya.m eka.msabhaavite samaadhimhi dibbaana.m saddaana.m savanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m, no ca kho dibbaana.m ruupaana.m dassanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m. uddhamadho tiriya.m dibbaani saddaani su.naati piyaruupaani kaamuupasa.mhitaani rajaniiyaani, no ca kho dibbaani ruupaani passati piyaruupaani kaamuupasa.mhitaani rajaniiyaani. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, mahaali, hoti bhikkhuno uddhamadho tiriya.m ^a^V1.0138^ea^ eka.msabhaavite samaadhimhi dibbaana.m saddaana.m savanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m, no ca kho dibbaana.m ruupaana.m dassanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m.

[03] 370^b^.^eb^ ``idha ^a^T1.0198^ea^, mahaali, bhikkhuno puratthimaaya disaaya ubhaya.msabhaavito samaadhi hoti dibbaana~nca ruupaana.m dassanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m dibbaana~nca ^a^P1.0155^ea^ saddaana.m savanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m. so puratthimaaya disaaya ubhaya.msabhaavite samaadhimhi dibbaana~nca ruupaana.m dassanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m, dibbaana~nca saddaana.m savanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m. puratthimaaya disaaya dibbaani ca ruupaani passati piyaruupaani ^a^T1.0199^ea^ kaamuupasa.mhitaani rajaniiyaani, dibbaani ca saddaani su.naati piyaruupaani kaamuupasa.mhitaani rajaniiyaani. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, mahaali, hoti bhikkhuno puratthimaaya disaaya ubhaya.msabhaavite samaadhimhi dibbaana~nca ruupaana.m dassanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m dibbaana~nca saddaana.m savanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m.

[03] 371^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, mahaali, bhikkhuno dakkhi.naaya disaaya...pe0... pacchimaaya disaaya... uttaraaya disaaya... uddhamadho tiriya.m ubhaya.msabhaavito samaadhi hoti dibbaana~nca ruupaana.m dassanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m, dibbaana~nca saddaana.m savanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m. so uddhamadho tiriya.m ubhaya.msabhaavite samaadhimhi dibbaana~nca ruupaana.m dassanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m dibbaana~nca saddaana.m savanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m. uddhamadho tiriya.m dibbaani ca ruupaani passati piyaruupaani ^a^M1.0148^ea^ kaamuupasa.mhitaani rajaniiyaani, dibbaani ca saddaani su.naati piyaruupaani kaamuupasa.mhitaani rajaniiyaani. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, mahaali, hoti bhikkhuno uddhamadho tiriya.m ubhaya.msabhaavite samaadhimhi dibbaana~nca ruupaana.m dassanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m, dibbaana~nca saddaana.m savanaaya piyaruupaana.m kaamuupasa.mhitaana.m rajaniiyaana.m. aya.m kho mahaali, hetu, aya.m paccayo, yena santaaneva sunakkhatto licchaviputto dibbaani saddaani naassosi piyaruupaani kaamuupasa.mhitaani rajaniiyaani, no asantaanii''ti.

[03] 372^b^.^eb^ ``etaasa.m nuuna, bhante, samaadhibhaavanaana.m sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu bhagavati brahmacariya.m carantii''ti. ``na kho, mahaali, etaasa.m samaadhibhaavanaana.m sacchikiriyaahetu ^a^P1.0156^ea^ bhikkhuu mayi ^a^V1.0139^ea^ brahmacariya.m caranti. atthi kho, mahaali, a~n~neva dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca, yesa.m sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi brahmacariya.m carantii''ti.

[03] 373^b^.^eb^ ``katame pana te, bhante, dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca, yesa.m sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu bhagavati brahmacariya.m carantii''ti? ``idha, mahaali, bhikkhu ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sotaapanno hoti avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no. ayampi kho, mahaali, dhammo uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ^a^T1.0200^ea^ ca, yassa sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi brahmacariya.m caranti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaali, bhikkhu ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa raagadosamohaana.m tanuttaa sakadaagaamii hoti, sakideva {saki.mdeva (ka0)} ima.m loka.m aagantvaa dukkhassanta.m karoti. ayampi kho, mahaali, dhammo uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca, yassa sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi brahmacariya.m caranti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaali, bhikkhu pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko hoti, tattha parinibbaayii, anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. ayampi kho, mahaali, dhammo uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca, yassa sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi brahmacariya.m caranti.

[03] ``puna ^a^M1.0149^ea^ capara.m, mahaali, bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. ayampi kho, mahaali, dhammo uttaritaro ca pa.niitataro ca, yassa sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi brahmacariya.m caranti. ime kho te, mahaali, dhammaa uttaritaraa ca pa.niitataraa ca, yesa.m sacchikiriyaahetu bhikkhuu mayi brahmacariya.m carantii''ti.
[03] 374^b^.^eb^ ``atthi pana, bhante, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa etesa.m dhammaana.m sacchikiriyaayaa''ti? ``atthi kho, mahaali, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa etesa.m dhammaana.m sacchikiriyaayaa''ti.

[03] 375^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ^a^V1.0140^ea^ ^a^P1.0157^ea^ pana, bhante, maggo katamaa pa.tipadaa etesa.m dhammaana.m sacchikiriyaayaa''ti? ``ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo. seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho, mahaali, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa etesa.m dhammaana.m sacchikiriyaaya.

[03] 376^b^.^eb^ ``ekamidaaha.m, mahaali, samaya.m kosambiya.m viharaami ghositaaraame ^a^T1.0201^ea^. atha kho dve pabbajitaa -- mu.n.diyo ca paribbaajako jaaliyo ca daarupattikantevaasii yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami.msu. upasa"nkamitvaa mayaa saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho te dve pabbajitaa ma.m etadavocu.m -- `ki.m nu kho, aavuso gotama, ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira.m, udaahu a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti?

[03] 377^b^.^eb^ ```tena haavuso, su.naatha saadhuka.m manasi karotha bhaasissaamii''ti. `evamaavuso'ti kho te dve pabbajitaa mama paccassosu.m. aha.m etadavoca.m -- idhaavuso tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho...pe0... (yathaa 190-212 anucchedesu eva.m vitthaaretabba.m). eva.m kho, aavuso, bhikkhu siilasampanno hoti...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. yo kho, aavuso, bhikkhu eva.m jaanaati eva.m passati, kalla.m nu kho tasseta.m vacanaaya -- `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti vaa ^a^M1.0150^ea^ `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti vaati? yo so, aavuso, bhikkhu eva.m jaanaati eva.m passati ^a^T1.0202^ea^, kalla.m tasseta.m vacanaaya -- `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti vaa `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti vaati. aha.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, eva.m jaanaami eva.m passaami. atha ca panaaha.m na vadaami -- `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti vaa `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti vaa...pe0... ~naa.nadassanaaya citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti...pe0... yo kho, aavuso, bhikkhu eva.m jaanaati eva.m passati, kalla.m nu kho tasseta.m vacanaaya -- `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti vaa `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti vaati? yo so, aavuso, bhikkhu eva.m jaanaati eva.m passati, kalla.m {na kalla.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} tasseta.m vacanaaya -- `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira''nti vaa `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti vaati. aha.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, eva.m jaanaami eva.m passaami. atha ca panaaha.m na vadaami -- `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti vaa `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti vaa...pe0... ^a^V1.0142^ea^ naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaati. yo kho, aavuso, bhikkhu eva.m jaanaati eva.m passati, kalla.m nu kho tasseta.m vacanaaya -- `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti vaa `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti vaati? yo so, aavuso, bhikkhu eva.m jaanaati eva.m passati na kalla.m tasseta.m vacanaaya -- `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti vaa `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti vaati. aha.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, eva.m jaanaami eva.m passaami. atha ca panaaha.m na vadaami -- `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti vaa `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti vaa''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano o.t.thaddho licchavii bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] mahaalisutta.m ni.t.thita.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 381^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0153^ea^ ^a^V1.0146^ea^ ^a^P1.0161^ea^ ^a^T1.0205^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa uru~n~naaya.m {uju~n~naaya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} viharati ka.n.nakatthale migadaaye. atha kho acelo kassapo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho acelo kassapo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bho gotama -- `sama.no gotamo sabba.m tapa.m garahati, sabba.m tapassi.m luukhaajiivi.m eka.msena upakkosati upavadatii'ti. ye te, bho gotama, evamaaha.msu -- `sama.no gotamo sabba.m tapa.m garahati, sabba.m tapassi.m luukhaajiivi.m eka.msena upakkosati upavadatii'ti, kacci te bhoto gotamassa vuttavaadino, na ca bhavanta.m gotama.m abhuutena abbhaacikkhanti, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakaronti, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchati? anabbhakkhaatukaamaa hi maya.m bhavanta.m gotama''nti.

[03] 382^b^.^eb^ ``ye te, kassapa, evamaaha.msu -- `sama.no gotamo sabba.m tapa.m garahati, sabba.m tapassi.m luukhaajiivi.m eka.msena upakkosati upavadatii'ti, na me te vuttavaadino, abbhaacikkhanti ca pana ma.m te asataa abhuutena. idhaaha.m, kassapa, ekacca.m tapassi.m luukhaajiivi.m passaami dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapanna.m. idha panaaha.m, kassapa, ekacca.m tapassi.m luukhaajiivi.m passaami dibbena cakkhunaa ^a^P1.0162^ea^ visuddhena ^a^T1.0206^ea^ atikkantamaanusakena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapanna.m.

[03] 383^b^.^eb^ ``idhaaha.m, kassapa, ekacca.m tapassi.m appadukkhavihaari.m passaami dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m ^a^V1.0147^ea^ niraya.m upapanna.m. idha panaaha.m, kassapa, ekacca.m tapassi.m appadukkhavihaari.m passaami dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapanna.m. yoha.m, kassapa, imesa.m tapassiina.m eva.m aagati~nca gati~nca cuti~nca upapatti~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaami ^a^M1.0154^ea^, soha.m ki.m sabba.m tapa.m garahissaami, sabba.m vaa tapassi.m luukhaajiivi.m eka.msena upakkosissaami upavadissaami?

[03] 384^b^.^eb^ ``santi, kassapa, eke sama.nabraahma.naa pa.n.ditaa nipu.naa kataparappavaadaa vaalavedhiruupaa. te bhindantaa ma~n~ne caranti pa~n~naagatena di.t.thigataani. tehipi me saddhi.m ekaccesu .thaanesu sameti, ekaccesu .thaanesu na sameti. ya.m te ekacca.m vadanti `saadhuu'ti, mayampi ta.m ekacca.m vadema `saadhuu'ti. ya.m te ekacca.m vadanti `na saadhuu'ti, mayampi ta.m ekacca.m vadema `na saadhuu'ti. ya.m te ekacca.m vadanti `saadhuu'ti, maya.m ta.m ekacca.m vadema `na saadhuu'ti. ya.m te ekacca.m vadanti `na saadhuu'ti, maya.m ta.m ekacca.m vadema `saadhuu'ti.

[03] ``ya.m maya.m ekacca.m vadema `saadhuu'ti, parepi ta.m ekacca.m vadanti `saadhuu'ti. ya.m ^a^P1.0163^ea^ maya.m ^a^T1.0207^ea^ ekacca.m vadema `na saadhuu'ti, parepi ta.m ekacca.m vadanti `na saadhuu'ti. ya.m maya.m ekacca.m vadema `na saadhuu'ti, pare ta.m ekacca.m vadanti `saadhuu'ti. ya.m maya.m ekacca.m vadema `saadhuu'ti, pare ta.m ekacca.m vadanti `na saadhuu'ti.

[03] 385^b^.^eb^ ``tyaaha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadaami -- yesu no, aavuso, .thaanesu na sameti, ti.t.thantu taani .thaanaani. yesu .thaanesu sameti, tattha vi~n~nuu samanuyu~njanta.m samanugaahanta.m samanubhaasanta.m satthaaraa vaa satthaara.m sa"nghena vaa sa"ngha.m -- `ye imesa.m bhavata.m dhammaa akusalaa akusalasa"nkhaataa, saavajjaa saavajjasa"nkhaataa, asevitabbaa asevitabbasa"nkhaataa, na alamariyaa na alamariyasa"nkhaataa, ka.nhaa ka.nhasa"nkhaataa. ko ime dhamme anavasesa.m pahaaya vattati, sama.no vaa gotamo, pare vaa pana bhonto ga.naacariyaa'ti?

[03] 386^b^.^eb^ ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, kassapa, vijjati, ya.m vi~n~nuu samanuyu~njantaa samanugaahantaa samanubhaasantaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ye imesa.m bhavata.m dhammaa akusalaa akusalasa"nkhaataa, saavajjaa saavajjasa"nkhaataa, asevitabbaa asevitabbasa"nkhaataa, na alamariyaa na alamariyasa"nkhaataa, ka.nhaa ka.nhasa"nkhaataa ^a^V1.0148^ea^. sama.no gotamo ime dhamme anavasesa.m pahaaya vattati, ya.m vaa pana bhonto pare ga.naacariyaa'ti. itiha, kassapa, vi~n~nuu ^a^M1.0155^ea^ samanuyu~njantaa samanugaahantaa samanubhaasantaa amheva tattha yebhuyyena pasa.mseyyu.m.

[03] 387^b^.^eb^ ``aparampi no, kassapa, vi~n~nuu samanuyu~njanta.m samanugaahanta.m samanubhaasanta.m satthaaraa vaa satthaara.m sa"nghena vaa sa"ngha.m -- `ye imesa.m bhavata.m ^a^T1.0208^ea^ dhammaa kusalaa kusalasa"nkhaataa, anavajjaa anavajjasa"nkhaataa, sevitabbaa sevitabbasa"nkhaataa, alamariyaa alamariyasa"nkhaataa, sukkaa sukkasa"nkhaataa. ko ime dhamme anavasesa.m samaadaaya vattati, sama.no vaa gotamo, pare vaa pana bhonto ga.naacariyaa' ti?

[03] 388^b^.^eb^ ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, kassapa, vijjati, ya.m vi~n~nuu samanuyu~njantaa samanugaahantaa samanubhaasantaa eva.m vadeyyu.m ^a^P1.0164^ea^ -- `ye imesa.m bhavata.m dhammaa kusalaa kusalasa"nkhaataa, anavajjaa anavajjasa"nkhaataa, sevitabbaa sevitabbasa"nkhaataa, alamariyaa alamariyasa"nkhaataa, sukkaa sukkasa"nkhaataa. sama.no gotamo ime dhamme anavasesa.m samaadaaya vattati, ya.m vaa pana bhonto pare ga.naacariyaa'ti. itiha, kassapa, vi~n~nuu samanuyu~njantaa samanugaahantaa samanubhaasantaa amheva tattha yebhuyyena pasa.mseyyu.m.

[03] 389^b^.^eb^ ``aparampi no, kassapa, vi~n~nuu samanuyu~njanta.m samanugaahanta.m samanubhaasanta.m satthaaraa vaa satthaara.m sa"nghena vaa sa"ngha.m -- `ye imesa.m bhavata.m dhammaa akusalaa akusalasa"nkhaataa, saavajjaa saavajjasa"nkhaataa, asevitabbaa asevitabbasa"nkhaataa ^a^T1.0209^ea^, na alamariyaa na alamariyasa"nkhaataa, ka.nhaa ka.nhasa"nkhaataa. ko ime dhamme anavasesa.m pahaaya vattati, gotamasaavakasa"ngho vaa, pare vaa pana bhonto ga.naacariyasaavakasa"nghaa'ti?

[03] 390^b^.^eb^ ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, kassapa, vijjati, ya.m vi~n~nuu samanuyu~njantaa samanugaahantaa samanubhaasantaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ye imesa.m bhavata.m dhammaa akusalaa akusalasa"nkhaataa, saavajjaa saavajjasa"nkhaataa, asevitabbaa asevitabbasa"nkhaataa, na alamariyaa na alamariyasa"nkhaataa, ka.nhaa ka.nhasa"nkhaataa. gotamasaavakasa"ngho ime dhamme anavasesa.m pahaaya vattati, ya.m vaa pana bhonto pare ga.naacariyasaavakasa"nghaa'ti. itiha, kassapa, vi~n~nuu samanuyu~njantaa samanugaahantaa samanubhaasantaa amheva tattha yebhuyyena pasa.mseyyu.m.

[03] 391^b^.^eb^ ``aparampi ^a^M1.0156^ea^ ^a^V1.0149^ea^ no, kassapa, vi~n~nuu samanuyu~njanta.m samanugaahanta.m ^a^P1.0165^ea^ samanubhaasanta.m satthaaraa vaa satthaara.m sa"nghena vaa sa"ngha.m. `ye imesa.m bhavata.m dhammaa kusalaa kusalasa"nkhaataa, anavajjaa anavajjasa"nkhaataa, sevitabbaa sevitabbasa"nkhaataa, alamariyaa alamariyasa"nkhaataa, sukkaa sukkasa"nkhaataa. ko ime dhamme anavasesa.m samaadaaya vattati, gotamasaavakasa"ngho vaa, pare vaa pana bhonto ga.naacariyasaavakasa"nghaa'ti?

[03] 392^b^.^eb^ ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, kassapa, vijjati, ya.m vi~n~nuu samanuyu~njantaa samanugaahantaa samanubhaasantaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ye imesa.m bhavata.m dhammaa kusalaa kusalasa"nkhaataa, anavajjaa anavajjasa"nkhaataa, sevitabbaa sevitabbasa"nkhaataa, alamariyaa alamariyasa"nkhaataa, sukkaa sukkasa"nkhaataa. gotamasaavakasa"ngho ime dhamme anavasesa.m samaadaaya vattati, ya.m vaa pana bhonto pare ga.naacariyasaavakasa"nghaa'ti. itiha, kassapa, vi~n~nuu samanuyu~njantaa samanugaahantaa samanubhaasantaa amheva tattha yebhuyyena pasa.mseyyu.m.

[03] 393^b^.^eb^ ``atthi, kassapa, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipanno saama.myeva ~nassati saama.m dakkhati {dakkhiti (sii0)} -- `sama.nova gotamo kaalavaadii ^a^T1.0210^ea^ bhuutavaadii atthavaadii dhammavaadii vinayavaadii'ti. katamo ca, kassapa, maggo, katamaa ca pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipanno saama.myeva ~nassati saama.m dakkhati -- `sama.nova gotamo kaalavaadii bhuutavaadii atthavaadii dhammavaadii vinayavaadii'ti? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo. seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho, kassapa, maggo, aya.m pa.tipadaa, yathaapa.tipanno saama.myeva ~nassati saama.m dakkhati `sama.nova gotamo kaalavaadii bhuutavaadii atthavaadii dhammavaadii vinayavaadii'''ti.

[03] 394^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0157^ea^ vutte, acelo kassapo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``imepi kho, aavuso gotama, tapopakkamaa etesa.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m ^a^P1.0166^ea^ saama~n~nasa"nkhaataa ca brahma~n~nasa"nkhaataa ca. acelako ^a^V1.0150^ea^ hoti, muttaacaaro, hatthaapalekhano, na ehibhaddantiko, na ti.t.thabhaddantiko, naabhiha.ta.m, na uddissakata.m, na nimantana.m saadiyati. so na kumbhimukhaa pa.tigga.nhaati, na ka.lopimukhaa pa.tigga.nhaati, na e.lakamantara.m, na da.n.damantara.m, na musalamantara.m, na dvinna.m bhu~njamaanaana.m, na gabbhiniyaa, na paayamaanaaya, na purisantaragataaya, na sa"nkittiisu, na yattha saa upa.t.thito hoti, na yattha makkhikaa sa.n.dasa.n.dacaarinii, na maccha.m, na ma.msa.m, na sura.m, na meraya.m, na thusodaka.m pivati. so ekaagaariko vaa hoti ekaalopiko, dvaagaariko vaa hoti dvaalopiko...pe0... sattaagaariko vaa hoti sattaalopiko ^a^T1.0211^ea^; ekissaapi dattiyaa yaapeti, dviihipi dattiihi yaapeti... sattahipi dattiihi yaapeti; ekaahikampi aahaara.m aahaareti, dviihikampi aahaara.m aahaareti... sattaahikampi aahaara.m aahaareti. iti evaruupa.m addhamaasikampi pariyaayabhattabhojanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati.

[03] 395^b^.^eb^ ``imepi kho, aavuso gotama, tapopakkamaa etesa.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m saama~n~nasa"nkhaataa ca brahma~n~nasa"nkhaataa ca. saakabhakkho vaa hoti, saamaakabhakkho vaa hoti, niivaarabhakkho vaa hoti, daddulabhakkho vaa hoti, ha.tabhakkho vaa hoti, ka.nabhakkho vaa hoti, aacaamabhakkho vaa hoti, pi~n~naakabhakkho vaa hoti, ti.nabhakkho vaa hoti, gomayabhakkho vaa hoti, vanamuulaphalaahaaro yaapeti pavattaphalabhojii.

[03] 396^b^.^eb^ ``imepi kho, aavuso gotama, tapopakkamaa etesa.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m saama~n~nasa"nkhaataa ca brahma~n~nasa"nkhaataa ca. saa.naanipi dhaareti, masaa.naanipi dhaareti, chavadussaanipi dhaareti, pa.msukuulaanipi dhaareti, tirii.taanipi dhaareti, ajinampi ^a^P1.0167^ea^ dhaareti, ajinakkhipampi dhaareti, kusaciirampi dhaareti, vaakaciirampi dhaareti, phalakaciirampi dhaareti, kesakambalampi dhaareti, vaa.lakambalampi dhaareti, uluukapakkhikampi dhaareti, kesamassulocakopi hoti kesamassulocanaanuyogamanuyutto, ubbha.t.thakopi ^a^M1.0158^ea^ {ubbha.t.thikopi (ka0)} hoti aasanapa.tikkhitto, ukku.tikopi hoti ukku.tikappadhaanamanuyutto, ka.n.takaapassayikopi hoti ka.n.takaapassaye seyya.m kappeti, phalakaseyyampi kappeti, tha.n.dilaseyyampi kappeti, ekapassayikopi hoti rajojalladharo, abbhokaasikopi hoti yathaasanthatiko ^a^T1.0212^ea^, veka.tikopi hoti vika.tabhojanaanuyogamanuyutto, apaanakopi hoti apaanakattamanuyutto, saayatatiyakampi udakorohanaanuyogamanuyutto viharatii''ti.

[03] 397^b^.^eb^ ``acelako ^a^V1.0151^ea^ cepi, kassapa, hoti, muttaacaaro, hatthaapalekhano...pe0... iti evaruupa.m addhamaasikampi pariyaayabhattabhojanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati. tassa caaya.m siilasampadaa cittasampadaa pa~n~naasampadaa abhaavitaa hoti asacchikataa. atha kho so aarakaava saama~n~naa aarakaava brahma~n~naa. yato kho, kassapa, bhikkhu avera.m abyaapajja.m mettacitta.m bhaaveti, aasavaana~nca khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, kassapa, bhikkhu sama.no itipi braahma.no itipi.

[03] ``saakabhakkho cepi, kassapa, hoti, saamaakabhakkho...pe0... vanamuulaphalaahaaro yaapeti pavattaphalabhojii. tassa caaya.m siilasampadaa cittasampadaa pa~n~naasampadaa abhaavitaa hoti asacchikataa. atha kho so aarakaava saama~n~naa aarakaava brahma~n~naa. yato kho, kassapa, bhikkhu avera.m abyaapajja.m mettacitta.m bhaaveti, aasavaana~nca khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme ^a^P1.0168^ea^ saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, kassapa, bhikkhu sama.no itipi braahma.no itipi.

[03] ``saa.naani cepi, kassapa, dhaareti, masaa.naanipi dhaareti...pe0... saayatatiyakampi udakorohanaanuyogamanuyutto ^a^T1.0213^ea^ viharati. tassa caaya.m siilasampadaa cittasampadaa pa~n~naasampadaa abhaavitaa hoti asacchikataa. atha kho so aarakaava saama~n~naa aarakaava brahma~n~naa ^a^M1.0159^ea^. yato kho, kassapa, bhikkhu avera.m abyaapajja.m mettacitta.m bhaaveti, aasavaana~nca khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, kassapa, bhikkhu sama.no itipi braahma.no itipii''ti.

[03] 398^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, acelo kassapo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``dukkara.m, bho gotama, saama~n~na.m dukkara.m brahma~n~na''nti. ``pakati kho esaa, kassapa, lokasmi.m `dukkara.m saama~n~na.m dukkara.m brahma~n~na'nti. acelako cepi, kassapa, hoti, muttaacaaro, hatthaapalekhano...pe0... iti evaruupa.m addhamaasikampi pariyaayabhattabhojanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati. imaaya ca, kassapa, mattaaya iminaa tapopakkamena saama~n~na.m vaa abhavissa brahma~n~na.m vaa dukkara.m sudukkara.m, neta.m abhavissa kalla.m vacanaaya -- `dukkara.m saama~n~na.m dukkara.m brahma~n~na'nti.

[03] ``sakkaa ^a^V1.0152^ea^ ca paneta.m abhavissa kaatu.m gahapatinaa vaa gahapatiputtena vaa antamaso kumbhadaasiyaapi -- `handaaha.m acelako homi, muttaacaaro, hatthaapalekhano...pe0... iti evaruupa.m addhamaasikampi pariyaayabhattabhojanaanuyogamanuyutto viharaamii'ti.

[03] ``yasmaa ca kho, kassapa, a~n~natreva imaaya mattaaya a~n~natra iminaa tapopakkamena saama~n~na.m vaa hoti brahma~n~na.m vaa ^a^T1.0214^ea^ dukkara.m sudukkara.m, tasmaa eta.m kalla.m vacanaaya -- `dukkara.m saama~n~na.m dukkara.m brahma~n~na'nti. yato kho, kassapa, bhikkhu avera.m abyaapajja.m mettacitta.m bhaaveti, aasavaana~nca khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, kassapa, bhikkhu sama.no itipi braahma.no itipi ^a^P1.0169^ea^.

[03] ``saakabhakkho cepi, kassapa, hoti, saamaakabhakkho...pe0... vanamuulaphalaahaaro yaapeti pavattaphalabhojii. imaaya ca, kassapa, mattaaya iminaa tapopakkamena saama~n~na.m vaa abhavissa brahma~n~na.m vaa dukkara.m sudukkara.m, neta.m abhavissa kalla.m vacanaaya -- `dukkara.m saama~n~na.m dukkara.m brahma~n~na'nti.
