[03] ``saa.naani ^a^M1.0162^ea^ cepi, kassapa, dhaareti, masaa.naanipi dhaareti...pe0... saayatatiyakampi udakorohanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati. imaaya ca, kassapa, mattaaya iminaa tapopakkamena sama.no vaa abhavissa braahma.no vaa dujjaano sudujjaano, neta.m abhavissa kalla.m vacanaaya -- `dujjaano sama.no dujjaano braahma.no'ti.

[03] ``sakkaa ca paneso abhavissa ~naatu.m gahapatinaa vaa gahapatiputtena vaa antamaso kumbhadaasiyaapi -- `aya.m saa.naanipi dhaareti, masaa.naanipi dhaareti...pe0... saayatatiyakampi udakorohanaanuyogamanuyutto viharatii'ti.

[03] ``yasmaa ca kho, kassapa, a~n~natreva imaaya mattaaya a~n~natra iminaa tapopakkamena ^a^T1.0217^ea^ sama.no vaa hoti braahma.no vaa dujjaano sudujjaano, tasmaa eta.m kalla.m vacanaaya -- `dujjaano ^a^V1.0155^ea^ sama.no dujjaano braahma.no'ti. yato kho, kassapa, bhikkhu avera.m abyaapajja.m mettacitta.m bhaaveti, aasavaana~nca khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, kassapa ^a^T1.0218^ea^, bhikkhu sama.no itipi braahma.no itipii''ti.

[03] 400^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, acelo kassapo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``katamaa pana saa, bho gotama, siilasampadaa, katamaa cittasampadaa, katamaa pa~n~naasampadaa''ti? ``idha, kassapa, tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m, sammaasambuddho...pe0... (yathaa 190-193 anucchedesu, eva.m vitthaaretabba.m) bhayadassaavii samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu, kaayakammavaciikammena samannaagato kusalena parisuddhaajiivo siilasampanno indriyesu guttadvaaro satisampaja~n~nena samannaagato santu.t.tho.

[03] 401^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, kassapa, bhikkhu siilasampanno hoti? idha, kassapa, bhikkhu paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti nihitada.n.do nihitasattho lajjii dayaapanno, sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii viharati. idampissa hoti siilasampadaaya ^a^P1.0172^ea^ ...pe0... (yathaa 194 yaava 210 anucchedesu)

[03] ``yathaa vaa paneke bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa saddhaadeyyaani bhojanaani bhu~njitvaa te evaruupaaya tiracchaanavijjaaya micchaajiivena jiivita.m kappenti ^a^M1.0163^ea^. seyyathida.m -- santikamma.m pa.nidhikamma.m...pe0... (yathaa 211 anucchede) osadhiina.m patimokkho iti vaa iti, evaruupaaya tiracchaanavijjaaya micchaajiivaa pa.tivirato hoti. idampissa hoti siilasampadaaya.

[03] ``sa kho so {aya.m kho (ka0)}, kassapa, bhikkhu eva.m siilasampanno na kutoci bhaya.m samanupassati, yadida.m siilasa.mvarato. seyyathaapi, kassapa, raajaa khattiyo muddhaavasitto nihatapaccaamitto na kutoci bhaya.m samanupassati, yadida.m paccatthikato. evameva kho, kassapa, bhikkhu eva.m siilasampanno na kutoci bhaya.m samanupassati, yadida.m siilasa.mvarato. so iminaa ariyena siilakkhandhena samannaagato ajjhatta.m anavajjasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. eva.m kho, kassapa, bhikkhu siilasampanno hoti. aya.m kho, kassapa, siilasampadaa...pe0... ^a^V1.0156^ea^ ^a^P1.0173^ea^ pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. idampissa hoti cittasampadaaya...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. idampissa hoti cittasampadaaya. aya.m kho, kassapa, cittasampadaa.

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte...pe0... ~naa.nadassanaaya citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti...pe0... ^a^P1.0174^ea^ idampissa hoti pa~n~naasampadaaya...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaati...pe0... idampissa hoti pa~n~naasampadaaya. aya.m kho, kassapa, pa~n~naasampadaa.
[03] ``imaaya ^a^V1.0157^ea^ ca, kassapa, siilasampadaaya cittasampadaaya pa~n~naasampadaaya a~n~naa siilasampadaa cittasampadaa pa~n~naasampadaa uttaritaraa vaa pa.niitataraa vaa natthi.

[03] 402^b^.^eb^ ``santi, kassapa, eke sama.nabraahma.naa siilavaadaa. te anekapariyaayena siilassa va.n.na.m bhaasanti. yaavataa, kassapa, ariya.m parama.m siila.m, naaha.m tattha attano samasama.m samanupassaami, kuto bhiyyo! atha kho ahameva ^a^T1.0219^ea^ tattha bhiyyo, yadida.m adhisiila.m.

[03] ``santi, kassapa, eke sama.nabraahma.naa tapojigucchaavaadaa. te anekapariyaayena tapojigucchaaya va.n.na.m bhaasanti. yaavataa, kassapa, ariyaa paramaa ^a^M1.0164^ea^ tapojigucchaa, naaha.m tattha attano samasama.m samanupassaami, kuto bhiyyo! atha kho ahameva tattha bhiyyo, yadida.m adhijeguccha.m.

[03] ``santi, kassapa, eke sama.nabraahma.naa pa~n~naavaadaa. te anekapariyaayena pa~n~naaya va.n.na.m bhaasanti. yaavataa, kassapa, ariyaa paramaa pa~n~naa, naaha.m tattha attano samasama.m samanupassaami, kuto bhiyyo! atha kho ahameva tattha bhiyyo, yadida.m adhipa~n~na.m.

[03] ``santi, kassapa, eke sama.nabraahma.naa vimuttivaadaa. te anekapariyaayena vimuttiyaa va.n.na.m bhaasanti. yaavataa, kassapa, ariyaa paramaa vimutti, naaha.m tattha attano samasama.m samanupassaami, kuto bhiyyo! atha kho ahameva tattha bhiyyo, yadida.m adhivimutti.

[03] 403^b^.^eb^ ``.thaana.m ^a^P1.0175^ea^ kho paneta.m, kassapa, vijjati, ya.m a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `siihanaada.m kho sama.no gotamo nadati, ta~nca kho su~n~naagaare nadati, no parisaasuu'ti. te -- `maa heva'ntissu vacaniiyaa. `siihanaada~nca sama.no gotamo nadati, parisaasu ca nadatii'ti evamassu, kassapa, vacaniiyaa.

[03] ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, kassapa, vijjati, ya.m a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `siihanaada~nca sama.no gotamo nadati, parisaasu ca nadati, no ^a^T1.0220^ea^ ca kho visaarado nadatii'ti ^a^V1.0158^ea^. te -- `maa heva'ntissu vacaniiyaa. `siihanaada~nca sama.no gotamo nadati, parisaasu ca nadati, visaarado ca nadatii''ti evamassu, kassapa, vacaniiyaa.

[03] ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, kassapa, vijjati, ya.m a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `siihanaada~nca sama.no gotamo nadati, parisaasu ca nadati, visaarado ca nadati, no ca kho na.m pa~nha.m pucchanti...pe0... pa~nha~nca na.m pucchanti; no ca kho nesa.m pa~nha.m pu.t.tho byaakaroti...pe0... pa~nha~nca nesa.m pu.t.tho byaakaroti; no ca kho pa~nhassa veyyaakara.nena citta.m aaraadheti...pe0... pa~nhassa ca veyyaakara.nena citta.m aaraadheti; no ca kho sotabba.m ma~n~nanti...pe0... sotabba~ncassa ma~n~nanti; no ca kho sutvaa pasiidanti...pe0... sutvaa cassa pasiidanti ^a^M1.0165^ea^; no ca kho pasannaakaara.m karonti...pe0... pasannaakaara~nca karonti; no ca kho tathattaaya pa.tipajjanti...pe0... tathattaaya ca pa.tipajjanti; no ca kho pa.tipannaa aaraadhentii'ti. te -- `maa heva'ntissu vacaniiyaa. `siihanaada~nca sama.no gotamo nadati, parisaasu ca nadati, visaarado ca nadati, pa~nha~nca na.m pucchanti, pa~nha~nca nesa.m pu.t.tho byaakaroti, pa~nhassa ca veyyaakara.nena citta.m aaraadheti, sotabba~ncassa ma~n~nanti, sutvaa cassa pasiidanti, pasannaakaara~nca karonti, tathattaaya ca pa.tipajjanti, pa.tipannaa ca aaraadhentii'ti evamassu, kassapa, vacaniiyaa.

[03] 404^b^.^eb^ ``ekamidaaha.m, kassapa, samaya.m raajagahe viharaami gijjhakuu.te pabbate. tatra ma.m a~n~nataro tapabrahmacaarii ^a^P1.0176^ea^ nigrodho naama adhijegucche ^a^T1.0221^ea^ pa~nha.m apucchi. tassaaha.m adhijegucche pa~nha.m pu.t.tho byaakaasi.m. byaakate ca pana me attamano ahosi para.m viya mattaayaa''ti. ``ko hi, bhante, bhagavato dhamma.m sutvaa na attamano assa para.m viya mattaaya? ahampi hi, bhante, bhagavato dhamma.m sutvaa attamano para.m viya mattaaya. abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante. seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti; evameva.m bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami, dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti.

[03] 405^b^.^eb^ ``yo ^a^V1.0159^ea^ kho, kassapa, a~n~natitthiyapubbo imasmi.m dhammavinaye aaka"nkhati pabbajja.m, aaka"nkhati upasampada.m, so cattaaro maase parivasati, catunna.m maasaana.m accayena aaraddhacittaa bhikkhuu pabbaajenti, upasampaadenti bhikkhubhaavaaya. api ca mettha puggalavemattataa viditaa''ti. ``sace, bhante, a~n~natitthiyapubbaa imasmi.m dhammavinaye aaka"nkhanti pabbajja.m, aaka"nkhanti upasampada.m, cattaaro maase parivasanti, catunna.m maasaana.m accayena aaraddhacittaa bhikkhuu pabbaajenti, upasampaadenti bhikkhubhaavaaya. aha.m cattaari vassaani parivasissaami, catunna.m vassaana.m accayena aaraddhacittaa bhikkhuu pabbaajentu, upasampaadentu bhikkhubhaavaayaa''ti.

[03] alattha ^a^M1.0166^ea^ kho acelo kassapo bhagavato santike pabbajja.m ^a^P1.0177^ea^, alattha upasampada.m. aciruupasampanno ^a^T1.0222^ea^ kho panaayasmaa kassapo eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto na cirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti -- abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro kho panaayasmaa kassapo arahata.m ahosiiti.
[06] mahaasiihanaadasutta.m ni.t.thita.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 406^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0167^ea^ ^a^V1.0160^ea^ ^a^P1.0178^ea^ ^a^T1.0223^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena po.t.thapaado paribbaajako samayappavaadake tindukaaciire ekasaalake mallikaaya aaraame pa.tivasati mahatiyaa paribbaajakaparisaaya saddhi.m ti.msamattehi paribbaajakasatehi. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthi.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.

[03] 407^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``atippago kho taava saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena samayappavaadako tindukaaciiro ekasaalako mallikaaya aaraamo, yena po.t.thapaado paribbaajako tenupasa"nkameyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa yena samayappavaadako tindukaaciiro ekasaalako mallikaaya aaraamo tenupasa"nkami.

[03] 408^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena po.t.thapaado paribbaajako mahatiyaa paribbaajakaparisaaya saddhi.m nisinno hoti unnaadiniyaa uccaasaddamahaasaddaaya anekavihita.m tiracchaanakatha.m kathentiyaa. seyyathida.m -- raajakatha.m corakatha.m mahaamattakatha.m senaakatha.m bhayakatha.m yuddhakatha.m annakatha.m paanakatha.m vatthakatha.m sayanakatha.m maalaakatha.m gandhakatha.m ~naatikatha.m yaanakatha.m gaamakatha.m nigamakatha.m nagarakatha.m janapadakatha.m ^a^P1.0179^ea^ itthikatha.m suurakatha.m visikhaakatha.m kumbha.t.thaanakatha.m pubbapetakatha.m naanattakatha.m lokakkhaayika.m samuddakkhaayika.m itibhavaabhavakatha.m iti vaa.

[03] 409^b^.^eb^ addasaa kho po.t.thapaado paribbaajako bhagavanta.m ^a^T1.0224^ea^ duuratova aagacchanta.m; disvaana saka.m parisa.m sa.n.thapesi -- ``appasaddaa bhonto hontu, maa bhonto saddamakattha. aya.m sama.no gotamo ^a^V1.0161^ea^ aagacchati. appasaddakaamo kho so aayasmaa appasaddassa va.n.navaadii. appeva naama appasadda.m parisa.m viditvaa upasa"nkamitabba.m ma~n~neyyaa''ti. eva.m vutte te paribbaajakaa tu.nhii ahesu.m.

[03] 410^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M1.0168^ea^ kho bhagavaa yena po.t.thapaado paribbaajako tenupasa"nkami. atha kho po.t.thapaado paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``etu kho, bhante, bhagavaa. svaagata.m, bhante, bhagavato. cirassa.m kho, bhante, bhagavaa ima.m pariyaayamakaasi, yadida.m idhaagamanaaya. nisiidatu, bhante, bhagavaa, ida.m aasana.m pa~n~natta''nti.

[03] nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. po.t.thapaadopi kho paribbaajako a~n~natara.m niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho po.t.thapaada.m paribbaajaka.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``kaaya nuttha {kaaya nottha (syaa0 ka0)}, po.t.thapaada, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa, kaa ca pana vo antaraakathaa vippakataa''ti?

[03] 411^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte po.t.thapaado paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ti.t.thatesaa, bhante, kathaa, yaaya maya.m etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa. nesaa, bhante, kathaa bhagavato dullabhaa bhavissati pacchaapi savanaaya. purimaani, bhante, divasaani purimataraani, naanaatitthiyaana.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m kotuuhalasaalaaya sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m abhisa~n~naanirodhe ^a^P1.0180^ea^ kathaa udapaadi -- `katha.m nu kho, bho, abhisa~n~naanirodho hotii'ti? tatrekacce evamaaha.msu ^a^T1.0225^ea^ -- `ahetuu appaccayaa purisassa sa~n~naa uppajjantipi nirujjhantipi. yasmi.m samaye uppajjanti, sa~n~nii tasmi.m samaye hoti. yasmi.m samaye nirujjhanti, asa~n~nii tasmi.m samaye hotii'ti. ittheke abhisa~n~naanirodha.m pa~n~napenti.

[03] ``tama~n~no evamaaha -- `na kho pana meta.m {na kho naameta.m (sii0 pii0)}, bho, eva.m bhavissati. sa~n~naa hi, bho, purisassa attaa. saa ca kho upetipi apetipi. yasmi.m samaye upeti, sa~n~nii tasmi.m samaye hoti. yasmi.m samaye apeti, asa~n~nii tasmi.m samaye hotii'ti. ittheke abhisa~n~naanirodha.m pa~n~napenti.

[03] ``tama~n~no ^a^V1.0162^ea^ evamaaha -- `na kho pana meta.m, bho, eva.m bhavissati. santi hi, bho, sama.nabraahma.naa mahiddhikaa mahaanubhaavaa. te imassa purisassa sa~n~na.m upaka.d.dhantipi apaka.d.dhantipi. yasmi.m samaye upaka.d.dhanti, sa~n~nii tasmi.m samaye ^a^M1.0169^ea^ hoti. yasmi.m samaye apaka.d.dhanti, asa~n~nii tasmi.m samaye hotii'ti. ittheke abhisa~n~naanirodha.m pa~n~napenti.

[03] ``tama~n~no evamaaha -- `na kho pana meta.m, bho, eva.m bhavissati. santi hi, bho, devataa mahiddhikaa mahaanubhaavaa. taa imassa purisassa sa~n~na.m upaka.d.dhantipi apaka.d.dhantipi. yasmi.m samaye upaka.d.dhanti, sa~n~nii tasmi.m samaye hoti. yasmi.m samaye apaka.d.dhanti, asa~n~nii tasmi.m samaye hotii'ti. ittheke abhisa~n~naanirodha.m pa~n~napenti.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.myeva aarabbha sati udapaadi -- `aho nuuna bhagavaa, aho nuuna sugato, yo imesa.m dhammaana.m sukusalo'ti. bhagavaa, bhante, kusalo, bhagavaa pakata~n~nuu abhisa~n~naanirodhassa. katha.m nu kho, bhante, abhisa~n~naanirodho hotii''ti?

[03] 412^b^.^eb^ ``tatra ^a^T1.0226^ea^, po.t.thapaada, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa evamaaha.msu -- `ahetuu appaccayaa purisassa sa~n~naa uppajjantipi nirujjhantipii'ti, aaditova tesa.m aparaddha.m. ta.m kissa hetu? sahetuu hi, po.t.thapaada, sappaccayaa purisassa sa~n~naa ^a^P1.0181^ea^ uppajjantipi nirujjhantipi. sikkhaa ekaa sa~n~naa uppajjati, sikkhaa ekaa sa~n~naa nirujjhati''.

[03] 413^b^.^eb^ ``kaa ca sikkhaa''ti? bhagavaa avoca -- ``idha, po.t.thapaada, tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m, sammaasambuddho...pe0... ^a^P1.0182^ea^ (yathaa 190-212 anucchedesu, eva.m vitthaaretabba.m). eva.m kho, po.t.thapaada, bhikkhu siilasampanno hoti...pe0... tassime pa~ncaniivara.ne pahiine ^a^V1.0163^ea^ attani samanupassato paamojja.m jaayati, pamuditassa piiti jaayati, piitimanassa kaayo passambhati, passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedeti, sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. so vivicceva kaamehi, vivicca akusalehi dhammehi, savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. tassa yaa purimaa kaamasa~n~naa, saa nirujjhati. vivekajapiitisukhasukhumasaccasa~n~naa tasmi.m samaye hoti, vivekajapiitisukhasukhuma-saccasa~n~niiyeva tasmi.m samaye hoti. evampi sikkhaa ekaa sa~n~naa uppajjati, sikkhaa ekaa sa~n~naa nirujjhati. aya.m sikkhaa''ti bhagavaa avoca.

[03] ``puna ^a^M1.0170^ea^ capara.m, po.t.thapaada, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. tassa yaa purimaa vivekajapiitisukhasukhumasaccasa~n~naa, saa nirujjhati. samaadhijapiitisukhasukhumasaccasa~n~naa tasmi.m ^a^T1.0227^ea^ samaye hoti ^a^P1.0183^ea^, samaadhijapiitisukhasukhumasaccasa~n~niiyeva tasmi.m samaye hoti. evampi sikkhaa ekaa sa~n~naa uppajjati, sikkhaa ekaa sa~n~naa nirujjhati. ayampi sikkhaa''ti bhagavaa avoca.

[03] ``puna capara.m, po.t.thapaada, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- ``upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii''ti, tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. tassa yaa purimaa samaadhijapiitisukhasukhumasaccasa~n~naa, saa nirujjhati. upekkhaasukhasukhumasaccasa~n~naa tasmi.m samaye hoti, upekkhaasukhasukhumasaccasa~n~niiyeva tasmi.m samaye hoti. evampi sikkhaa ekaa sa~n~naa uppajjati, sikkhaa ekaa sa~n~naa nirujjhati. ayampi sikkhaa''ti bhagavaa avoca.

[03] ``puna capara.m, po.t.thapaada, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. tassa yaa purimaa upekkhaasukhasukhumasaccasa~n~naa, saa nirujjhati. adukkhamasukhasukhumasaccasa~n~naa tasmi.m samaye hoti, adukkhamasukhasukhumasaccasa~n~niiyeva tasmi.m samaye hoti. evampi sikkhaa ekaa sa~n~naa uppajjati, sikkhaa ekaa sa~n~naa nirujjhati. ayampi sikkhaa''ti bhagavaa avoca.

[03] ``puna capara.m, po.t.thapaada, bhikkhu sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa ^a^V1.0164^ea^ naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto ^a^T1.0228^ea^ aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. tassa yaa purimaa ruupasa~n~naa {purimasa~n~naa (ka0)}, saa nirujjhati. aakaasaana~ncaayatanasukhumasaccasa~n~naa tasmi.m samaye hoti, aakaasaana~ncaayatanasukhumasaccasa~n~niiyeva tasmi.m samaye hoti. evampi sikkhaa ekaa sa~n~naa uppajjati, sikkhaa ekaa sa~n~naa nirujjhati. ayampi sikkhaa''ti bhagavaa avoca.

[03] ``puna ^a^M1.0171^ea^ capara.m, po.t.thapaada, bhikkhu sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m ^a^P1.0184^ea^ samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. tassa yaa purimaa aakaasaana~ncaayatanasukhumasaccasa~n~naa, saa nirujjhati. vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasukhumasaccasa~n~naa tasmi.m samaye hoti, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasukhumasaccasa~n~niiyeva tasmi.m samaye hoti. evampi sikkhaa ekaa sa~n~naa uppajjati, sikkhaa ekaa sa~n~naa nirujjhati. ayampi sikkhaa''ti bhagavaa avoca.

[03] ``puna capara.m, po.t.thapaada, bhikkhu sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. tassa yaa purimaa vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasukhumasaccasa~n~naa, saa nirujjhati. aaki~nca~n~naayatanasukhumasaccasa~n~naa tasmi.m samaye hoti, aaki~nca~n~naayatanasukhumasaccasa~n~niiyeva tasmi.m samaye hoti. evampi sikkhaa ekaa sa~n~naa uppajjati, sikkhaa ekaa sa~n~naa nirujjhati. ayampi sikkhaa''ti bhagavaa avoca.

[03] 414^b^.^eb^ ``yato kho, po.t.thapaada, bhikkhu idha sakasa~n~nii hoti, so tato ^a^T1.0229^ea^ amutra tato amutra anupubbena sa~n~nagga.m phusati. tassa sa~n~nagge .thitassa eva.m hoti -- `cetayamaanassa me paapiyo, acetayamaanassa me seyyo. aha~nceva kho pana ceteyya.m, abhisa"nkhareyya.m, imaa ca me sa~n~naa nirujjheyyu.m, a~n~naa ca o.laarikaa sa~n~naa uppajjeyyu.m; ya.mnuunaaha.m na ceva ceteyya.m na ca abhisa"nkhareyya'nti. so na ceva ceteti, na ca abhisa"nkharoti. tassa acetayato anabhisa"nkharoto taa ceva sa~n~naa nirujjhanti, a~n~naa ca o.laarikaa sa~n~naa na uppajjanti. so nirodha.m phusati. eva.m kho, po.t.thapaada, anupubbaabhisa~n~naanirodha-sampajaana-samaapatti hoti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, po.t.thapaada, api nu te ito pubbe evaruupaa anupubbaabhisa~n~naanirodha-sampajaana-samaapatti sutapubbaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante. eva.m kho aha.m ^a^V1.0165^ea^, bhante, bhagavato bhaasita.m aajaanaami -- `yato kho, po.t.thapaada, bhikkhu idha sakasa~n~nii hoti, so tato amutra tato amutra anupubbena sa~n~nagga.m phusati, tassa sa~n~nagge .thitassa eva.m hoti -- ``cetayamaanassa ^a^P1.0185^ea^ me paapiyo, acetayamaanassa me seyyo. aha~nceva kho pana ceteyya.m ^a^M1.0172^ea^ abhisa"nkhareyya.m, imaa ca me sa~n~naa nirujjheyyu.m, a~n~naa ca o.laarikaa sa~n~naa uppajjeyyu.m; ya.mnuunaaha.m na ceva ceteyya.m, na ca abhisa"nkhareyya''nti. so na ceva ceteti, na caabhisa"nkharoti, tassa acetayato anabhisa"nkharoto taa ceva sa~n~naa nirujjhanti, a~n~naa ca o.laarikaa sa~n~naa na uppajjanti ^a^T1.0230^ea^. so nirodha.m phusati. eva.m kho, po.t.thapaada, anupubbaabhisa~n~naanirodha-sampajaana-samaapatti hotii'''ti. ``eva.m, po.t.thapaadaa''ti.

[03] 415^b^.^eb^ ``eka~n~neva nu kho, bhante, bhagavaa sa~n~nagga.m pa~n~napeti, udaahu puthuupi sa~n~nagge pa~n~napetii''ti? ``ekampi kho aha.m, po.t.thapaada, sa~n~nagga.m pa~n~napemi, puthuupi sa~n~nagge pa~n~napemii''ti. ``yathaa katha.m pana, bhante, bhagavaa ekampi sa~n~nagga.m pa~n~napeti, puthuupi sa~n~nagge pa~n~napetii''ti? ``yathaa yathaa kho, po.t.thapaada, nirodha.m phusati, tathaa tathaaha.m sa~n~nagga.m pa~n~napemi. eva.m kho aha.m, po.t.thapaada, ekampi sa~n~nagga.m pa~n~napemi, puthuupi sa~n~nagge pa~n~napemii''ti.

[03] 416^b^.^eb^ ``sa~n~naa nu kho, bhante, pa.thama.m uppajjati, pacchaa ~naa.na.m, udaahu ~naa.na.m pa.thama.m uppajjati, pacchaa sa~n~naa, udaahu sa~n~naa ca ~naa.na~nca apubba.m acarima.m uppajjantii''ti? ``sa~n~naa kho, po.t.thapaada, pa.thama.m uppajjati, pacchaa ~naa.na.m, sa~n~nuppaadaa ca pana ~naa.nuppaado hoti. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `idappaccayaa kira me ~naa.na.m udapaadii'ti. iminaa kho eta.m, po.t.thapaada, pariyaayena veditabba.m -- yathaa sa~n~naa pa.thama.m uppajjati, pacchaa ~naa.na.m, sa~n~nuppaadaa ca pana ~naa.nuppaado hotii''ti.

[03] 417^b^.^eb^ ``sa~n~naa nu kho, bhante, purisassa attaa, udaahu a~n~naa sa~n~naa a~n~no attaa''ti? ``ka.m pana tva.m, po.t.thapaada, attaana.m paccesii''ti ^a^T1.0231^ea^? ``o.laarika.m ^a^P1.0186^ea^ kho aha.m, bhante, attaana.m paccemi ruupi.m caatumahaabhuutika.m kaba.liikaaraahaarabhakkha''nti {kaba.liikaarabhakkhanti (syaa0 ka0)}. ``o.laariko ca hi te, po.t.thapaada, attaa abhavissa ruupii caatumahaabhuutiko kaba.liikaaraahaarabhakkho. eva.m santa.m kho te, po.t.thapaada, a~n~naava sa~n~naa bhavissati a~n~no attaa. tadaminaapeta.m, po.t.thapaada ^a^M1.0173^ea^, pariyaayena veditabba.m ^a^V1.0166^ea^ yathaa a~n~naava sa~n~naa bhavissati a~n~no attaa. ti.t.thateva saaya.m {ti.t.thatevaaya.m (sii0 pii0)}, po.t.thapaada, o.laariko attaa ruupii caatumahaabhuutiko kaba.liikaaraahaarabhakkho, atha imassa purisassa a~n~naa ca sa~n~naa uppajjanti, a~n~naa ca sa~n~naa nirujjhanti. iminaa kho eta.m, po.t.thapaada, pariyaayena veditabba.m yathaa a~n~naava sa~n~naa bhavissati a~n~no attaa''ti.

[03] 418^b^.^eb^ ``manomaya.m kho aha.m, bhante, attaana.m paccemi sabba"ngapacca"ngi.m ahiinindriya''nti. ``manomayo ca hi te, po.t.thapaada, attaa abhavissa sabba"ngapacca"ngii ahiinindriyo, eva.m santampi kho te, po.t.thapaada, a~n~naava sa~n~naa bhavissati a~n~no attaa. tadaminaapeta.m, po.t.thapaada, pariyaayena veditabba.m yathaa a~n~naava sa~n~naa bhavissati a~n~no attaa. ti.t.thateva saaya.m, po.t.thapaada, manomayo attaa sabba"ngapacca"ngii ahiinindriyo, atha imassa purisassa a~n~naa ca sa~n~naa uppajjanti, a~n~naa ca sa~n~naa nirujjhanti. iminaapi kho eta.m, po.t.thapaada, pariyaayena veditabba.m yathaa a~n~naava sa~n~naa bhavissati a~n~no attaa''ti.

[03] 419^b^.^eb^ ``aruupi.m ^a^P1.0187^ea^ ^a^T1.0232^ea^ kho aha.m, bhante, attaana.m paccemi sa~n~naamaya''nti. ``aruupii ca hi te, po.t.thapaada, attaa abhavissa sa~n~naamayo, eva.m santampi kho te, po.t.thapaada, a~n~naava sa~n~naa bhavissati a~n~no attaa. tadaminaapeta.m, po.t.thapaada, pariyaayena veditabba.m yathaa a~n~naava sa~n~naa bhavissati a~n~no attaa. ti.t.thateva saaya.m, po.t.thapaada, aruupii attaa sa~n~naamayo, atha imassa purisassa a~n~naa ca sa~n~naa uppajjanti, a~n~naa ca sa~n~naa nirujjhanti. iminaapi kho eta.m, po.t.thapaada, pariyaayena veditabba.m yathaa a~n~naava sa~n~naa bhavissati a~n~no attaa''ti.

[03] 420^b^.^eb^ ``sakkaa paneta.m, bhante, mayaa ~naatu.m -- `sa~n~naa purisassa attaa'ti vaa `a~n~naava sa~n~naa a~n~no attaati vaa'ti? ``dujjaana.m kho eta.m {eva.m (ka0)}, po.t.thapaada, tayaa a~n~nadi.t.thikena a~n~nakhantikena a~n~narucikena a~n~natraayogena a~n~natraacariyakena -- `sa~n~naa purisassa attaa'ti vaa, `a~n~naava sa~n~naa a~n~no attaati vaa'''ti.

[03] ``sace ^a^M1.0174^ea^ ta.m, bhante, mayaa dujjaana.m a~n~nadi.t.thikena a~n~nakhantikena a~n~narucikena a~n~natraayogena a~n~natraacariyakena -- `sa~n~naa purisassa attaa'ti vaa, `a~n~naava sa~n~naa a~n~no attaa'ti vaa; `ki.m pana, bhante, sassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti? abyaakata.m kho eta.m, po.t.thapaada, mayaa -- `sassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti.

[03] ``ki.m ^a^V1.0167^ea^ pana, bhante, `asassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'''nti ^a^T1.0233^ea^? ``etampi kho, po.t.thapaada, mayaa abyaakata.m -- `asassato loko, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'''nti.

[03] ``ki.m pana, bhante, `antavaa loko...pe0... `anantavaa loko ^a^P1.0188^ea^... `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira.m... `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira.m... `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'''nti? ``etampi kho, po.t.thapaada, mayaa abyaakata.m -- `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'''nti.

[03] ``kasmaa paneta.m, bhante, bhagavataa abyaakata''nti? ``na heta.m, po.t.thapaada, atthasa.mhita.m na dhammasa.mhita.m ^a^P1.0189^ea^ naadibrahmacariyaka.m, na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati, tasmaa eta.m mayaa abyaakata''nti.

[03] ``ki.m pana, bhante, bhagavataa byaakata''nti? ``ida.m dukkhanti kho, po.t.thapaada, mayaa byaakata.m. aya.m dukkhasamudayoti kho, po.t.thapaada, mayaa byaakata.m. aya.m dukkhanirodhoti kho, po.t.thapaada, mayaa byaakata.m. aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaati kho, po.t.thapaada, mayaa byaakata''nti.

[03] ``kasmaa paneta.m, bhante, bhagavataa byaakata''nti? ``eta~nhi, po.t.thapaada, atthasa.mhita.m, eta.m dhammasa.mhita.m, eta.m aadibrahmacariyaka.m, eta.m nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati; tasmaa eta.m mayaa byaakata''nti. ``evameta.m, bhagavaa, evameta.m, sugata ^a^T1.0234^ea^. yassadaani, bhante, bhagavaa kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

[03] 421^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M1.0175^ea^ kho te paribbaajakaa acirapakkantassa bhagavato po.t.thapaada.m paribbaajaka.m samantato vaacaa {vaacaaya (syaa0 ka0)} sannitodakena sa~njhabbharimaka.msu -- ``evameva panaaya.m bhava.m po.t.thapaado ya~n~nadeva sama.no gotamo bhaasati, ta.m tadevassa abbhanumodati -- `evameta.m bhagavaa evameta.m, sugataa'ti. na kho pana maya.m ki~nci {ka~nci (pii0)} sama.nassa gotamassa eka.msika.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaama -- `sassato loko'ti vaa, `asassato loko'ti vaa, `antavaa loko'ti vaa, `anantavaa loko'ti vaa, `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti vaa, `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti vaa ^a^V1.0168^ea^, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti ^a^P1.0190^ea^ vaa, `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte po.t.thapaado paribbaajako te paribbaajake etadavoca -- ``ahampi kho, bho, na ki~nci sama.nassa gotamassa eka.msika.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami -- `sassato loko'ti vaa, `asassato loko'ti vaa...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa; api ca sama.no gotamo bhuuta.m taccha.m tatha.m pa.tipada.m pa~n~napeti dhamma.t.thitata.m dhammaniyaamata.m. bhuuta.m kho pana taccha.m tatha.m pa.tipada.m pa~n~napentassa dhamma.t.thitata.m dhammaniyaamata.m, katha~nhi naama maadiso vi~n~nuu sama.nassa gotamassa subhaasita.m subhaasitato naabbhanumodeyyaa''ti?

[03] 422^b^.^eb^ atha kho dviihatiihassa accayena citto ca hatthisaariputto po.t.thapaado ca paribbaajako yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa citto hatthisaariputto bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. po.t.thapaado ^a^T1.0235^ea^ pana paribbaajako bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho po.t.thapaado paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``tadaa ma.m, bhante, te paribbaajakaa acirapakkantassa bhagavato samantato vaacaasannitodakena sa~njhabbharimaka.msu -- `evameva panaaya.m bhava.m po.t.thapaado ya~n~nadeva sama.no ^a^M1.0176^ea^ gotamo bhaasati, ta.m tadevassa abbhanumodati -- `evameta.m bhagavaa evameta.m sugataa''ti. na kho pana maya.m ki~nci sama.nassa gotamassa eka.msika.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaama -- ``sassato loko''ti vaa, ``asassato loko''ti vaa, ``antavaa loko''ti vaa, ``anantavaa loko''ti vaa, ``ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira''nti vaa, ``a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira''nti vaa, ``hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti vaa, ``na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti vaa, ``hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato ^a^P1.0191^ea^ para.m mara.naa''ti vaa, ``neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti vaa'ti. eva.m vuttaaha.m, bhante, te paribbaajake etadavoca.m -- `ahampi kho, bho, na ki~nci sama.nassa gotamassa eka.msika.m dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami -- ``sassato loko''ti vaa, ``asassato loko''ti vaa...pe0... ``neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti vaa; api ca sama.no gotamo bhuuta.m taccha.m tatha.m pa.tipada.m pa~n~napeti dhamma.t.thitata.m dhammaniyaamata.m. bhuuta.m ^a^V1.0169^ea^ kho pana taccha.m tatha.m pa.tipada.m pa~n~napentassa dhamma.t.thitata.m dhammaniyaamata.m, katha~nhi naama maadiso vi~n~nuu sama.nassa gotamassa subhaasita.m subhaasitato naabbhanumodeyyaa''ti?

[03] 423^b^.^eb^ ``sabbeva kho ete, po.t.thapaada, paribbaajakaa andhaa acakkhukaa; tva.myeva nesa.m eko cakkhumaa. eka.msikaapi hi kho, po.t.thapaada, mayaa dhammaa desitaa pa~n~nattaa; aneka.msikaapi hi kho ^a^T1.0236^ea^, po.t.thapaada, mayaa dhammaa desitaa pa~n~nattaa.

[03] ``katame ca te, po.t.thapaada, mayaa aneka.msikaa dhammaa desitaa pa~n~nattaa? `sassato loko'ti {lokoti vaa (sii0 ka0)} kho, po.t.thapaada, mayaa aneka.msiko dhammo desito pa~n~natto; `asassato loko'ti {lokoti vaa (sii0 ka0)} kho, po.t.thapaada, mayaa aneka.msiko dhammo desito pa~n~natto; `antavaa loko'ti {lokoti vaa (sii0 ka0)} kho po.t.thapaada...pe0... `anantavaa loko'ti {lokoti vaa (sii0 ka0)} kho po.t.thapaada... `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti kho po.t.thapaada... `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti kho po.t.thapaada... `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti kho po.t.thapaada... na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti kho po.t.thapaada... `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti kho po.t.thapaada... `neva ^a^M1.0177^ea^ hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti kho, po.t.thapaada, mayaa aneka.msiko dhammo desito pa~n~natto.

[03] ``kasmaa ca te, po.t.thapaada, mayaa aneka.msikaa dhammaa desitaa pa~n~nattaa? na hete, po.t.thapaada, atthasa.mhitaa na dhammasa.mhitaa na aadibrahmacariyakaa na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattanti. tasmaa te mayaa aneka.msikaa dhammaa desitaa pa~n~nattaa''.

[03] 424^b^.^eb^ ``katame ca te, po.t.thapaada, mayaa eka.msikaa dhammaa desitaa pa~n~nattaa ^a^T1.0237^ea^? ida.m dukkhanti kho, po.t.thapaada, mayaa eka.msiko ^a^P1.0192^ea^ dhammo desito pa~n~natto. aya.m dukkhasamudayoti kho, po.t.thapaada, mayaa eka.msiko dhammo desito pa~n~natto. aya.m dukkhanirodhoti kho, po.t.thapaada, mayaa eka.msiko dhammo desito pa~n~natto. aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaati kho, po.t.thapaada, mayaa eka.msiko dhammo desito pa~n~natto.

[03] ``kasmaa ca te, po.t.thapaada, mayaa eka.msikaa dhammaa desitaa pa~n~nattaa? ete, po.t.thapaada, atthasa.mhitaa ^a^V1.0170^ea^, ete dhammasa.mhitaa, ete aadibrahmacariyakaa ete nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattanti. tasmaa te mayaa eka.msikaa dhammaa desitaa pa~n~nattaa.

[03] 425^b^.^eb^ ``santi, po.t.thapaada, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `ekantasukhii attaa hoti arogo para.m mara.naa'ti. tyaaha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadaami -- `sacca.m kira tumhe aayasmanto eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- ``ekantasukhii attaa hoti arogo para.m mara.naa'ti? te ce me eva.m pu.t.thaa `aamaa'ti pa.tijaananti. tyaaha.m eva.m vadaami -- `api pana tumhe aayasmanto ekantasukha.m loka.m jaana.m passa.m viharathaa'ti? iti pu.t.thaa `no'ti vadanti.

[03] ``tyaaha.m eva.m vadaami -- `api pana tumhe aayasmanto eka.m vaa ratti.m eka.m vaa divasa.m upa.d.dha.m vaa ratti.m upa.d.dha.m vaa divasa.m ekantasukhi.m attaana.m sa~njaanaathaa'ti ^a^M1.0178^ea^ {sampajaanaathaati (sii0 syaa0 ka0)}? iti pu.t.thaa `no'ti vadanti. tyaaha.m eva.m vadaami -- `api pana tumhe aayasmanto ^a^T1.0238^ea^ jaanaatha -- ``aya.m maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaayaa'''ti? iti pu.t.thaa `no'ti vadanti.

[03] ``tyaaha.m eva.m vadaami -- `api pana tumhe aayasmanto yaa taa devataa ekantasukha.m loka.m upapannaa, taasa.m bhaasamaanaana.m sadda.m su.naatha -- ``suppa.tipannaattha, maarisaa, ujuppa.tipannaattha, maarisaa, ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaaya; mayampi hi, maarisaa, eva.mpa.tipannaa ekantasukha.m loka.m upapannaa'ti ^a^P1.0193^ea^? iti pu.t.thaa `no'ti vadanti.

[01] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, po.t.thapaada, nanu eva.m sante tesa.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti? ``addhaa kho, bhante, eva.m sante tesa.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti.

[03] 426^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, po.t.thapaada, puriso eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m yaa imasmi.m janapade janapadakalyaa.nii, ta.m icchaami ta.m kaamemii'ti. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ambho purisa, ya.m tva.m janapadakalyaa.ni.m icchasi kaamesi, jaanaasi ta.m janapadakalyaa.ni.m khattiyii vaa braahma.nii vaa vessii vaa suddii vaa'ti? iti pu.t.tho `no'ti vadeyya. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ambho purisa ^a^V1.0171^ea^, ya.m tva.m janapadakalyaa.ni.m icchasi kaamesi, jaanaasi ta.m janapadakalyaa.ni.m eva.mnaamaa eva.mgottaati vaa, diighaa vaa rassaa vaa majjhimaa vaa kaa.lii vaa saamaa vaa ma"nguracchavii vaati, amukasmi.m gaame vaa nigame vaa nagare vaa'ti? iti pu.t.tho `no'ti vadeyya. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ambho purisa, ya.m tva.m na jaanaasi na passasi, ta.m tva.m icchasi kaamesii'ti? iti pu.t.tho `aamaa'ti vadeyya.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi ^a^T1.0239^ea^, po.t.thapaada, nanu eva.m sante tassa purisassa appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti? ``addhaa kho, bhante, eva.m sante tassa purisassa appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti.

[03] ``evameva kho, po.t.thapaada, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `ekantasukhii attaa hoti arogo para.m mara.naa'ti. tyaaha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadaami -- `sacca.m kira tumhe aayasmanto eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino ^a^M1.0179^ea^ -- ``ekantasukhii attaa hoti arogo para.m mara.naa'''ti? te ce me eva.m pu.t.thaa `aamaa'ti pa.tijaananti. tyaaha.m eva.m vadaami -- `api pana tumhe aayasmanto ekantasukha.m loka.m jaana.m passa.m viharathaa'ti? iti ^a^P1.0194^ea^ pu.t.thaa `no'ti vadanti.

[03] ``tyaaha.m eva.m vadaami -- `api pana tumhe aayasmanto eka.m vaa ratti.m eka.m vaa divasa.m upa.d.dha.m vaa ratti.m upa.d.dha.m vaa divasa.m ekantasukhi.m attaana.m sa~njaanaathaa'ti? iti pu.t.thaa `no'ti vadanti. tyaaha.m eva.m vadaami -- `api pana tumhe aayasmanto jaanaatha -- ``aya.m maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaayaa'ti? iti pu.t.thaa `no'ti vadanti.

[03] ``tyaaha.m eva.m vadaami -- `api pana tumhe aayasmanto yaa taa devataa ekantasukha.m loka.m upapannaa, taasa.m bhaasamaanaana.m sadda.m su.naatha -- ``suppa.tipannaattha, maarisaa, ujuppa.tipannaattha, maarisaa, ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaaya; mayampi hi, maarisaa, eva.mpa.tipannaa ekantasukha.m loka.m upapannaa'''ti? iti pu.t.thaa `no'ti vadanti.

[01] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, po.t.thapaada, nanu eva.m sante tesa.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m ^a^T1.0240^ea^ ^a^V1.0172^ea^ sampajjatii''ti? ``addhaa kho, bhante, eva.m sante tesa.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti.

[03] 427^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, po.t.thapaada, puriso caatumahaapathe nisse.ni.m kareyya paasaadassa aaroha.naaya. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ambho purisa, yassa tva.m {ya.m tva.m (sii0 ka0)} paasaadassa aaroha.naaya nisse.ni.m karosi, jaanaasi ta.m paasaada.m puratthimaaya vaa disaaya dakkhi.naaya vaa disaaya pacchimaaya vaa disaaya uttaraaya vaa disaaya ucco vaa niico vaa majjhimo vaa'ti? iti pu.t.tho `no'ti vadeyya. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ambho purisa, ya.m tva.m na jaanaasi na passasi, tassa tva.m paasaadassa aaroha.naaya nisse.ni.m karosii'ti? iti pu.t.tho `aamaa'ti vadeyya.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, po.t.thapaada, nanu eva.m sante tassa purisassa appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti? ``addhaa kho, bhante, eva.m sante tassa purisassa appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti.

[03] ``tyaaha.m eva.m vadaami -- `api pana tumhe aayasmanto eka.m ^a^T1.0141^ea^ vaa ratti.m eka.m vaa divasa.m upa.d.dha.m vaa ratti.m upa.d.dha.m vaa divasa.m ekantasukhi.m attaana.m sa~njaanaathaa'ti? iti pu.t.thaa `no'ti vadanti. tyaaha.m eva.m vadaami -- `api pana tumhe aayasmanto jaanaatha aya.m maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa ekantasukhassa lokassa sacchikiriyaayaa'ti? iti pu.t.thaa `no'ti vadanti.

[03] 428^b^.^eb^ ``tayo kho me, po.t.thapaada, attapa.tilaabhaa -- o.laariko attapa.tilaabho, manomayo attapa.tilaabho, aruupo attapa.tilaabho. katamo ca, po.t.thapaada, o.laariko attapa.tilaabho? ruupii caatumahaabhuutiko kaba.liikaaraahaarabhakkho {kaba.liikaarabhakkho (syaa0 ka0)}, aya.m o.laariko attapa.tilaabho. katamo manomayo attapa.tilaabho? ruupii manomayo sabba"ngapacca"ngii ahiinindriyo, aya.m manomayo attapa.tilaabho. katamo aruupo attapa.tilaabho? aruupii sa~n~naamayo, aya.m aruupo attapa.tilaabho.

[03] 429^b^.^eb^ ``o.laarikassapi ^a^M1.0181^ea^ kho aha.m, po.t.thapaada, attapa.tilaabhassa pahaanaaya ^a^T1.0142^ea^ dhamma.m desemi -- yathaapa.tipannaana.m vo sa.mkilesikaa dhammaa pahiiyissanti, vodaaniyaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhissanti, pa~n~naapaaripuuri.m vepullatta~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissathaati. siyaa kho pana te, po.t.thapaada, evamassa -- sa.mkilesikaa dhammaa pahiiyissanti, vodaaniyaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhissanti, pa~n~naapaaripuuri.m vepullatta~nca di.t.theva ^a^P1.0196^ea^ dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissati, dukkho ca kho vihaaroti, na kho paneta.m, po.t.thapaada, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. sa.mkilesikaa ceva dhammaa pahiiyissanti, vodaaniyaa ca dhammaa abhiva.d.dhissanti, pa~n~naapaaripuuri.m vepullatta~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissati, paamujja.m ceva bhavissati piiti ca passaddhi ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca sukho ca vihaaro.

[03] 430^b^.^eb^ ``manomayassapi kho aha.m, po.t.thapaada, attapa.tilaabhassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m desemi yathaapa.tipannaana.m vo sa.mkilesikaa dhammaa pahiiyissanti, vodaaniyaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhissanti, pa~n~naapaaripuuri.m vepullatta~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissathaati ^a^V1.0174^ea^. siyaa kho pana te, po.t.thapaada, evamassa -- `sa.mkilesikaa dhammaa pahiiyissanti, vodaaniyaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhissanti, pa~n~naapaaripuuri.m vepullatta~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissati, dukkho ca kho vihaaro'ti, na kho paneta.m, po.t.thapaada, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. sa.mkilesikaa ceva dhammaa pahiiyissanti, vodaaniyaa ca dhammaa abhiva.d.dhissanti ^a^T1.0243^ea^, pa~n~naapaaripuuri.m vepullatta~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissati, paamujja.m ceva bhavissati piiti ca passaddhi ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca sukho ca vihaaro.

[03] 431^b^.^eb^ ``aruupassapi kho aha.m, po.t.thapaada, attapa.tilaabhassa pahaanaaya dhamma.m desemi yathaapa.tipannaana.m vo sa.mkilesikaa dhammaa pahiiyissanti, vodaaniyaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhissanti ^a^P1.0197^ea^, pa~n~naapaaripuuri.m vepullatta~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissathaati. siyaa kho pana te, po.t.thapaada, evamassa -- `sa.mkilesikaa dhammaa pahiiyissanti, vodaaniyaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhissanti, pa~n~naapaaripuuri.m vepullatta~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissati, dukkho ca kho vihaaro'ti, na kho paneta.m ^a^M1.0182^ea^, po.t.thapaada, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. sa.mkilesikaa ceva dhammaa pahiiyissanti, vodaaniyaa ca dhammaa abhiva.d.dhissanti, pa~n~naapaaripuuri.m vepullatta~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissati, paamujja.m ceva bhavissati piiti ca passaddhi ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca sukho ca vihaaro.

[03] 432^b^.^eb^ ``pare ce, po.t.thapaada, amhe eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `katamo pana so, aavuso ^a^T1.0244^ea^, o.laariko attapa.tilaabho, yassa tumhe pahaanaaya dhamma.m desetha, yathaapa.tipannaana.m vo sa.mkilesikaa dhammaa pahiiyissanti, vodaaniyaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhissanti, pa~n~naapaaripuuri.m vepullatta~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissathaa'ti, tesa.m maya.m eva.m pu.t.thaa eva.m byaakareyyaama -- `aya.m vaa so, aavuso, o.laariko attapa.tilaabho, yassa maya.m pahaanaaya dhamma.m desema, yathaapa.tipannaana.m vo sa.mkilesikaa dhammaa pahiiyissanti, vodaaniyaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhissanti, pa~n~naapaaripuuri.m vepullatta~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissathaa'ti.

[03] 433^b^.^eb^ ``pare ce, po.t.thapaada, amhe eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `katamo pana so, aavuso, manomayo attapa.tilaabho, yassa tumhe pahaanaaya dhamma.m desetha, yathaapa.tipannaana.m vo sa.mkilesikaa dhammaa ^a^V1.0175^ea^ pahiiyissanti, vodaaniyaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhissanti, pa~n~naapaaripuuri.m vepullatta~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissathaa'ti? tesa.m maya.m eva.m pu.t.thaa eva.m byaakareyyaama -- `aya.m vaa so, aavuso, manomayo attapa.tilaabho yassa maya.m pahaanaaya dhamma.m desema, yathaapa.tipannaana.m vo sa.mkilesikaa dhammaa pahiiyissanti, vodaaniyaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhissanti ^a^P1.0198^ea^, pa~n~naapaaripuuri.m vepullatta~nca di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissathaa'ti.

[03] 437^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte citto hatthisaariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``yasmi.m, bhante, samaye o.laariko attapa.tilaabho hoti, moghassa tasmi.m samaye manomayo attapa.tilaabho hoti, mogho aruupo attapa.tilaabho hoti; o.laariko vaassa attapa.tilaabho tasmi.m samaye sacco hoti. yasmi.m, bhante, samaye manomayo attapa.tilaabho hoti, moghassa tasmi.m samaye o.laariko attapa.tilaabho hoti, mogho aruupo attapa.tilaabho hoti; manomayo vaassa attapa.tilaabho tasmi.m samaye sacco hoti. yasmi.m, bhante, samaye aruupo attapa.tilaabho hoti, moghassa tasmi.m samaye o.laariko attapa.tilaabho hoti, mogho manomayo attapa.tilaabho hoti; aruupo vaassa attapa.tilaabho tasmi.m samaye sacco hotii''ti.

[03] ``yasmi.m, citta, samaye o.laariko attapa.tilaabho hoti, neva tasmi.m samaye manomayo attapa.tilaabhoti sa"nkha.m ^a^P1.0200^ea^ gacchati, na aruupo attapa.tilaabhoti sa"nkha.m gacchati ^a^T1.0246^ea^; o.laariko attapa.tilaabhotveva tasmi.m samaye sa"nkha.m gacchati. yasmi.m, citta, samaye manomayo attapa.tilaabho hoti, neva tasmi.m samaye o.laariko attapa.tilaabhoti sa"nkha.m gacchati, na aruupo attapa.tilaabhoti sa"nkha.m gacchati; manomayo attapa.tilaabhotveva tasmi.m samaye sa"nkha.m gacchati. yasmi.m, citta, samaye aruupo attapa.tilaabho hoti, neva tasmi.m samaye o.laariko attapa.tilaabhoti sa"nkha.m gacchati, na manomayo attapa.tilaabhoti sa"nkha.m gacchati; aruupo attapa.tilaabhotveva tasmi.m samaye sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] 438^b^.^eb^ ``sace ^a^V1.0177^ea^ ta.m, citta, eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `ahosi tva.m atiitamaddhaana.m, na tva.m naahosi; bhavissasi tva.m anaagatamaddhaana.m, na tva.m na bhavissasi; atthi tva.m ^a^M1.0185^ea^ etarahi, na tva.m natthii'ti, eva.m pu.t.tho tva.m, citta, kinti byaakareyyaasii''ti?

[03] ``sace ma.m, bhante, eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `ahosi tva.m atiitamaddhaana.m, na tva.m na ahosi; bhavissasi tva.m anaagatamaddhaana.m, na tva.m na bhavissasi; atthi tva.m etarahi, na tva.m natthii'ti. eva.m pu.t.tho aha.m, bhante, eva.m byaakareyya.m -- `ahosaaha.m atiitamaddhaana.m, naaha.m na ahosi.m; bhavissaamaha.m anaagatamaddhaana.m, naaha.m na bhavissaami; atthaaha.m etarahi, naaha.m natthii'ti. eva.m pu.t.tho aha.m, bhante, eva.m byaakareyya''nti.

[01] ``sace pana ta.m, citta, eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `yo te ahosi atiito attapa.tilaabho, sova {sveva (sii0 pii0), soyeva (syaa0)} te attapa.tilaabho sacco, mogho anaagato, mogho paccuppanno? yo {yo vaa (pii0)} te bhavissati anaagato attapa.tilaabho, sova ^a^T1.0247^ea^ te attapa.tilaabho sacco, mogho atiito, mogho paccuppanno? yo {yo vaa (pii0)} te etarahi paccuppanno attapa.tilaabho, sova {so ca (ka0)} te attapa.tilaabho sacco, mogho atiito, mogho anaagato'ti. eva.m pu.t.tho tva.m, citta, kinti byaakareyyaasii''ti?

[03] ``sace pana ma.m, bhante, eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `yo te ahosi ^a^P1.0201^ea^ atiito attapa.tilaabho, sova te attapa.tilaabho sacco, mogho anaagato, mogho paccuppanno. yo te bhavissati anaagato attapa.tilaabho, sova te attapa.tilaabho sacco, mogho atiito, mogho paccuppanno. yo te etarahi paccuppanno attapa.tilaabho, sova te attapa.tilaabho sacco, mogho atiito, mogho anaagato'ti. eva.m pu.t.tho aha.m, bhante, eva.m byaakareyya.m -- `yo me ahosi atiito attapa.tilaabho, sova me attapa.tilaabho tasmi.m samaye sacco ahosi, mogho anaagato, mogho paccuppanno. yo me bhavissati anaagato attapa.tilaabho, sova me attapa.tilaabho tasmi.m samaye sacco bhavissati, mogho atiito, mogho paccuppanno. yo me etarahi paccuppanno attapa.tilaabho, sova me attapa.tilaabho sacco, mogho atiito, mogho anaagato'ti. eva.m pu.t.tho aha.m, bhante, eva.m byaakareyya''nti.

[03] 439^b^.^eb^ ``evameva ^a^M1.0186^ea^ kho, citta, yasmi.m samaye o.laariko attapa.tilaabho hoti, neva tasmi.m samaye manomayo attapa.tilaabhoti sa"nkha.m gacchati, na aruupo attapa.tilaabhoti sa"nkha.m gacchati. o.laariko attapa.tilaabho tveva tasmi.m samaye sa"nkha.m gacchati. yasmi.m, citta, samaye manomayo attapa.tilaabho ^a^T1.0248^ea^ hoti...pe0... yasmi.m, citta, samaye aruupo attapa.tilaabho hoti, neva ^a^V1.0178^ea^ tasmi.m samaye o.laariko attapa.tilaabhoti sa"nkha.m gacchati, na manomayo attapa.tilaabhoti sa"nkha.m gacchati; aruupo attapa.tilaabho tveva tasmi.m samaye sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] 440^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, citta, gavaa khiira.m, khiiramhaa dadhi, dadhimhaa navaniita.m, navaniitamhaa sappi, sappimhaa sappima.n.do. yasmi.m samaye khiira.m hoti, neva tasmi.m samaye dadhiiti sa"nkha.m gacchati, na navaniitanti sa"nkha.m gacchati, na sappiiti sa"nkha.m gacchati, na sappima.n.doti sa"nkha.m gacchati; khiira.m tveva tasmi.m samaye sa"nkha.m gacchati. yasmi.m samaye dadhi hoti...pe0... navaniita.m hoti... sappi hoti... sappima.n.do hoti, neva tasmi.m samaye khiiranti sa"nkha.m gacchati, na dadhiiti sa"nkha.m gacchati, na navaniitanti sa"nkha.m gacchati, na sappiiti sa"nkha.m gacchati; sappima.n.do tveva tasmi.m samaye sa"nkha.m gacchati. evameva ^a^P1.0202^ea^ kho, citta, yasmi.m samaye o.laariko attapa.tilaabho hoti...pe0... yasmi.m, citta, samaye manomayo attapa.tilaabho hoti...pe0... yasmi.m, citta, samaye aruupo attapa.tilaabho hoti, neva tasmi.m samaye o.laariko attapa.tilaabhoti sa"nkha.m gacchati, na manomayo attapa.tilaabhoti sa"nkha.m gacchati; aruupo attapa.tilaabho tveva tasmi.m samaye sa"nkha.m gacchati. imaa kho citta, lokasama~n~naa lokaniruttiyo lokavohaaraa lokapa~n~nattiyo ^a^T1.0249^ea^, yaahi tathaagato voharati aparaamasa''nti.

[03] 441^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, po.t.thapaado paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante! abhikkanta.m, bhante, seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti. evameva.m bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.

[03] 442^b^.^eb^ citto ^a^M1.0187^ea^ pana hatthisaariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante; abhikkanta.m, bhante! seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti. evameva.m bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m ^a^V1.0179^ea^ sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti.

[03] 443^b^.^eb^ alattha kho citto hatthisaariputto bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, alattha upasampada.m. aciruupasampanno kho panaayasmaa citto hatthisaariputto eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto na cirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m ^a^P1.0203^ea^ pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti -- abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro kho panaayasmaa citto hatthisaariputto arahata.m ahosiiti.
[06] po.t.thapaadasutta.m ni.t.thita.m navama.m.

[03] 444^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0188^ea^ ^a^V1.0180^ea^ ^a^P1.0204^ea^ ^a^T1.0250^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa aanando saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame aciraparinibbute bhagavati. tena kho pana samayena subho maa.navo todeyyaputto saavatthiya.m pa.tivasati kenacideva kara.niiyena.

[03] 445^b^.^eb^ atha kho subho maa.navo todeyyaputto a~n~natara.m maa.navaka.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, maa.navaka, yena sama.no aanando tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena sama.na.m aananda.m appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m puccha -- `subho maa.navo todeyyaputto bhavanta.m aananda.m appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchatii'ti. eva~nca vadehi -- `saadhu kira bhava.m aanando yena subhassa maa.navassa todeyyaputtassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa'''ti.

[03] 446^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m, bho''ti kho so maa.navako subhassa maa.navassa todeyyaputtassa pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so maa.navako aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``subho maa.navo todeyyaputto bhavanta.m aananda.m appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchati; eva~nca vadeti -- `saadhu kira bhava.m aanando yena subhassa maa.navassa todeyyaputtassa ^a^P1.0205^ea^ nivesana.m ^a^T1.0251^ea^ tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa'''ti.

[03] 447^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, aayasmaa aanando ta.m maa.navaka.m etadavoca -- ``akaalo kho, maa.navaka ^a^V1.0181^ea^. atthi me ajja bhesajjamattaa piitaa. appevanaama svepi upasa"nkameyyaama kaala~nca samaya~nca upaadaayaa''ti.

[03] ``eva.m, bho''ti kho so maa.navako aayasmato aanandassa pa.tissutvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa yena subho maa.navo todeyyaputto tenupasa"nkami ^a^M1.0189^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa subha.m maa.nava.m todeyyaputta.m etadavoca, ``avocumhaa kho maya.m bhoto vacanena ta.m bhavanta.m aananda.m -- `subho maa.navo todeyyaputto bhavanta.m aananda.m appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchati, eva~nca vadeti -- ``saadhu kira bhava.m aanando yena subhassa maa.navassa todeyyaputtassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa'''ti. eva.m vutte, bho, sama.no aanando ma.m etadavoca -- `akaalo kho, maa.navaka. atthi me ajja bhesajjamattaa piitaa. appevanaama svepi upasa"nkameyyaama kaala~nca samaya~nca upaadaayaa'ti. ettaavataapi kho, bho, katameva eta.m, yato kho so bhava.m aanando okaasamakaasi svaatanaayapi upasa"nkamanaayaa''ti.

[03] 448^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa aanando tassaa rattiyaa accayena pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya cetakena bhikkhunaa pacchaasama.nena yena subhassa maa.navassa todeyyaputtassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi.

[03] atha kho subho ^a^T1.0252^ea^ maa.navo todeyyaputto yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho subho maa.navo todeyyaputto aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``bhava~nhi ^a^P1.0206^ea^ aanando tassa bhoto gotamassa diigharatta.m upa.t.thaako santikaavacaro samiipacaarii. bhavameta.m aanando jaaneyya, yesa.m so bhava.m gotamo dhammaana.m va.n.navaadii ahosi, yattha ca ima.m janata.m samaadapesi nivesesi pati.t.thaapesi. katamesaana.m kho, bho aananda, dhammaana.m so bhava.m gotamo va.n.navaadii ahosi; kattha ca ima.m janata.m samaadapesi nivesesi pati.t.thaapesii''ti?

[03] 449^b^.^eb^ ``ti.n.na.m kho, maa.nava, khandhaana.m so bhagavaa va.n.navaadii ahosi; ettha ca ima.m janata.m samaadapesi nivesesi pati.t.thaapesi. katamesa.m ti.n.na.m? ariyassa siilakkhandhassa, ariyassa samaadhikkhandhassa, ariyassa pa~n~naakkhandhassa. imesa.m kho, maa.nava, ti.n.na.m khandhaana.m so bhagavaa va.n.navaadii ahosi; ettha ca ima.m janata.m samaadapesi nivesesi pati.t.thaapesii''ti.

[03] 450^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ^a^M1.0190^ea^ ^a^V1.0182^ea^ pana so, bho aananda, ariyo siilakkhandho, yassa so bhava.m gotamo va.n.navaadii ahosi, yattha ca ima.m janata.m samaadapesi nivesesi pati.t.thaapesii''ti?

[03] ``idha, maa.nava, tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. ta.m dhamma.m ^a^T1.0253^ea^ su.naati gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa a~n~natarasmi.m vaa kule paccaajaato. so ta.m dhamma.m sutvaa tathaagate saddha.m pa.tilabhati. so tena saddhaapa.tilaabhena samannaagato iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `sambaadho gharaavaaso rajopatho, abbhokaaso pabbajjaa, nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya'nti. so aparena samayena appa.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya mahanta.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya appa.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya mahanta.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati. so eva.m pabbajito samaano paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati, aacaaragocarasampanno, anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu, kaayakammavaciikammena samannaagato kusalena, parisuddhaajiivo, siilasampanno, indriyesu guttadvaaro, satisampaja~n~nena samannaagato, santu.t.tho.

[03] 451^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, maa.nava, bhikkhu siilasampanno hoti? idha, maa.nava, bhikkhu paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, nihitada.n.do nihitasattho lajjii dayaapanno, sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii viharati. yampi, maa.nava, bhikkhu paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, nihitada.n.do nihitasattho lajjii dayaapanno, sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii ^a^M1.0191^ea^ ^a^T1.0254^ea^ viharati; idampissa hoti siilasmi.m. (yathaa 194 yaava 210 anucchedesu eva.m vitthaaretabba.m).

[03] ``yathaa vaa paneke bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa saddhaadeyyaani bhojanaani bhu~njitvaa te evaruupaaya ^a^V1.0183^ea^ tiracchaanavijjaaya micchaajiivena jiivita.m kappenti, seyyathida.m -- santikamma.m pa.nidhikamma.m bhuutakamma.m bhuurikamma.m vassakamma.m vossakamma.m vatthukamma.m vatthuparikamma.m aacamana.m nhaapana.m juhana.m vamana.m virecana.m uddha.mvirecana.m adhovirecana.m siisavirecana.m ka.n.natela.m nettatappana.m natthukamma.m a~njana.m pacca~njana.m saalaakiya.m sallakattiya.m daarakatikicchaa muulabhesajjaana.m anuppadaana.m osadhiina.m pa.timokkho iti vaa iti evaruupaaya tiracchaanavijjaaya micchaajiivaa pa.tivirato hoti. yampi, maa.nava, bhikkhu yathaa vaa paneke bhonto sama.nabraahma.naa saddhaadeyyaani bhojanaani bhu~njitvaa te evaruupaaya tiracchaanavijjaaya micchaajiivena jiivita.m kappenti, seyyathida.m, santikamma.m pa.nidhikamma.m...pe0... osadhiina.m pa.timokkho iti vaa iti evaruupaaya tiracchaanavijjaaya micchaajiivaa pa.tivirato hoti. idampissa hoti siilasmi.m.

[03] 452^b^.^eb^ ``sa kho so {aya.m kho so (ka0)}, maa.nava, bhikkhu eva.m siilasampanno na kutoci bhaya.m samanupassati, yadida.m siilasa.mvarato. seyyathaapi, maa.nava, raajaa khattiyo muddhaavasitto nihatapaccaamitto na kutoci bhaya.m samanupassati, yadida.m paccatthikato. evameva kho, maa.nava, bhikkhu eva.m siilasampanno na kutoci bhaya.m samanupassati, yadida.m siilasa.mvarato. so iminaa ariyena siilakkhandhena samannaagato ajjhatta.m anavajjasukha.m ^a^T1.0255^ea^ pa.tisa.mvedeti. eva.m kho, maa.nava, bhikkhu siilasampanno hoti.

[03] 453^b^.^eb^ ``aya.m kho so, maa.nava, ariyo siilakkhandho yassa so bhagavaa va.n.navaadii ahosi, yattha ca ima.m janata.m samaadapesi nivesesi pati.t.thaapesi. atthi cevettha uttarikara.niiya''nti.

[03] ``acchariya.m, bho aananda, abbhuta.m, bho aananda! so caaya.m, bho aananda, ariyo siilakkhandho paripu.n.no, no aparipu.n.no. eva.m paripu.n.na.m caaha.m, bho, aananda, ariya.m siilakkhandha.m ^a^P1.0207^ea^ ito bahiddhaa a~n~nesu sama.nabraahma.nesu na ^a^M1.0192^ea^ samanupassaami. eva.m paripu.n.na~nca, bho aananda, ariya.m siilakkhandha.m ito bahiddhaa a~n~ne sama.nabraahma.naa attani samanupasseyyu.m, te taavatakeneva attamanaa assu -- `alamettaavataa, katamettaavataa, anuppatto no saama~n~nattho, natthi no ki~nci uttarikara.niiya'nti. atha ca pana bhava.m aanando evamaaha -- `atthi cevettha uttarikara.niiya'''nti {imassa anantara.m sii0 pii0 potthakesu ``pa.thamabhaa.navaara.m''ti paa.tho dissati}.
[03] 454^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ^a^V1.0184^ea^ pana so, bho aananda, ariyo samaadhikkhandho, yassa so bhava.m gotamo va.n.navaadii ahosi, yattha ca ima.m janata.m samaadapesi nivesesi pati.t.thaapesii''ti?

[03] ``katha~nca, maa.nava, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvaaro hoti? idha, maa.nava, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii; yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. sotena ^a^T1.0256^ea^ sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii; yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati manindriya.m, manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. so iminaa ariyena indriyasa.mvarena samannaagato ajjhatta.m abyaasekasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. eva.m kho, maa.nava, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvaaro hoti.

[03] 455^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, maa.nava, bhikkhu satisampaja~n~nena samannaagato hoti? idha, maa.nava, bhikkhu abhikkante pa.tikkante sampajaanakaarii hoti, aalokite vilokite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sami~njite pasaarite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne sampajaanakaarii hoti, asite piite khaayite saayite sampajaanakaarii hoti, uccaarapassaavakamme sampajaanakaarii hoti, gate .thite nisinne ^a^M1.0193^ea^ sutte jaagarite bhaasite tu.nhiibhaave sampajaanakaarii hoti. eva.m kho, maa.nava, bhikkhu satisampaja~n~nena samannaagato hoti.

[03] 456^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, maa.nava, bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti? idha, maa.nava, bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti kaayaparihaarikena ciivarena kucchiparihaarikena pi.n.dapaatena. so yena yeneva pakkamati, samaadaayeva pakkamati. seyyathaapi, maa.nava, pakkhii saku.no yena yeneva .deti, sapattabhaarova .deti ^a^T1.0257^ea^; evameva kho, maa.nava, bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti kaayaparihaarikena ciivarena kucchiparihaarikena pi.n.dapaatena. so yena yeneva pakkamati, samaadaayeva pakkamati. eva.m kho, maa.nava, bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti.

[03] 457^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^V1.0185^ea^ iminaa ca ariyena siilakkhandhena samannaagato, iminaa ca ariyena indriyasa.mvarena samannaagato, iminaa ca ariyena satisampaja~n~nena samannaagato, imaaya ca ariyaaya santu.t.thiyaa samannaagato vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m. so pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatappa.tikkanto nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa, uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya, parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa.

[03] 458^b^.^eb^ ``so abhijjha.m loke pahaaya vigataabhijjhena cetasaa viharati abhijjhaaya citta.m parisodheti. byaapaadapadosa.m pahaaya abyaapannacitto viharati sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii byaapaadapadosaa citta.m parisodheti. thinamiddha.m pahaaya vigatathinamiddho viharati aalokasa~n~nii sato sampajaano, thinamiddhaa citta.m parisodheti. uddhaccakukkucca.m pahaaya anuddhato viharati ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto uddhaccakukkuccaa citta.m parisodheti. vicikiccha.m pahaaya ti.n.navicikiccho viharati akatha.mkathii kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchaaya citta.m parisodheti.

[03] 459^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, maa.nava, puriso i.na.m aadaaya kammante payojeyya. tassa te kammantaa samijjheyyu.m. so yaani ca poraa.naani i.namuulaani taani ca byanti.m kareyya, siyaa cassa uttari.m avasi.t.tha.m ^a^T1.0258^ea^ daarabhara.naaya. tassa evamassa -- `aha.m kho pubbe i.na.m aadaaya kammante payojesi.m ^a^M1.0194^ea^. tassa me te kammantaa samijjhi.msu. soha.m yaani ca poraa.naani i.namuulaani taani ca byanti.m akaasi.m, atthi ca me uttari.m avasi.t.tha.m daarabhara.naayaa'ti. so tatonidaana.m labhetha paamojja.m, adhigaccheyya somanassa.m.

[03] 460^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, maa.nava, puriso aabaadhiko assa dukkhito baa.lhagilaano; bhatta~ncassa nacchaadeyya, na cassa kaaye balamattaa. so aparena samayena tamhaa aabaadhaa mucceyya, bhatta~ncassa chaadeyya, siyaa cassa kaaye balamattaa. tassa evamassa -- `aha.m kho pubbe aabaadhiko ahosi.m dukkhito baa.lhagilaano, bhatta~nca me nacchaadesi, na ca me aasi kaaye balamattaa. somhi etarahi tamhaa aabaadhaa mutto bhatta~nca me chaadeti, atthi ca me kaaye balamattaa'ti. so tatonidaana.m labhetha paamojja.m, adhigaccheyya somanassa.m.

[03] 461^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, maa.nava, puriso bandhanaagaare baddho assa. so aparena samayena tamhaa bandhanaagaaraa mucceyya sotthinaa abbhayena, na cassa ki~nci bhogaana.m vayo. tassa evamassa -- `aha.m kho pubbe bandhanaagaare baddho ahosi.m. somhi etarahi tamhaa bandhanaagaaraa mutto ^a^V1.0186^ea^ sotthinaa abbhayena, natthi ca me ki~nci bhogaana.m vayo'ti. so tatonidaana.m labhetha paamojja.m, adhigaccheyya somanassa.m.

[03] 462^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, maa.nava, puriso daaso assa anattaadhiino paraadhiino na yenakaama.mgamo. so aparena samayena tamhaa daasabyaa mucceyya, attaadhiino ^a^T1.0259^ea^ aparaadhiino bhujisso yenakaama.mgamo. tassa evamassa -- `aha.m kho pubbe daaso ahosi.m anattaadhiino paraadhiino na yenakaama.mgamo. somhi etarahi tamhaa daasabyaa mutto attaadhiino aparaadhiino bhujisso yenakaama.mgamo'ti. so tatonidaana.m labhetha paamojja.m, adhigaccheyya somanassa.m.

[03] 463^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, maa.nava, puriso sadhano sabhogo kantaaraddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajjeyya dubbhikkha.m sappa.tibhaya.m. so aparena samayena ta.m kantaara.m nitthareyya, sotthinaa gaamanta.m anupaapu.neyya khema.m appa.tibhaya.m. tassa evamassa ^a^M1.0195^ea^ -- `aha.m kho pubbe sadhano sabhogo kantaaraddhaanamagga.m pa.tipajji.m dubbhikkha.m sappa.tibhaya.m. somhi etarahi kantaara.m nitthi.n.no, sotthinaa gaamanta.m anuppatto khema.m appa.tibhaya'nti. so tatonidaana.m labhetha paamojja.m, adhigaccheyya somanassa.m.

[03] 464^b^.^eb^ ``evameva kho, maa.nava, bhikkhu yathaa i.na.m yathaa roga.m yathaa bandhanaagaara.m yathaa daasabya.m yathaa kantaaraddhaanamagga.m, eva.m ime pa~nca niivara.ne appahiine attani samanupassati.

[03] 465^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, maa.nava, yathaa aa.na.nya.m yathaa aarogya.m yathaa bandhanaamokkha.m yathaa bhujissa.m yathaa khemantabhuumi.m. evameva bhikkhu ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahiine attani samanupassati.

[03] 466^b^.^eb^ ``tassime pa~nca niivara.ne pahiine attani samanupassato paamojja.m jaayati, pamuditassa piiti jaayati, piitimanassa kaayo passambhati, passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedeti, sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati.

[03] 467^b^.^eb^ ``so vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so ^a^T1.0260^ea^ imameva kaaya.m vivekajena piitisukhena ^a^V1.0187^ea^ abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa vivekajena piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, maa.nava, dakkho nhaapako vaa nhaapakantevaasii vaa ka.msathaale nhaaniiyacu.n.naani aakiritvaa udakena paripphosaka.m paripphosaka.m sandeyya. saaya.m nhaaniiyapi.n.di snehaanugataa snehaparetaa santarabaahiraa phu.taa snehena, na ca pagghara.nii. evameva kho, maa.nava, bhikkhu imameva kaaya.m vivekajena piitisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa vivekajena piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. yampi, maa.nava, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imameva kaaya.m vivekajena piitisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa ^a^M1.0196^ea^ vivekajena piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. idampissa hoti samaadhismi.m.

[03] 468^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, maa.nava, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imameva kaaya.m samaadhijena piitisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa samaadhijena piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^P1.0208^ea^, maa.nava, udakarahado gambhiiro ubbhidodako. tassa nevassa puratthimaaya disaaya udakassa aayamukha.m, na dakkhi.naaya disaaya udakassa aayamukha.m, na pacchimaaya disaaya udakassa aayamukha.m, na uttaraaya disaaya udakassa ^a^T1.0261^ea^ aayamukha.m, devo ca na kaalena kaala.m sammaa dhaara.m anupaveccheyya. atha kho tamhaava udakarahadaa siitaa vaaridhaaraa ubbhijjitvaa tameva udakarahada.m siitena vaarinaa abhisandeyya parisandeyya paripuureyya paripphareyya, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato udakarahadassa siitena vaarinaa apphu.ta.m assa. evameva kho, maa.nava, bhikkhu...pe0... yampi, maa.nava, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa... pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati, so imameva kaaya.m samaadhijena piitisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa samaadhijena piitisukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. idampissa hoti samaadhismi.m.

[03] 469^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, maa.nava, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato sampajaano ^a^V1.0188^ea^, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- ``upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii''ti, tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imameva kaaya.m nippiitikena sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa nippiitikena sukhena apphu.ta.m hoti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, maa.nava, uppaliniya.m vaa paduminiya.m vaa pu.n.dariikiniya.m vaa appekaccaani uppalaani vaa padumaani vaa pu.n.dariikaani vaa udake jaataani udake sa.mva.d.dhaani udakaanuggataani antonimuggaposiini, taani yaava caggaa yaava ca muulaa siitena vaarinaa abhisannaani parisannaani paripuuraani paripphu.taani, naassa ki~nci sabbaavata.m uppalaana.m vaa padumaana.m vaa pu.n.dariikaana.m vaa ^a^M1.0197^ea^ ^a^T1.0262^ea^ siitena vaarinaa apphu.ta.m assa. evameva kho, maa.nava, bhikkhu...pe0... yampi, maa.nava, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imameva kaaya.m nippiitikena sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripuureti parippharati, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa nippiitikena sukhena apphu.ta.m hoti. idampissa hoti samaadhismi.m.

[03] 470^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, maa.nava, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imameva kaaya.m parisuddhena cetasaa pariyodaatena pharitvaa nisinno hoti; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa parisuddhena cetasaa pariyodaatena apphu.ta.m hoti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, maa.nava, puriso odaatena vatthena sasiisa.m paarupitvaa nisinno assa, naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa odaatena vatthena apphu.ta.m assa. evameva kho, maa.nava, bhikkhu...pe0... yampi, maa.nava, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imameva kaaya.m parisuddhena cetasaa pariyodaatena pharitvaa nisinno hoti; naassa ki~nci sabbaavato kaayassa parisuddhena cetasaa pariyodaatena apphu.ta.m hoti. idampissa hoti samaadhismi.m.

[03] 471^b^.^eb^ ``aya.m kho so, maa.nava, ariyo samaadhikkhandho yassa so bhagavaa va.n.navaadii ahosi ^a^V1.0189^ea^, yattha ca ima.m janata.m samaadapesi nivesesi pati.t.thaapesi. atthi cevettha uttarikara.niiya''nti.

[03] ``acchariya.m, bho aananda, abbhuta.m, bho ^a^T1.0262^ea^ aananda! so caaya.m, bho aananda, ariyo samaadhikkhandho paripu.n.no, no aparipu.n.no. eva.m paripu.n.na.m caaha.m, bho aananda, ariya.m samaadhikkhandha.m ito bahiddhaa a~n~nesu sama.nabraahma.nesu na samanupassaami. eva.m paripu.n.na~nca, bho aananda, ariya.m samaadhikkhandha.m ito bahiddhaa a~n~ne sama.nabraahma.naa attani samanupasseyyu.m, te taavatakeneva attamanaa assu -- `alamettaavataa, katamettaavataa, anuppatto no saama~n~nattho, natthi no ki~nci uttarikara.niiya'nti. atha ca pana bhava.m aanando evamaaha -- `atthi cevettha uttarikara.niiya'''nti.

[03] 472^b^.^eb^ ``katamo ^a^M1.0198^ea^ pana so, bho aananda, ariyo pa~n~naakkhandho, yassa bho bhava.m gotamo va.n.navaadii ahosi, yattha ca ima.m janata.m samaadapesi nivesesi pati.t.thaapesii''ti?

[03] ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte ~naa.nadassanaaya citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `aya.m kho me kaayo ruupii caatumahaabhuutiko maataapettikasambhavo odanakummaasuupacayo aniccucchaadanaparimaddanabhedanaviddha.msanadhammo; ida~nca pana me vi~n~naa.na.m ettha sita.m ettha pa.tibaddha'nti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, maa.nava, ma.ni ve.luriyo subho jaatimaa a.t.tha.mso suparikammakato accho vippasanno anaavilo sabbaakaarasampanno. tatraassa sutta.m aavuta.m niila.m vaa piita.m vaa lohita.m vaa odaata.m vaa pa.n.dusutta.m vaa. tamena.m cakkhumaa puriso hatthe karitvaa paccavekkheyya -- `aya.m kho ma.ni ve.luriyo subho jaatimaa a.t.tha.mso ^a^T1.0264^ea^ suparikammakato accho vippasanno anaavilo sabbaakaarasampanno. tatrida.m sutta.m aavuta.m niila.m vaa piita.m vaa lohita.m vaa odaata.m vaa pa.n.dusutta.m vaa'ti. evameva kho, maa.nava, bhikkhu eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte ~naa.nadassanaaya citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `aya.m kho me kaayo ruupii caatumahaabhuutiko ^a^V1.0190^ea^ maataapettikasambhavo odanakummaasuupacayo aniccucchaadanaparimaddanabhedana-viddha.msanadhammo. ida~nca pana me vi~n~naa.na.m ettha sita.m ettha pa.tibaddha'nti. yampi, maa.nava, bhikkhu eva.m samaahite citte...pe0... ^a^P1.0209^ea^ aane~njappatte ~naa.nadassanaaya citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti. so eva.m pajaanaati...pe0... ettha pa.tibaddhanti. idampissa hoti pa~n~naaya.

[03] 473^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte manomaya.m kaaya.m abhinimmaanaaya citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti. so imamhaa kaayaa a~n~na.m kaaya.m abhinimminaati ruupi.m manomaya.m sabba"ngapacca"ngi.m ahiinindriya.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M1.0199^ea^, maa.nava, puriso mu~njamhaa iisika.m pavaaheyya. tassa evamassa -- `aya.m mu~njo aya.m iisikaa; a~n~no mu~njo a~n~naa iisikaa; mu~njamhaa tveva iisikaa pavaa.lhaa'ti. seyyathaa vaa pana, maa.nava, puriso asi.m kosiyaa pavaaheyya. tassa evamassa -- `aya.m asi, aya.m kosi; a~n~no asi, a~n~naa kosi; kosiyaa tveva asi pavaa.lho'ti. seyyathaa vaa pana, maa.nava, puriso ahi.m kara.n.daa uddhareyya. tassa evamassa -- `aya.m ahi, aya.m kara.n.do; a~n~no ahi, a~n~no kara.n.do; kara.n.daa tveva ahi ubbhato'ti ^a^T1.0265^ea^. evameva kho, maa.nava, bhikkhu...pe0... yampi, maa.nava, bhikkhu eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte manomaya.m kaaya.m abhinimmaanaaya citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti...pe0.... idampissa hoti pa~n~naaya.

[03] 474^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte iddhividhaaya citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti. so anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti. ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hoti. aavibhaava.m tirobhaava.m tiroku.t.ta.m tiropaakaara.m tiropabbata.m asajjamaano gacchati seyyathaapi aakaase. pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m karoti, seyyathaapi udake. udakepi abhijjamaane gacchati seyyathaapi pathaviya.m. aakaasepi palla"nkena kamati seyyathaapi pakkhii saku.no. imepi candimasuuriye eva.m mahiddhike eva.m mahaanubhaave paa.ninaa paraamasati parimajjati. yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^V1.0191^ea^, maa.nava, dakkho kumbhakaaro vaa kumbhakaarantevaasii vaa suparikammakataaya mattikaaya ya~n~nadeva bhaajanavikati.m aaka"nkheyya, ta.m tadeva kareyya abhinipphaadeyya. seyyathaa vaa pana, maa.nava, dakkho dantakaaro vaa dantakaarantevaasii vaa suparikammakatasmi.m dantasmi.m ya~n~nadeva dantavikati.m aaka"nkheyya, ta.m tadeva kareyya abhinipphaadeyya. seyyathaa vaa pana, maa.nava, dakkho suva.n.nakaaro vaa suva.n.nakaarantevaasii vaa suparikammakatasmi.m suva.n.nasmi.m ^a^T1.0266^ea^ ya~n~nadeva suva.n.navikati.m aaka"nkheyya, ta.m tadeva kareyya abhinipphaadeyya. evameva kho, maa.nava, bhikkhu ^a^M1.0200^ea^ ...pe0... yampi maa.nava bhikkhu eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte iddhividhaaya citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti. so anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti. ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti ...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteti. idampissa hoti pa~n~naaya.

[03] 475^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte...pe0... aane~njappatte dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti. so dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya ubho sadde su.naati dibbe ca maanuse ca ye duure santike ca. seyyathaapi, maa.nava, puriso addhaanamaggappa.tipanno. so su.neyya bherisaddampi mudi"ngasaddampi sa"nkhapa.navadindimasaddampi. tassa evamassa -- `bherisaddo itipi mudi"ngasaddo itipi sa"nkhapa.navadindimasaddo iti'pi {itipiiti (ka0)}. evameva kho, maa.nava, bhikkhu...pe0.... yampi maa.nava, bhikkhu eva.m samaahite citte...pe0... aane~njappatte dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti. so dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya ubho sadde su.naati ^a^T1.0267^ea^ dibbe ca maanuse ca ye duure santike ca. idampissa hoti pa~n~naaya.

[03] 476^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte cetopariya~naa.naaya citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti. so parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaati, `saraaga.m vaa citta.m saraaga.m citta'nti pajaanaati, `viitaraaga.m vaa citta.m viitaraaga.m citta'nti pajaanaati, `sadosa.m vaa citta.m sadosa.m citta'nti pajaanaati, `viitadosa.m vaa citta.m viitadosa.m citta'nti pajaanaati, `samoha.m vaa citta.m samoha.m citta'nti pajaanaati, `viitamoha.m vaa citta.m viitamoha.m citta'nti pajaanaati, `sa"nkhitta.m vaa citta.m sa"nkhitta.m citta'nti pajaanaati, `vikkhitta.m vaa citta.m vikkhitta.m citta'nti pajaanaati, `mahaggata.m vaa citta.m mahaggata.m citta'nti pajaanaati, `amahaggata.m vaa citta.m amahaggata.m citta'nti pajaanaati, `sauttara.m vaa citta.m sauttara.m citta'nti pajaanaati, `anuttara.m vaa citta.m anuttara.m citta'nti ^a^V1.0192^ea^ pajaanaati, `samaahita.m vaa citta.m samaahita.m citta'nti pajaanaati, `asamaahita.m vaa citta.m asamaahita.m citta'nti pajaanaati, `vimutta.m ^a^M1.0201^ea^ vaa citta.m vimutta.m citta'nti pajaanaati, `avimutta.m vaa citta.m avimutta.m citta'nti pajaanaati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, maa.nava, itthii vaa puriso vaa daharo yuvaa ma.n.danajaatiko aadaase vaa parisuddhe pariyodaate acche vaa udakapatte saka.m mukhanimitta.m paccavekkhamaano saka.nika.m vaa saka.nikanti ^a^T1.0268^ea^ jaaneyya, aka.nika.m vaa aka.nikanti jaaneyya. evameva kho, maa.nava, bhikkhu...pe0... yampi, maa.nava, bhikkhu eva.m samaahite...pe0... aane~njappatte cetopariya~naa.naaya citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti. so parasattaana.m purapuggalaana.m cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaati, saraaga.m vaa citta.m saraaga.m cittanti pajaanaati...pe0... avimutta.m vaa citta.m avimutta.m cittanti pajaanaati. idampissa hoti pa~n~naaya.

[03] 477^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte...pe0... aane~njappatte pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti. so anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. seyyathida.m, ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto. so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto; so tato cuto idhuupapanno'ti. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, maa.nava, puriso sakamhaa gaamaa a~n~na.m gaama.m gaccheyya; tamhaapi gaamaa a~n~na.m gaama.m gaccheyya; so tamhaa gaamaa saka.myeva gaama.m paccaagaccheyya ^a^T1.0269^ea^. tassa evamassa -- `aha.m kho sakamhaa gaamaa amu.m gaama.m agacchi.m, tatra eva.m a.t.thaasi.m eva.m nisiidi.m eva.m abhaasi.m eva.m tu.nhii ahosi.m. so tamhaapi gaamaa amu.m gaama.m gacchi.m, tatraapi eva.m a.t.thaasi.m eva.m nisiidi.m eva.m abhaasi.m eva.m tu.nhii ahosi.m. somhi tamhaa gaamaa saka.myeva gaama.m paccaagato'ti. evameva kho, maa.nava, bhikkhu...pe0... yampi, maa.nava, bhikkhu eva.m ^a^M1.0202^ea^ samaahite citte...pe0... aane~njappatte pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti ^a^V1.0193^ea^. so anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. idampissa hoti pa~n~naaya.

[03] 478^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte...pe0... aane~njappatte sattaana.m cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti. so dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate, yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati -- `ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa. te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa. ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa ^a^T1.0270^ea^ vaciisucaritena samannaagataa manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa. te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa'ti. iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate, yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati.
