[03] ``seyyathaapi, maa.nava, majjhesi"nghaa.take paasaado, tattha cakkhumaa puriso .thito passeyya manusse geha.m pavisantepi nikkhamantepi rathikaayapi viithi.m sa~ncarante majjhesi"nghaa.take nisinnepi. tassa evamassa -- `ete manussaa geha.m pavisanti, ete nikkhamanti, ete rathikaaya viithi.m sa~ncaranti, ete majjhesi"nghaa.take nisinnaa'ti. evameva kho, maa.nava, bhikkhu...pe0... yampi, maa.nava, bhikkhu eva.m samaahite citte...pe0... aane~njappatte sattaana.m cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti. so dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate, yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati. idampissa hoti pa~n~naaya.

[03] 479^b^.^eb^ ``so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya ^a^M1.0203^ea^ citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti. so ida.m dukkhanti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, aya.m dukkhasamudayoti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, aya.m dukkhanirodhoti ^a^T1.0271^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaati yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; ime aasavaati yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, aya.m aasavasamudayoti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, aya.m aasavanirodhoti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati ^a^V1.0194^ea^, aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaati yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, maa.nava, pabbatasa"nkhepe udakarahado accho vippasanno anaavilo. tattha cakkhumaa puriso tiire .thito passeyya sippikasambukampi sakkharakathalampi macchagumbampi carantampi ti.t.thantampi. tassa evamassa -- `aya.m kho udakarahado accho vippasanno anaavilo. tatrime sippikasambukaapi sakkharakathalaapi macchagumbaapi carantipi ti.t.thantipii'ti. evameva kho, maa.nava, bhikkhu...pe0... yampi, maa.nava, bhikkhu eva.m samaahite citte...pe0... aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti. so ida.m dukkhanti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0... aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaati yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti, `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati ^a^T1.0272^ea^. idampissa hoti pa~n~naaya.

[03] 480^b^.^eb^ ``aya.m kho, so maa.nava, ariyo pa~n~naakkhandho yassa so bhagavaa va.n.navaadii ahosi, yattha ca ima.m janata.m samaadapesi nivesesi pati.t.thaapesi. natthi cevettha uttarikara.niiya''nti.

[03] ``acchariya.m ^a^P1.0210^ea^, bho aananda, abbhuta.m, bho aananda! so caaya.m, bho aananda, ariyo pa~n~naakkhandho paripu.n.no, no aparipu.n.no. eva.m paripu.n.na.m caaha.m, bho aananda, ariya.m pa~n~naakkhandha.m ito bahiddhaa a~n~nesu sama.nabraahma.nesu na samanupassaami. natthi ^a^M1.0204^ea^ cevettha {na samanupassaami...pe0... natthi no ki~nci (syaa0 ka0)} uttarikara.niiya.m {uttari.m kara.niiyanti (sii0 syaa0 pii0) uttarikara.niiyanti (ka0)}. abhikkanta.m, bho aananda, abhikkanta.m, bho aananda! seyyathaapi, bho aananda, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti. evameva.m bhotaa aanandena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bho aananda, ta.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m aanando dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
[06] subhasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dasama.m.

[03] 481^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0205^ea^ ^a^V1.0195^ea^ ^a^P1.0211^ea^ ^a^T1.0273^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa naa.landaaya.m viharati paavaarikambavane. atha kho keva.t.to gahapatiputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho keva.t.to gahapatiputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aya.m, bhante, naa.landaa iddhaa ceva phiitaa ca bahujanaa aaki.n.namanussaa bhagavati abhippasannaa. saadhu, bhante, bhagavaa eka.m bhikkhu.m samaadisatu, yo uttarimanussadhammaa, iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karissati; evaaya.m naa.landaa bhiyyoso mattaaya bhagavati abhippasiidissatii''ti. eva.m vutte, bhagavaa keva.t.ta.m gahapatiputta.m etadavoca -- ``na kho aha.m, keva.t.ta, bhikkhuuna.m eva.m dhamma.m desemi -- etha tumhe, bhikkhave, gihiina.m odaatavasanaana.m uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karothaa''ti.

[03] 482^b^.^eb^ dutiyampi kho keva.t.to gahapatiputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``naaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m dha.msemi; api ca, eva.m vadaami -- `aya.m, bhante, naa.landaa iddhaa ceva phiitaa ca bahujanaa aaki.n.namanussaa bhagavati abhippasannaa. saadhu, bhante, bhagavaa eka.m bhikkhu.m samaadisatu, yo uttarimanussadhammaa ^a^P1.0212^ea^ iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karissati; evaaya.m naa.landaa bhiyyoso mattaaya bhagavati abhippasiidissatii'''ti. dutiyampi kho bhagavaa keva.t.ta.m gahapatiputta.m etadavoca -- ``na kho aha.m, keva.t.ta, bhikkhuuna.m eva.m dhamma.m desemi -- etha tumhe, bhikkhave, gihiina.m odaatavasanaana.m uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karothaa'''ti.

[03] tatiyampi kho keva.t.to gahapatiputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``naaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m dha.msemi; api ca, eva.m vadaami -- `aya.m, bhante, naa.landaa iddhaa ceva phiitaa ca bahujanaa aaki.n.namanussaa ^a^V1.0196^ea^ bhagavati abhippasannaa. saadhu, bhante, bhagavaa eka.m bhikkhu.m samaadisatu, yo uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karissati. evaaya.m naa.landaa bhiyyoso mattaaya bhagavati abhippasiidissatii'ti.

[03] 483^b^.^eb^ ``tii.ni ^a^M1.0206^ea^ kho imaani, keva.t.ta, paa.tihaariyaani mayaa saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa paveditaani. katamaani tii.ni? iddhipaa.tihaariya.m, aadesanaapaa.tihaariya.m ^a^T1.0274^ea^, anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m.

[03] 484^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, keva.t.ta, iddhipaa.tihaariya.m? idha, keva.t.ta, bhikkhu anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti. ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hoti; aavibhaava.m tirobhaava.m tiroku.t.ta.m tiropaakaara.m tiropabbata.m asajjamaano gacchati seyyathaapi aakaase; pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m karoti seyyathaapi udake; udakepi abhijjamaane gacchati seyyathaapi pathaviya.m; aakaasepi palla"nkena kamati seyyathaapi pakkhii saku.no; imepi candimasuuriye eva.m mahiddhike eva.m mahaanubhaave paa.ninaa paraamasati parimajjati; yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteti.

[03] ``tamena.m a~n~nataro saddho pasanno passati ta.m bhikkhu.m anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhonta.m -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa honta.m, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko honta.m; aavibhaava.m tirobhaava.m; tiroku.t.ta.m tiropaakaara.m tiropabbata.m asajjamaana.m gacchanta.m seyyathaapi aakaase; pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m karonta.m seyyathaapi ^a^P1.0213^ea^ udake; udakepi abhijjamaane gacchanta.m seyyathaapi pathaviya.m; aakaasepi palla"nkena kamanta.m seyyathaapi pakkhii saku.no; imepi candimasuuriye eva.m mahiddhike eva.m mahaanubhaave paa.ninaa paraamasanta.m parimajjanta.m yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vattenta.m.

[03] ``tamena.m so saddho pasanno a~n~natarassa assaddhassa appasannassa aaroceti -- `acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho, sama.nassa mahiddhikataa mahaanubhaavataa. amaaha.m bhikkhu.m addasa.m anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhonta.m -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa honta.m, bahudhaapi ^a^T1.0275^ea^ hutvaa eko honta.m...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vattenta'nti.

[03] ``tamena.m ^a^V1.0197^ea^ so assaddho appasanno ta.m saddha.m pasanna.m eva.m vadeyya -- `atthi kho, bho, gandhaarii naama vijjaa. taaya so bhikkhu anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hoti...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vattetii'ti.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^M1.0207^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, keva.t.ta, api nu so assaddho appasanno ta.m saddha.m pasanna.m eva.m vadeyyaa''ti? ``vadeyya, bhante''ti. ``ima.m kho aha.m, keva.t.ta, iddhipaa.tihaariye aadiinava.m sampassamaano iddhipaa.tihaariyena a.t.tiiyaami haraayaami jigucchaami''.

[03] 485^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, keva.t.ta, aadesanaapaa.tihaariya.m? idha, keva.t.ta, bhikkhu parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cittampi aadisati, cetasikampi aadisati, vitakkitampi aadisati, vicaaritampi aadisati -- `evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te citta'nti.

[03] ``tamena.m a~n~nataro saddho pasanno passati ta.m bhikkhu.m parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cittampi aadisanta.m, cetasikampi aadisanta.m, vitakkitampi aadisanta.m, vicaaritampi aadisanta.m -- `evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te citta'nti. tamena.m so saddho pasanno a~n~natarassa assaddhassa appasannassa aaroceti -- `acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m ^a^P1.0214^ea^ vata, bho, sama.nassa mahiddhikataa mahaanubhaavataa. amaaha.m bhikkhu.m addasa.m parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cittampi aadisanta.m, cetasikampi aadisanta.m, vitakkitampi aadisanta.m, vicaaritampi aadisanta.m -- ``evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te citta'''nti.

[03] ``tamena.m so ^a^T1.0276^ea^ assaddho appasanno ta.m saddha.m pasanna.m eva.m vadeyya -- `atthi kho, bho, ma.nikaa naama vijjaa; taaya so bhikkhu parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m cittampi aadisati, cetasikampi aadisati, vitakkitampi aadisati, vicaaritampi aadisati -- `evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te citta'''nti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, keva.t.ta, api nu so assaddho appasanno ta.m saddha.m pasanna.m eva.m vadeyyaa''ti ^a^V1.0198^ea^? ``vadeyya, bhante''ti. ``ima.m kho aha.m, keva.t.ta, aadesanaapaa.tihaariye aadiinava.m sampassamaano aadesanaapaa.tihaariyena a.t.tiiyaami haraayaami jigucchaami''.

[03] 486^b^.^eb^ ``katama~nca, keva.t.ta, anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m? idha, keva.t.ta, bhikkhu evamanusaasati -- `eva.m vitakketha, maa eva.m vitakkayittha, eva.m manasikarotha, maa ^a^M1.0208^ea^ eva.m manasaakattha, ida.m pajahatha, ida.m upasampajja viharathaa'ti. ida.m vuccati, keva.t.ta, anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, keva.t.ta, idha tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho ^a^P1.0215^ea^ ...pe0... (yathaa 190-212 anucchedesu eva.m vitthaaretabba.m). eva.m kho, keva.t.ta, bhikkhu siilasampanno hoti...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. idampi vuccati, keva.t.ta, anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. idampi vuccati, keva.t.ta, anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m...pe0... ~naa.nadassanaaya citta.m abhiniiharati ^a^V1.0199^ea^ abhininnaameti...pe0... idampi vuccati, keva.t.ta, anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaati...pe0... idampi vuccati, keva.t.ta, anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m.
[03] ``imaani kho, keva.t.ta, tii.ni paa.tihaariyaani mayaa saya.m abhi~n~naa ^a^T1.0277^ea^ sacchikatvaa paveditaani''.

[03] 487^b^.^eb^ ``bhuutapubba.m, keva.t.ta, imasmi~n~neva bhikkhusa"nghe a~n~natarassa bhikkhuno eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `kattha nu kho ime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu'ti?

[03] 488^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho so, keva.t.ta, bhikkhu tathaaruupa.m samaadhi.m samaapajji, yathaasamaahite citte devayaaniyo maggo paaturahosi. atha kho so, keva.t.ta, bhikkhu yena caatumahaaraajikaa devaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa caatumahaaraajike deve etadavoca -- `kattha nu kho, aavuso, ime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu'ti?

[03] ``eva.m vutte, keva.t.ta, caatumahaaraajikaa devaa ta.m bhikkhu.m ^a^P1.0216^ea^ etadavocu.m -- `mayampi kho, bhikkhu, na jaanaama, yatthime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuuti {vaayodhaatu. atthi kho (pii0 evamuparipi)}. atthi kho {vaayodhaatu. atthi kho (pii0 evamuparipi)}, bhikkhu, cattaaro mahaaraajaano amhehi abhikkantataraa ^a^M1.0209^ea^ ca pa.niitataraa ca. te kho eta.m jaaneyyu.m, yatthime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu'ti.

[03] 489^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho so, keva.t.ta, bhikkhu yena cattaaro mahaaraajaano tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa cattaaro mahaaraaje etadavoca -- `kattha nu kho, aavuso, ime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa ^a^V1.0200^ea^ nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu ^a^T1.0278^ea^ aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu'ti? eva.m vutte, keva.t.ta, cattaaro mahaaraajaano ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavocu.m -- `mayampi kho, bhikkhu, na jaanaama, yatthime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu, aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuuti. atthi kho, bhikkhu, taavati.msaa naama devaa amhehi abhikkantataraa ca pa.niitataraa ca. te kho eta.m jaaneyyu.m, yatthime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu'ti.

[03] 490^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho so, keva.t.ta, bhikkhu yena taavati.msaa devaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa taavati.mse deve etadavoca -- `kattha nu kho, aavuso, ime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu'ti? eva.m vutte, keva.t.ta, taavati.msaa devaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavocu.m -- `mayampi kho, bhikkhu, na jaanaama, yatthime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuuti. atthi kho, bhikkhu, sakko naama devaanamindo amhehi abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro ca. so kho eta.m jaaneyya, yatthime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu'ti.

[03] 491^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^P1.0217^ea^ kho so, keva.t.ta, bhikkhu yena sakko devaanamindo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa sakka.m devaanaminda.m etadavoca -- `kattha nu kho, aavuso, ime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu'ti? eva.m vutte, keva.t.ta, sakko devaanamindo ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- `ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na ^a^M1.0210^ea^ jaanaami, yatthime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuuti. atthi kho, bhikkhu, yaamaa naama devaa...pe0... suyaamo naama devaputto... ^a^P1.0218^ea^ tusitaa naama devaa... santussito naama devaputto... nimmaanaratii ^a^T1.0279^ea^ naama devaa ^a^P1.0219^ea^... sunimmito naama devaputto... paranimmitavasavattii naama devaa... vasavattii naama devaputto amhehi abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro ca. so kho eta.m jaaneyya, yatthime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu'ti.

[03] 492^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho so, keva.t.ta, bhikkhu yena vasavattii devaputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa vasavatti.m devaputta.m ^a^P1.0220^ea^ etadavoca -- `kattha nu kho, aavuso, ime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu'ti? eva.m vutte ^a^V1.0201^ea^, keva.t.ta, vasavattii devaputto ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- `ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na jaanaami yatthime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuuti. atthi kho, bhikkhu, brahmakaayikaa naama devaa amhehi abhikkantataraa ca pa.niitataraa ca. te kho eta.m jaaneyyu.m, yatthime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu'ti.

[03] 493^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho so, keva.t.ta, bhikkhu tathaaruupa.m samaadhi.m samaapajji, yathaasamaahite citte brahmayaaniyo maggo paaturahosi. atha kho so, keva.t.ta, bhikkhu yena brahmakaayikaa devaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa brahmakaayike deve etadavoca -- `kattha nu kho, aavuso, ime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu'ti? eva.m vutte, keva.t.ta, brahmakaayikaa devaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavocu.m -- `mayampi kho, bhikkhu, na ^a^T1.0280^ea^ jaanaama, yatthime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuuti. atthi kho, bhikkhu, brahmaa mahaabrahmaa abhibhuu anabhibhuuto a~n~nadatthudaso vasavattii issaro ^a^M1.0211^ea^ kattaa nimmaataa se.t.tho sajitaa vasii pitaa bhuutabhabyaana.m amhehi abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro ca. so kho eta.m jaaneyya, yatthime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu''ti.

[03] ```kaha.m panaavuso, etarahi so mahaabrahmaa'ti? `mayampi kho, bhikkhu, na jaanaama, yattha vaa brahmaa yena vaa brahmaa yahi.m vaa brahmaa; api ca, bhikkhu, yathaa nimittaa dissanti, aaloko sa~njaayati, obhaaso paatubhavati, brahmaa paatubhavissati, brahmuno heta.m pubbanimitta.m paatubhaavaaya, yadida.m aaloko sa~njaayati, obhaaso paatubhavatii'ti. atha kho so, keva.t.ta, mahaabrahmaa nacirasseva paaturahosi ^a^P1.0221^ea^.

[03] 494^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho so, keva.t.ta, bhikkhu yena so mahaabrahmaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m mahaabrahmaana.m etadavoca -- `kattha nu kho, aavuso, ime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu''ti? eva.m vutte, keva.t.ta, so mahaabrahmaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- `ahamasmi, bhikkhu, brahmaa mahaabrahmaa abhibhuu anabhibhuuto a~n~nadatthudaso vasavattii ^a^T1.0281^ea^ issaro kattaa nimmaataa se.t.tho sajitaa vasii pitaa bhuutabhabyaana'nti.

[03] ``dutiyampi ^a^V1.0202^ea^ kho so, keva.t.ta, bhikkhu ta.m mahaabrahmaana.m etadavoca -- `na khoha.m ta.m, aavuso, eva.m pucchaami -- ``tvamasi brahmaa mahaabrahmaa abhibhuu anabhibhuuto a~n~nadatthudaso vasavattii issaro kattaa nimmaataa se.t.tho sajitaa vasii pitaa bhuutabhabyaana''nti. eva~nca kho aha.m ta.m, aavuso, pucchaami -- ``kattha nu kho, aavuso, ime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu'''ti?

[03] ``dutiyampi kho so, keva.t.ta, mahaabrahmaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- `ahamasmi, bhikkhu, brahmaa mahaabrahmaa abhibhuu anabhibhuuto a~n~nadatthudaso vasavattii issaro kattaa nimmaataa se.t.tho sajitaa vasii pitaa bhuutabhabyaana'nti. tatiyampi kho so, keva.t.ta, bhikkhu ta.m mahaabrahmaana.m etadavoca -- `na khoha.m ta.m, aavuso, eva.m pucchaami -- ``tvamasi brahmaa mahaabrahmaa abhibhuu ^a^M1.0212^ea^ anabhibhuuto a~n~nadatthudaso vasavattii issaro kattaa nimmaataa se.t.tho sajitaa vasii pitaa bhuutabhabyaana''nti. eva~nca kho aha.m ta.m, aavuso, pucchaami -- ``kattha nu kho, aavuso, ime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu'''ti?

[03] 495^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho so, keva.t.ta, mahaabrahmaa ta.m bhikkhu.m baahaaya.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m apanetvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca ^a^P1.0222^ea^ -- `ime kho ma.m, bhikkhu, brahmakaayikaa devaa eva.m jaananti, ``natthi ki~nci brahmuno a~n~naata.m, natthi ki~nci brahmuno adi.t.tha.m, natthi ki~nci brahmuno avidita.m, natthi ki~nci brahmuno asacchikata''nti. tasmaaha.m tesa.m sammukhaa na byaakaasi.m. ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na jaanaami yatthime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu ^a^T1.0282^ea^ vaayodhaatuuti. tasmaatiha, bhikkhu, tuyheveta.m dukka.ta.m, tuyheveta.m aparaddha.m, ya.m tva.m ta.m bhagavanta.m atidhaavitvaa bahiddhaa pariye.t.thi.m aapajjasi imassa pa~nhassa veyyaakara.naaya. gaccha tva.m, bhikkhu, tameva bhagavanta.m upasa"nkamitvaa ima.m pa~nha.m puccha, yathaa ca te bhagavaa byaakaroti, tathaa na.m dhaareyyaasii'ti.

[03] 496^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho so, keva.t.ta, bhikkhu -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya evameva brahmaloke antarahito mama purato paaturahosi. atha kho so, keva.t.ta, bhikkhu ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi, ekamanta.m nisinno kho, keva.t.ta, so bhikkhu ma.m etadavoca -- `kattha nu kho, bhante, ime cattaaro ^a^V1.0203^ea^ mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu'ti?

[03] 497^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m vutte, aha.m, keva.t.ta, ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca.m -- `bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhu, saamuddikaa vaa.nijaa tiiradassi.m saku.na.m gahetvaa naavaaya samudda.m ajjhogaahanti. te atiiradakkhiniyaa naavaaya tiiradassi.m saku.na.m mu~ncanti. so gacchateva puratthima.m disa.m, gacchati dakkhi.na.m disa.m, gacchati pacchima.m disa.m, gacchati uttara.m disa.m, gacchati uddha.m disa.m, gacchati anudisa.m. sace so samantaa tiira.m ^a^M1.0213^ea^ passati, tathaagatakova {tathaapakkantova (syaa0)} hoti. sace pana so samantaa tiira.m na passati, tameva naava.m paccaagacchati. evameva kho tva.m, bhikkhu, yato yaava brahmalokaa ^a^P1.0223^ea^ pariyesamaano imassa pa~nhassa ^a^T1.0283^ea^ veyyaakara.na.m naajjhagaa, atha mama~n~neva santike paccaagato. na kho eso, bhikkhu, pa~nho eva.m pucchitabbo -- `kattha nu kho, bhante, ime cattaaro mahaabhuutaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, seyyathida.m -- pathaviidhaatu aapodhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatuu'ti?
[03] 498^b^.^eb^ ``eva~nca kho eso, bhikkhu, pa~nho pucchitabbo --
[21] `kattha aapo ca pathavii, tejo vaayo na gaadhati.
[27] kattha diigha~nca rassa~nca, a.nu.m thuula.m subhaasubha.m.
[22] kattha naama~nca ruupa~nca, asesa.m uparujjhatii'ti..
[03] 499^b^.^eb^ ``tatra veyyaakara.na.m bhavati --
[21] `vi~n~naa.na.m anidassana.m, ananta.m sabbatopabha.m.
[22] ettha aapo ca pathavii, tejo vaayo na gaadhati..
[21] ettha diigha~nca rassa~nca, a.nu.m thuula.m subhaasubha.m.
[27] ettha naama~nca ruupa~nca, asesa.m uparujjhati.
[22] vi~n~naa.nassa nirodhena, ettheta.m uparujjhatii'ti..
[03] 500^b^.^eb^ idamavoca ^a^V1.0204^ea^ bhagavaa. attamano keva.t.to gahapatiputto bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] keva.t.tasutta.m ni.t.thita.m ekaadasama.m.

[03] 501^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0214^ea^ ^a^V1.0205^ea^ ^a^P1.0224^ea^ ^a^T1.0214^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi yena saalavatikaa tadavasari. tena kho pana samayena lohicco braahma.no saalavatika.m ajjhaavasati sattussada.m sati.naka.t.thodaka.m sadha~n~na.m raajabhogga.m ra~n~naa pasenadinaa kosalena dinna.m raajadaaya.m, brahmadeyya.m.

[03] 502^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena lohiccassa braahma.nassa evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m hoti -- ``idha sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa kusala.m dhamma.m adhigaccheyya, kusala.m dhamma.m adhigantvaa na parassa aaroceyya, ki~nhi paro parassa karissati. seyyathaapi naama puraa.na.m bandhana.m chinditvaa a~n~na.m nava.m bandhana.m kareyya, eva.msampadamida.m paapaka.m lobhadhamma.m vadaami, ki~nhi paro parassa karissatii''ti.

[03] 503^b^.^eb^ assosi kho lohicco braahma.no -- ``sama.no khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi saalavatika.m anuppatto. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m ^a^P1.0225^ea^ abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m ^a^T1.0285^ea^ saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. saadhu kho pana tathaaruupaana.m arahata.m dassana.m hotii''ti.

[03] 504^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V1.0206^ea^ kho lohicco braahma.no rosika.m {bhesika.m (sii0 pii0)} nhaapita.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, samma rosike, yena sama.no gotamo tenupasa"nkama ^a^M1.0215^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena sama.na.m gotama.m appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m puccha -- lohicco, bho gotama, braahma.no bhavanta.m gotama.m appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchatii''ti. eva~nca vadehi -- ``adhivaasetu kira bhava.m gotamo lohiccassa braahma.nassa svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti.

[03] 505^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m, bho''ti {eva.m bhanteti (sii0 pii0)} kho rosikaa nhaapito lohiccassa braahma.nassa pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho rosikaa nhaapito bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``lohicco, bhante, braahma.no bhagavanta.m appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchati; eva~nca vadeti -- adhivaasetu kira, bhante, bhagavaa lohiccassa braahma.nassa svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] 506^b^.^eb^ atha kho rosikaa nhaapito bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena lohicco braahma.no tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa lohicca.m braahma.na.m etadavoca -- ``avocumhaa kho maya.m bhoto {maya.m bhante tava (sii0 pii0)} vacanena ta.m bhagavanta.m -- `lohicco, bhante, braahma.no ^a^T1.0286^ea^ bhagavanta.m appaabaadha.m ^a^P1.0226^ea^ appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchati; eva~nca vadeti -- adhivaasetu kira, bhante, bhagavaa lohiccassa braahma.nassa svaatanaaya bhatta.m saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghenaa'ti. adhivuttha~nca pana tena bhagavataa''ti.

[03] 507^b^.^eb^ atha kho lohicco braahma.no tassaa rattiyaa accayena sake nivesane pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa rosika.m nhaapita.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, samma rosike, yena sama.no gotamo tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa sama.nassa gotamassa kaala.m aarocehi -- kaalo bho, gotama, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho rosikaa nhaapito lohiccassa braahma.nassa pa.tissutvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi ^a^M1.0216^ea^. ekamanta.m .thito kho rosikaa nhaapito bhagavato kaala.m aarocesi -- ``kaalo, bhante, ni.t.thita.m bhatta''nti.

[03] 508^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena yena ^a^V1.0207^ea^ saalavatikaa tenupasa"nkami. tena kho pana samayena rosikaa nhaapito bhagavanta.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandho hoti. atha kho rosikaa nhaapito bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``lohiccassa, bhante, braahma.nassa evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `idha sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa kusala.m dhamma.m adhigaccheyya, kusala.m dhamma.m adhigantvaa na parassa aaroceyya -- ki~nhi paro parassa karissati. seyyathaapi naama puraa.na.m bandhana.m chinditvaa a~n~na.m nava.m bandhana.m kareyya, eva.m sampadamida.m ^a^T1.0287^ea^ paapaka.m lobhadhamma.m vadaami -- ki~nhi paro parassa karissatii'ti. saadhu, bhante, bhagavaa lohicca.m braahma.na.m etasmaa paapakaa di.t.thigataa vivecetuu''ti. ``appeva naama siyaa rosike, appeva naama siyaa rosike''ti.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa yena lohiccassa braahma.nassa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi ^a^P1.0227^ea^. atha kho lohicco braahma.no buddhappamukha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi.

[03] 509^b^.^eb^ atha kho lohicco braahma.no bhagavanta.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m a~n~natara.m niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho lohicca.m braahma.na.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``sacca.m kira te, lohicca, evaruupa.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m -- `idha sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa kusala.m dhamma.m adhigaccheyya, kusala.m dhamma.m adhigantvaa na parassa aaroceyya -- ki~nhi paro parassa karissati. seyyathaapi naama puraa.na.m bandhana.m chinditvaa a~n~na.m nava.m bandhana.m kareyya, eva.m sampadamida.m paapaka.m lobhadhamma.m vadaami, ki~nhi paro parassa karissatii''' ti? ``eva.m, bho gotama''. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi lohicca nanu tva.m saalavatika.m ajjhaavasasii''ti? ``eva.m, bho gotama''. ``yo nu kho, lohicca, eva.m vadeyya -- `lohicco braahma.no saalavatika.m ajjhaavasati. yaa saalavatikaaya samudayasa~njaati lohiccova ta.m braahma.no ^a^M1.0217^ea^ ekako paribhu~njeyya, na a~n~nesa.m dadeyyaa'ti. eva.m vaadii so ye ta.m upajiivanti, tesa.m antaraayakaro ^a^T1.0288^ea^ vaa hoti, no vaa''ti?

[03] ``antaraayakaro, bho gotama''. ``antaraayakaro samaano hitaanukampii vaa tesa.m hoti ahitaanukampii vaa''ti? ``ahitaanukampii, bho gotama''. ``ahitaanukampissa metta.m vaa tesu citta.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sapattaka.m vaa''ti? ``sapattaka.m, bho gotama''. ``sapattake citte paccupa.t.thite ^a^V1.0208^ea^ micchaadi.t.thi vaa hoti sammaadi.t.thi vaa''ti? ``micchaadi.t.thi, bho gotama''. ``micchaadi.t.thissa kho aha.m, lohicca, dvinna.m gatiina.m a~n~natara.m gati.m vadaami -- niraya.m vaa tiracchaanayoni.m vaa''.

[03] 510^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, lohicca, nanu raajaa pasenadi kosalo kaasikosala.m ajjhaavasatii''ti? ``eva.m, bho gotama''. ``yo nu kho, lohicca, eva.m vadeyya -- `raajaa pasenadi kosalo kaasikosala.m ajjhaavasati; yaa kaasikosale samudayasa~njaati, raajaava ta.m pasenadi kosalo ekako paribhu~njeyya, na a~n~nesa.m dadeyyaa'ti. eva.m vaadii so ye raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m upajiivanti tumhe ceva a~n~ne ca, tesa.m antaraayakaro vaa hoti, no vaa''ti?

[03] ``antaraayakaro, bho gotama''. ``antaraayakaro samaano hitaanukampii vaa tesa.m hoti ahitaanukampii vaa''ti? ``ahitaanukampii, bho gotama''. ``ahitaanukampissa metta.m vaa tesu citta.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sapattaka.m vaa''ti? ``sapattaka.m, bho gotama''. ``sapattake citte paccupa.t.thite micchaadi.t.thi vaa hoti sammaadi.t.thi vaa''ti? ``micchaadi.t.thi, bho gotama''. ``micchaadi.t.thissa ^a^P1.0228^ea^ kho aha.m, lohicca, dvinna.m gatiina.m a~n~natara.m gati.m vadaami -- niraya.m vaa tiracchaanayoni.m vaa''.

[03] 511^b^.^eb^ ``iti ^a^T1.0289^ea^ kira, lohicca, yo eva.m vadeyya -- ``lohicco braahma.no saalavatika.m ajjhaavasati; yaa saalavatikaaya samudayasa~njaati, lohiccova ta.m braahma.no ekako paribhu~njeyya, na a~n~nesa.m dadeyyaa''ti. eva.mvaadii so ye ta.m upajiivanti, tesa.m antaraayakaro hoti. antaraayakaro samaano ahitaanukampii hoti, ahitaanukampissa sapattaka.m citta.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti, sapattake citte paccupa.t.thite micchaadi.t.thi hoti. evameva kho, lohicca, yo eva.m vadeyya -- ``idha sama.no ^a^M1.0218^ea^ vaa braahma.no vaa kusala.m dhamma.m adhigaccheyya, kusala.m dhamma.m adhigantvaa na parassa aaroceyya, ki~nhi paro parassa karissati. seyyathaapi naama puraa.na.m bandhana.m chinditvaa a~n~na.m nava.m bandhana.m kareyya...pe0... karissatii''ti. eva.mvaadii so ye te kulaputtaa tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m aagamma evaruupa.m u.laara.m visesa.m adhigacchanti, sotaapattiphalampi sacchikaronti, sakadaagaamiphalampi sacchikaronti, anaagaamiphalampi sacchikaronti, arahattampi sacchikaronti, ye cime dibbaa gabbhaa paripaacenti dibbaana.m bhavaana.m abhinibbattiyaa, tesa.m antaraayakaro hoti, antaraayakaro samaano ahitaanukampii hoti ^a^V1.0209^ea^, ahitaanukampissa sapattaka.m citta.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti, sapattake citte paccupa.t.thite micchaadi.t.thi hoti. micchaadi.t.thissa kho aha.m, lohicca, dvinna.m gatiina.m a~n~natara.m gati.m vadaami -- niraya.m vaa tiracchaanayoni.m vaa.

[03] 512^b^.^eb^ ``iti kira, lohicca, yo eva.m vadeyya -- ``raajaa pasenadi kosalo kaasikosala.m ajjhaavasati; yaa kaasikosale samudayasa~njaati, raajaava ta.m ^a^T1.0290^ea^ pasenadi kosalo ekako paribhu~njeyya, na a~n~nesa.m dadeyyaa''ti. eva.mvaadii so ye raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m upajiivanti tumhe ceva a~n~ne ca, tesa.m antaraayakaro hoti. antaraayakaro samaano ahitaanukampii hoti, ahitaanukampissa sapattaka.m citta.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti, sapattake citte paccupa.t.thite micchaadi.t.thi hoti. evameva kho, lohicca, yo eva.m vadeyya -- ``idha sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa kusala.m dhamma.m adhigaccheyya, kusala.m dhamma.m adhigantvaa na parassa aaroceyya, ki~nhi paro parassa karissati. seyyathaapi naama...pe0... ki~nhi ^a^P1.0229^ea^ paro parassa karissatii''ti, eva.m vaadii so ye te kulaputtaa tathaagatappavedita.m dhammavinaya.m aagamma evaruupa.m u.laara.m visesa.m adhigacchanti, sotaapattiphalampi sacchikaronti, sakadaagaamiphalampi sacchikaronti, anaagaamiphalampi sacchikaronti, arahattampi sacchikaronti. ye cime dibbaa gabbhaa paripaacenti dibbaana.m bhavaana.m abhinibbattiyaa, tesa.m antaraayakaro hoti, antaraayakaro samaano ahitaanukampii ^a^P1.0230^ea^ hoti, ahitaanukampissa sapattaka.m citta.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti, sapattake citte paccupa.t.thite micchaadi.t.thi hoti. micchaadi.t.thissa kho aha.m, lohicca, dvinna.m gatiina.m a~n~natara.m gati.m vadaami -- niraya.m vaa tiracchaanayoni.m vaa.

[03] 513^b^.^eb^ ``tayo ^a^M1.0219^ea^ khome, lohicca, satthaaro, ye loke codanaarahaa; yo ca panevaruupe satthaaro codeti, saa codanaa bhuutaa tacchaa dhammikaa anavajjaa ^a^T1.0291^ea^. katame tayo? idha, lohicca, ekacco satthaa yassatthaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti, svaassa saama~n~nattho ananuppatto hoti. so ta.m saama~n~nattha.m ananupaapu.nitvaa saavakaana.m dhamma.m deseti -- ``ida.m vo hitaaya ida.m vo sukhaayaa''ti. tassa saavakaa na sussuusanti, na sota.m odahanti, na a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thapenti, vokkamma ca satthusaasanaa ^a^T1.0292^ea^ vattanti. so evamassa codetabbo -- ``aayasmaa kho yassatthaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito, so te saama~n~nattho ananuppatto, ta.m tva.m saama~n~nattha.m ananupaapu.nitvaa saavakaana.m dhamma.m desesi -- `ida.m vo hitaaya ida.m vo sukhaayaa'ti ^a^V1.0210^ea^. tassa te saavakaa na sussuusanti, na sota.m odahanti, na a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thapenti, vokkamma ca satthusaasanaa vattanti. seyyathaapi naama osakkantiyaa vaa ussakkeyya, parammukhi.m vaa aali"ngeyya, eva.m sampadamida.m paapaka.m lobhadhamma.m vadaami -- ki~nhi paro parassa karissatii''ti. aya.m kho, lohicca, pa.thamo satthaa, yo loke codanaaraho; yo ca panevaruupa.m satthaara.m codeti, saa codanaa bhuutaa tacchaa dhammikaa anavajjaa.

[03] 514^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, lohicca, idhekacco satthaa yassatthaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti, svaassa saama~n~nattho ananuppatto hoti. so ta.m saama~n~nattha.m ananupaapu.nitvaa saavakaana.m dhamma.m deseti -- ``ida.m vo hitaaya, ida.m vo sukhaayaa''ti. tassa saavakaa sussuusanti, sota.m odahanti, a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thapenti, na ca vokkamma satthusaasanaa vattanti. so evamassa codetabbo -- ``aayasmaa kho yassatthaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito, so te saama~n~nattho ananuppatto. ta.m tva.m saama~n~nattha.m ananupaapu.nitvaa saavakaana.m dhamma.m desesi -- `ida.m vo hitaaya ida.m vo sukhaayaa'ti. tassa te saavakaa sussuusanti, sota.m odahanti ^a^P1.0231^ea^, a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thapenti, na ca vokkamma satthusaasanaa vattanti. seyyathaapi naama saka.m khetta.m ohaaya para.m khetta.m niddaayitabba.m ma~n~neyya ^a^M1.0220^ea^, eva.m sampadamida.m paapaka.m lobhadhamma.m vadaami -- ki~nhi paro parassa karissatii''ti. aya.m kho, lohicca, dutiyo satthaa, yo, loke codanaaraho; yo ca panevaruupa.m satthaara.m codeti, saa codanaa bhuutaa tacchaa dhammikaa anavajjaa.

[03] 515^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, lohicca, idhekacco satthaa yassatthaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti, svaassa saama~n~nattho anuppatto hoti. so ta.m saama~n~nattha.m anupaapu.nitvaa saavakaana.m dhamma.m deseti -- ``ida.m vo hitaaya ida.m vo sukhaayaa''ti. tassa saavakaa na sussuusanti, na sota.m odahanti, na a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thapenti, vokkamma ca satthusaasanaa vattanti. so evamassa codetabbo -- ``aayasmaa kho yassatthaaya agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito, so te saama~n~nattho anuppatto. ta.m tva.m saama~n~nattha.m anupaapu.nitvaa saavakaana.m dhamma.m desesi -- `ida.m vo hitaaya ida.m vo sukhaayaa'ti. tassa te saavakaa na sussuusanti, na sota.m odahanti, na a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thapenti ^a^T1.0293^ea^, vokkamma ca satthusaasanaa vattanti. seyyathaapi naama puraa.na.m bandhana.m chinditvaa a~n~na.m nava.m bandhana.m kareyya, eva.m sampadamida.m paapaka.m lobhadhamma.m vadaami, ki~nhi paro parassa karissatii''ti. aya.m kho, lohicca, tatiyo satthaa, yo loke codanaaraho; yo ca panevaruupa.m satthaara.m codeti, saa codanaa bhuutaa tacchaa dhammikaa anavajjaa. ime ^a^V1.0211^ea^ ^a^P1.0232^ea^ kho, lohicca, tayo satthaaro, ye loke codanaarahaa, yo ca panevaruupe satthaaro codeti, saa codanaa bhuutaa tacchaa dhammikaa anavajjaati.

[03] 516^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, lohicco braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``atthi pana, bho gotama, koci satthaa, yo loke nacodanaaraho''ti? ``atthi kho, lohicca, satthaa, yo loke nacodanaaraho''ti. ``katamo pana so, bho gotama, satthaa, yo loke nacodanaaraho''ti?

[03] ``idha, lohicca, tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m, sammaasambuddho...pe0... (yathaa 190-212 anucchedesu eva.m vitthaaretabba.m). eva.m kho, lohicca, bhikkhu siilasampanno ^a^M1.0221^ea^ hoti...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati... ^a^P1.0233^ea^ yasmi.m kho, lohicca, satthari saavako evaruupa.m u.laara.m visesa.m adhigacchati, ayampi kho, lohicca, satthaa, yo loke nacodanaaraho ^a^T1.0294^ea^. yo ca panevaruupa.m satthaara.m codeti, saa codanaa abhuutaa atacchaa adhammikaa saavajjaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... ^a^V1.0212^ea^ catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. yasmi.m kho, lohicca, satthari saavako evaruupa.m u.laara.m visesa.m adhigacchati, ayampi kho, lohicca, satthaa, yo loke nacodanaaraho, yo ca panevaruupa.m satthaara.m codeti, saa codanaa abhuutaa atacchaa adhammikaa saavajjaa... ~naa.nadassanaaya citta.m abhiniiharati abhininnaameti...pe0... yasmi.m kho, lohicca, satthari saavako evaruupa.m u.laara.m visesa.m adhigacchati, ayampi kho, lohicca, satthaa, yo loke nacodanaaraho, yo ca panevaruupa.m satthaara.m codeti, saa codanaa abhuutaa atacchaa adhammikaa saavajjaa... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaati. yasmi.m kho, lohicca, satthari saavako evaruupa.m u.laara.m visesa.m adhigacchati, ayampi kho, lohicca, satthaa, yo loke ^a^P1.0234^ea^ nacodanaaraho, yo ca panevaruupa.m satthaara.m codeti, saa codanaa abhuutaa atacchaa adhammikaa saavajjaa''ti.

[03] 517^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, lohicco braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``seyyathaapi, bho gotama, puriso purisa.m narakapapaata.m patanta.m kesesu gahetvaa uddharitvaa thale pati.t.thapeyya, evamevaaha.m bhotaa gotamena narakapapaata.m papatanto uddharitvaa thale pati.t.thaapito. abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya, `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti. evameva.m bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito ^a^V1.0213^ea^. esaaha.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
[06] lohiccasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dvaadasama.m.

[03] 518^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V1.0214^ea^ ^a^M1.0222^ea^ ^a^P1.0235^ea^ ^a^T1.0295^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi yena manasaaka.ta.m naama kosalaana.m braahma.nagaamo tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa manasaaka.te viharati uttarena manasaaka.tassa aciravatiyaa nadiyaa tiire ambavane.

[03] 519^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa braahma.namahaasaalaa manasaaka.te pa.tivasanti, seyyathida.m -- ca"nkii braahma.no taarukkho braahma.no pokkharasaati braahma.no jaa.nuso.ni braahma.no todeyyo braahma.no a~n~ne ca abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa braahma.namahaasaalaa.

[03] 520^b^.^eb^ atha kho vaase.t.thabhaaradvaajaana.m maa.navaana.m ja"nghavihaara.m anuca"nkamantaana.m anuvicarantaana.m maggaamagge kathaa udapaadi. atha kho vaase.t.tho maa.navo evamaaha -- ``ayameva ujumaggo, ayama~njasaayano niyyaaniko niyyaati takkarassa brahmasahabyataaya, yvaaya.m akkhaato braahma.nena pokkharasaatinaa''ti. bhaaradvaajopi maa.navo evamaaha -- ``ayameva ujumaggo, ayama~njasaayano ^a^P1.0236^ea^ niyyaaniko, niyyaati takkarassa brahmasahabyataaya, yvaaya.m akkhaato braahma.nena taarukkhenaa''ti. neva kho asakkhi vaase.t.tho maa.navo bhaaradvaaja.m maa.nava.m sa~n~naapetu.m, na pana asakkhi bhaaradvaajo maa.navopi vaase.t.tha.m maa.nava.m sa~n~naapetu.m.

[03] 521^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T1.0296^ea^ kho vaase.t.tho maa.navo bhaaradvaaja.m maa.nava.m aamantesi -- ``aya.m kho, bhaaradvaaja, sama.no gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulaa pabbajito manasaaka.te viharati uttarena manasaaka.tassa aciravatiyaa nadiyaa tiire ambavane. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato -- ``itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa ^a^M1.0223^ea^ devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa''ti ^a^V1.0215^ea^. aayaama, bho bhaaradvaaja, yena sama.no gotamo tenupasa"nkamissaama; upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m sama.na.m gotama.m pucchissaama. yathaa no sama.no gotamo byaakarissati, tathaa na.m dhaaressaamaa''ti. ``eva.m, bho''ti kho bhaaradvaajo maa.navo vaase.t.thassa maa.navassa paccassosi.

[03] 522^b^.^eb^ atha kho vaase.t.thabhaaradvaajaa maa.navaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho vaase.t.tho maa.navo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idha, bho gotama, amhaaka.m ja"nghavihaara.m anuca"nkamantaana.m anuvicarantaana.m maggaamagge kathaa udapaadi. aha.m eva.m vadaami -- `ayameva ujumaggo, ayama~njasaayano niyyaaniko niyyaati takkarassa brahmasahabyataaya, yvaaya.m akkhaato braahma.nena pokkharasaatinaa'ti. bhaaradvaajo maa.navo evamaaha -- `ayameva ujumaggo ayama~njasaayano niyyaaniko niyyaati takkarassa brahmasahabyataaya, yvaaya.m akkhaato braahma.nena taarukkhenaa'ti. ettha, bho gotama, attheva viggaho, atthi vivaado, atthi naanaavaado''ti.

[03] 523^b^.^eb^ ``iti ^a^P1.0237^ea^ kira ^a^T1.0297^ea^, vaase.t.tha, tva.m eva.m vadesi -- ``ayameva ujumaggo, ayama~njasaayano niyyaaniko niyyaati takkarassa brahmasahabyataaya, yvaaya.m akkhaato braahma.nena pokkharasaatinaa''ti. bhaaradvaajo maa.navo evamaaha -- ``ayameva ujumaggo ayama~njasaayano niyyaaniko niyyaati takkarassa brahmasahabyataaya, yvaaya.m akkhaato braahma.nena taarukkhenaa''ti. atha kismi.m pana vo, vaase.t.tha, viggaho, kismi.m vivaado, kismi.m naanaavaado''ti?

[03] 524^b^.^eb^ ``maggaamagge, bho gotama. ki~ncaapi, bho gotama, braahma.naa naanaamagge pa~n~napenti, addhariyaa braahma.naa tittiriyaa braahma.naa chandokaa braahma.naa bavhaarijjhaa braahma.naa, atha kho sabbaani taani niyyaanikaa niyyanti takkarassa brahmasahabyataaya.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M1.0224^ea^, bho gotama, gaamassa vaa nigamassa vaa aviduure bahuuni cepi naanaamaggaani bhavanti, atha kho sabbaani taani gaamasamosara.naani bhavanti; evameva kho, bho gotama, ki~ncaapi braahma.naa naanaamagge pa~n~napenti, addhariyaa braahma.naa tittiriyaa braahma.naa ^a^V1.0216^ea^ chandokaa braahma.naa bavhaarijjhaa braahma.naa, atha kho sabbaani taani niyyaanikaa niyyanti takkarassa brahmasahabyataayaa''ti.

[03] 525^b^.^eb^ ``niyyantiiti vaase.t.tha vadesi''? ``niyyantiiti, bho gotama, vadaami''. ``niyyantiiti, vaase.t.tha, vadesi''? ``niyyantiiti, bho gotama, vadaami''. ``niyyantiiti, vaase.t.tha, vadesi''? ``niyyantii''ti, bho gotama, vadaami''.
[03] ``ki.m ^a^P1.0238^ea^ pana, vaase.t.tha, atthi koci tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m ekabraahma.nopi, yena brahmaa sakkhidi.t.tho''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama'' ^a^T1.0298^ea^.
[03] ``ki.m pana, vaase.t.tha, atthi koci tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m ekaacariyopi, yena brahmaa sakkhidi.t.tho''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.
[03] ``ki.m pana, vaase.t.tha, atthi koci tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m ekaacariyapaacariyopi, yena brahmaa sakkhidi.t.tho''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.
[03] ``ki.m pana, vaase.t.tha, atthi koci tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m yaava sattamaa aacariyaamahayugaa {sattamaacariyamahayugaa (syaa0)} yena brahmaa sakkhidi.t.tho''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] 526^b^.^eb^ ``ki.m pana, vaase.t.tha, yepi tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m pubbakaa isayo mantaana.m kattaaro mantaana.m pavattaaro, yesamida.m etarahi tevijjaa braahma.naa poraa.na.m mantapada.m giita.m pavutta.m samihita.m {samiihita.m (syaa0)}, tadanugaayanti, tadanubhaasanti, bhaasitamanubhaasanti, vaacitamanuvaacenti, seyyathida.m -- a.t.thako vaamako vaamadevo vessaamitto yamataggi a"ngiiraso bhaaradvaajo vaase.t.tho kassapo bhagu. tepi evamaaha.msu -- `mayameta.m jaanaama, mayameta.m passaama, yattha vaa brahmaa, yena vaa brahmaa, yahi.m vaa brahmaa'''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] 527^b^.^eb^ ``iti ^a^M1.0225^ea^ kira, vaase.t.tha, natthi koci tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m ekabraahma.nopi, yena brahmaa sakkhidi.t.tho. natthi koci tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m ekaacariyopi, yena brahmaa sakkhidi.t.tho ^a^V1.0217^ea^. natthi koci tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m ekaacariyapaacariyopi, yena brahmaa sakkhidi.t.tho. natthi ^a^P1.0239^ea^ koci tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m yaava sattamaa aacariyaamahayugaa yena brahmaa sakkhidi.t.tho. yepi ^a^T1.0299^ea^ kira tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m pubbakaa isayo mantaana.m kattaaro mantaana.m pavattaaro, yesamida.m etarahi tevijjaa braahma.naa poraa.na.m mantapada.m giita.m pavutta.m samihita.m, tadanugaayanti, tadanubhaasanti, bhaasitamanubhaasanti, vaacitamanuvaacenti, seyyathida.m -- a.t.thako vaamako vaamadevo vessaamitto yamataggi a"ngiiraso bhaaradvaajo vaase.t.tho kassapo bhagu, tepi na evamaaha.msu -- `mayameta.m jaanaama, mayameta.m passaama, yattha vaa brahmaa, yena vaa brahmaa, yahi.m vaa brahmaa'ti. teva tevijjaa braahma.naa evamaaha.msu -- `ya.m na jaanaama, ya.m na passaama, tassa sahabyataaya magga.m desema. ayameva ujumaggo ayama~njasaayano niyyaaniko, niyyaati takkarassa brahmasahabyataayaa'''ti.

[03] 528^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, vaase.t.tha, nanu eva.m sante tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti? ``addhaa kho, bho gotama, eva.m sante tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti.

[03] ``saadhu, vaase.t.tha, te vata {teva (ka0)}, vaase.t.tha, tevijjaa braahma.naa ya.m na jaananti, ya.m na passanti, tassa sahabyataaya magga.m desessanti. `ayameva ujumaggo, ayama~njasaayano niyyaaniko, niyyaati takkarassa brahmasahabyataayaa'ti, neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] 529^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, vaase.t.tha, andhave.ni ^a^T1.0300^ea^ paramparasa.msattaa purimopi na passati, majjhimopi na passati, pacchimopi na passati. evameva kho, vaase.t.tha, andhave.nuupama.m ma~n~ne tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m bhaasita.m, purimopi na passati, majjhimopi na passati, pacchimopi na passati. tesamida.m tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m bhaasita.m ^a^P1.0240^ea^ hassaka~n~neva sampajjati, naamaka~n~neva sampajjati, rittaka~n~neva sampajjati, tucchaka~n~neva sampajjati.

[03] 530^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ^a^M1.0226^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, vaase.t.tha, passanti tevijjaa braahma.naa candimasuuriye, a~n~ne caapi bahujanaa, yato ca candimasuuriyaa uggacchanti, yattha ca ogacchanti, aayaacanti thomayanti pa~njalikaa namassamaanaa anuparivattantii''ti?

[03] ``eva.m, bho gotama, passanti tevijjaa braahma.naa candimasuuriye, a~n~ne caapi bahujanaa, yato ^a^V1.0218^ea^ ca candimasuuriyaa uggacchanti, yattha ca ogacchanti, aayaacanti thomayanti pa~njalikaa namassamaanaa anuparivattantii''ti.

[03] 531^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, vaase.t.tha, ya.m passanti tevijjaa braahma.naa candimasuuriye, a~n~ne caapi bahujanaa, yato ca candimasuuriyaa uggacchanti, yattha ca ogacchanti, aayaacanti thomayanti pa~njalikaa namassamaanaa anuparivattanti, pahonti tevijjaa braahma.naa candimasuuriyaana.m sahabyataaya magga.m desetu.m -- ``ayameva ujumaggo, ayama~njasaayano niyyaaniko, niyyaati takkarassa candimasuuriyaana.m sahabyataayaa''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] ``iti kira, vaase.t.tha, ya.m passanti tevijjaa braahma.naa candimasuuriye, a~n~ne caapi bahujanaa, yato ca candimasuuriyaa uggacchanti, yattha ^a^T1.0301^ea^ ca ogacchanti, aayaacanti thomayanti pa~njalikaa namassamaanaa anuparivattanti, tesampi nappahonti candimasuuriyaana.m sahabyataaya magga.m desetu.m -- ``ayameva ujumaggo, ayama~njasaayano niyyaaniko, niyyaati takkarassa candimasuuriyaana.m sahabyataayaa''ti.

[03] 532^b^.^eb^ ``iti pana {ki.m pana (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} na kira tevijjehi braahma.nehi brahmaa sakkhidi.t.tho. napi kira tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m aacariyehi brahmaa sakkhidi.t.tho. napi kira tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m ^a^P1.0241^ea^ aacariyapaacariyehi brahmaa sakkhidi.t.tho. napi kira tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m yaava sattamaa {sattamehi (?)} aacariyaamahayugehi brahmaa sakkhidi.t.tho. yepi kira tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m pubbakaa isayo mantaana.m kattaaro mantaana.m pavattaaro, yesamida.m etarahi tevijjaa braahma.naa poraa.na.m mantapada.m giita.m pavutta.m samihita.m, tadanugaayanti, tadanubhaasanti, bhaasitamanubhaasanti, vaacitamanuvaacenti, seyyathida.m -- a.t.thako vaamako vaamadevo ^a^M1.0227^ea^ vessaamitto yamataggi a"ngiiraso bhaaradvaajo vaase.t.tho kassapo bhagu, tepi na evamaaha.msu -- ``mayameta.m jaanaama, mayameta.m passaama, yattha vaa brahmaa, yena vaa brahmaa, yahi.m vaa brahmaa''ti. teva tevijjaa braahma.naa evamaaha.msu -- ``ya.m na jaanaama, ya.m na passaama, tassa sahabyataaya magga.m desema -- ayameva ujumaggo ayama~njasaayano niyyaaniko niyyaati takkarassa brahmasahabyataayaa''ti.

[03] 533^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, vaase.t.tha, nanu eva.m sante tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m appaa.tihiirakata.m ^a^V1.0219^ea^ bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti? ``addhaa kho, bho gotama ^a^T1.0302^ea^, eva.m sante tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti.

[03] ``saadhu, vaase.t.tha, te vata, vaase.t.tha, tevijjaa braahma.naa ya.m na jaananti, ya.m na passanti, tassa sahabyataaya magga.m desessanti -- ``ayameva ujumaggo, ayama~njasaayano niyyaaniko, niyyaati takkarassa brahmasahabyataayaa''ti, neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] 534^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, vaase.t.tha, puriso eva.m vadeyya -- ``aha.m yaa imasmi.m janapade janapadakalyaa.nii, ta.m icchaami, ta.m kaamemii''ti. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- ``ambho purisa, ya.m tva.m janapadakalyaa.ni.m icchasi kaamesi, jaanaasi ta.m janapadakalyaa.ni.m -- khattiyii vaa braahma.nii vaa vessii vaa suddii vaa''ti? iti pu.t.tho ``no''ti vadeyya.

[03] ``tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- ``ambho purisa, ya.m tva.m janapadakalyaa.ni.m icchasi kaamesi, jaanaasi ta.m janapadakalyaa.ni.m ^a^P1.0242^ea^ -- eva.mnaamaa eva.mgottaati vaa, diighaa vaa rassaa vaa majjhimaa vaa kaa.lii vaa saamaa vaa ma"nguracchavii vaati, amukasmi.m gaame vaa nigame vaa nagare vaa''ti? iti pu.t.tho `no'ti vadeyya. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- ``ambho purisa, ya.m tva.m na jaanaasi na passasi, ta.m tva.m icchasi kaamesii''ti? iti pu.t.tho ``aamaa''ti vadeyya.

[03] 535^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, vaase.t.tha, nanu eva.m sante tassa purisassa appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti? ``addhaa kho, bho gotama, eva.m sante tassa purisassa appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti.

[03] 536^b^.^eb^ ``evameva ^a^M1.0228^ea^ kho, vaase.t.tha, na kira tevijjehi braahma.nehi brahmaa sakkhidi.t.tho, napi kira tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m aacariyehi brahmaa sakkhidi.t.tho, napi kira tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m aacariyapaacariyehi brahmaa sakkhidi.t.tho. napi kira tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m yaava sattamaa aacariyaamahayugehi brahmaa sakkhidi.t.tho. yepi kira tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m pubbakaa isayo mantaana.m kattaaro mantaana.m pavattaaro, yesamida.m etarahi tevijjaa braahma.naa poraa.na.m mantapada.m giita.m pavutta.m samihita.m, tadanugaayanti, tadanubhaasanti, bhaasitamanubhaasanti, vaacitamanuvaacenti ^a^V1.0220^ea^, seyyathida.m -- a.t.thako vaamako vaamadevo vessaamitto yamataggi a"ngiiraso bhaaradvaajo vaase.t.tho kassapo bhagu, tepi na evamaaha.msu -- ``mayameta.m jaanaama, mayameta.m passaama, yattha vaa brahmaa, yena vaa brahmaa, yahi.m vaa brahmaa''ti. teva tevijjaa braahma.naa evamaaha.msu -- ``ya.m na jaanaama, ya.m na passaama, tassa sahabyataaya magga.m desema -- ayameva ujumaggo ayama~njasaayano niyyaaniko niyyaati takkarassa brahmasahabyataayaa''ti.

[03] 537^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, vaase.t.tha, nanu eva.m sante tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti? ``addhaa kho, bho gotama, eva.m sante tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti.

[03] ``saadhu, vaase.t.tha, te vata, vaase.t.tha, tevijjaa braahma.naa ya.m na jaananti, ya.m na passanti, tassa sahabyataaya magga.m ^a^P1.0243^ea^ desessanti -- ayameva ujumaggo ayama~njasaayano niyyaaniko niyyaati takkarassa brahmasahabyataayaati neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] 538^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^T1.0303^ea^, vaase.t.tha, puriso caatumahaapathe nisse.ni.m kareyya -- paasaadassa aaroha.naaya. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- ``ambho purisa, yassa tva.m {ya.m tva.m (syaa0)} paasaadassa aaroha.naaya nisse.ni.m karosi, jaanaasi ta.m paasaada.m -- puratthimaaya vaa disaaya dakkhi.naaya vaa disaaya pacchimaaya ^a^M1.0229^ea^ vaa disaaya uttaraaya vaa disaaya ucco vaa niico vaa majjhimo vaa''ti? iti pu.t.tho ``no''ti vadeyya.
[03] ``tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- ``ambho purisa, ya.m tva.m na jaanaasi, na passasi, tassa tva.m paasaadassa aaroha.naaya nisse.ni.m karosii''ti? iti pu.t.tho ``aamaa''ti vadeyya.

[03] 539^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, vaase.t.tha, nanu eva.m sante tassa purisassa appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti? ``addhaa kho, bho gotama, eva.m sante tassa purisassa appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti.

[03] 540^b^.^eb^ ``evameva kho, vaase.t.tha, na kira tevijjehi braahma.nehi brahmaa sakkhidi.t.tho, napi ^a^V1.0221^ea^ kira tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m aacariyehi brahmaa sakkhidi.t.tho, napi kira tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m aacariyapaacariyehi brahmaa sakkhidi.t.tho, napi kira tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m yaava sattamaa aacariyaamahayugehi brahmaa sakkhidi.t.tho. yepi kira tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m pubbakaa isayo mantaana.m kattaaro mantaana.m pavattaaro, yesamida.m etarahi tevijjaa braahma.naa poraa.na.m mantapada.m giita.m pavutta.m samihita.m, tadanugaayanti, tadanubhaasanti, bhaasitamanubhaasanti, vaacitamanuvaacenti, seyyathida.m -- a.t.thako vaamako vaamadevo vessaamitto yamataggi a"ngiiraso bhaaradvaajo vaase.t.tho kassapo bhagu, tepi na evamaaha.msu -- mayameta.m jaanaama ^a^T1.0304^ea^, mayameta.m passaama, yattha vaa brahmaa, yena vaa brahmaa, yahi.m vaa brahmaati. teva tevijjaa braahma.naa evamaaha.msu -- ``ya.m na jaanaama, ya.m na passaama, tassa sahabyataaya magga.m ^a^P1.0244^ea^ desema, ayameva ujumaggo ayama~njasaayano niyyaaniko niyyaati takkarassa brahmasahabyataayaa''ti.

[03] 541^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, vaase.t.tha, nanu eva.m sante tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti? ``addhaa kho, bho gotama, eva.m sante tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m appaa.tihiirakata.m bhaasita.m sampajjatii''ti.

[03] ``saadhu, vaase.t.tha. te vata, vaase.t.tha, tevijjaa braahma.naa ya.m na jaananti, ya.m na passanti, tassa sahabyataaya magga.m desessanti. ayameva ujumaggo ayama~njasaayano ^a^M1.0230^ea^ niyyaaniko niyyaati takkarassa brahmasabyataayaati, neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] 542^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, vaase.t.tha, aya.m aciravatii nadii puuraa udakassa samatittikaa kaakapeyyaa. atha puriso aagaccheyya paaratthiko paaragavesii paaragaamii paara.m taritukaamo. so orime tiire .thito paarima.m tiira.m avheyya -- ``ehi paaraapaara.m, ehi paaraapaara''nti.

[03] 543^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, vaase.t.tha, api nu tassa purisassa avhaayanahetu vaa aayaacanahetu vaa patthanahetu vaa abhinandanahetu vaa aciravatiyaa nadiyaa paarima.m tiira.m orima.m tiira.m aagaccheyyaa''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] 544^b^.^eb^ ``evameva kho, vaase.t.tha, tevijjaa braahma.naa ye dhammaa braahma.nakaarakaa te dhamme pahaaya ^a^V1.0222^ea^ vattamaanaa, ye dhammaa abraahma.nakaarakaa te ^a^T1.0305^ea^ dhamme samaadaaya vattamaanaa evamaaha.msu -- ``indamavhayaama, somamavhayaama, varu.namavhayaama, iisaanamavhayaama, pajaapatimavhayaama, brahmamavhayaama, mahiddhimavhayaama, yamamavhayaamaa''ti.

[03] ``te vata, vaase.t.tha, tevijjaa braahma.naa ^a^P1.0245^ea^ ye dhammaa braahma.nakaarakaa te dhamme pahaaya vattamaanaa, ye dhammaa abraahma.nakaarakaa te dhamme samaadaaya vattamaanaa avhaayanahetu vaa aayaacanahetu vaa patthanahetu vaa abhinandanahetu vaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa brahmaana.m sahabyuupagaa bhavissantii''ti, neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] 545^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, vaase.t.tha, aya.m aciravatii nadii puuraa udakassa samatittikaa kaakapeyyaa. atha puriso aagaccheyya paaratthiko paaragavesii paaragaamii paara.m taritukaamo. so orime tiire da.lhaaya anduyaa pacchaabaaha.m gaa.lhabandhana.m baddho.
[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, vaase.t.tha, api nu so puriso aciravatiyaa nadiyaa orimaa tiiraa paarima.m tiira.m gaccheyyaa''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] 546^b^.^eb^ ``evameva ^a^M1.0231^ea^ kho, vaase.t.tha, pa~ncime kaamagu.naa ariyassa vinaye anduutipi vuccanti, bandhanantipi vuccanti. katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa.

[03] ``ime kho, vaase.t.tha, pa~nca kaamagu.naa ariyassa vinaye anduutipi vuccanti, bandhanantipi vuccanti ^a^T1.0306^ea^. ime kho vaase.t.tha pa~nca kaamagu.ne tevijjaa braahma.naa gadhitaa mucchitaa ajjhopannaa anaadiinavadassaavino anissara.napa~n~naa paribhu~njanti. te vata, vaase.t.tha, tevijjaa braahma.naa ye dhammaa braahma.nakaarakaa, te dhamme pahaaya vattamaanaa, ye dhammaa ^a^P1.0246^ea^ abraahma.nakaarakaa, te dhamme samaadaaya vattamaanaa pa~nca kaamagu.ne gadhitaa mucchitaa ajjhopannaa anaadiinavadassaavino anissara.napa~n~naa paribhu~njantaa kaamandubandhanabaddhaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa brahmaana.m sahabyuupagaa bhavissantii''ti, neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] 547^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^V1.0223^ea^, vaase.t.tha, aya.m aciravatii nadii puuraa udakassa samatittikaa kaakapeyyaa. atha puriso aagaccheyya paaratthiko paaragavesii paaragaamii paara.m taritukaamo. so orime tiire sasiisa.m paarupitvaa nipajjeyya.
[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, vaase.t.tha, api nu so puriso aciravatiyaa nadiyaa orimaa tiiraa paarima.m tiira.m gaccheyyaa''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''.

[03] 548^b^.^eb^ ``evameva kho, vaase.t.tha, pa~ncime niivara.naa ariyassa vinaye aavara.naatipi vuccanti, niivara.naatipi vuccanti, onaahanaatipi vuccanti, pariyonaahanaatipi vuccanti. katame pa~nca? kaamacchandaniivara.na.m, byaapaadaniivara.na.m, thinamiddhaniivara.na.m, uddhaccakukkuccaniivara.na.m, vicikicchaaniivara.na.m. ime kho, vaase.t.tha, pa~nca niivara.naa ariyassa vinaye aavara.naatipi vuccanti, niivara.naatipi vuccanti, onaahanaatipi vuccanti, pariyonaahanaatipi vuccanti.

[03] 549^b^.^eb^ ``imehi ^a^T1.0307^ea^ kho, vaase.t.tha, pa~ncahi niivara.nehi tevijjaa braahma.naa aavu.taa nivu.taa onaddhaa {ophu.taa (sii0 ka0), ophutaa (syaa0)} pariyonaddhaa. te vata, vaase.t.tha, tevijjaa braahma.naa ye ^a^M1.0232^ea^ dhammaa braahma.nakaarakaa te dhamme pahaaya vattamaanaa, ye dhammaa abraahma.nakaarakaa te dhamme samaadaaya vattamaanaa pa~ncahi niivara.nehi aavu.taa nivu.taa onaddhaa pariyonaddhaa {pariyonaddhaa, te (syaa0 ka0)} kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa brahmaana.m ^a^P1.0247^ea^ sahabyuupagaa bhavissantii''ti, neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] 550^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, vaase.t.tha, kinti te suta.m braahma.naana.m vuddhaana.m mahallakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m, sapariggaho vaa brahmaa apariggaho vaa''ti? ``apariggaho, bho gotama''. ``saveracitto vaa averacitto vaa''ti? ``averacitto, bho gotama''. ``sabyaapajjacitto vaa abyaapajjacitto vaa''ti? ``abyaapajjacitto, bho gotama''. ``sa.mkili.t.thacitto vaa asa.mkili.t.thacitto vaa''ti? ``asa.mkili.t.thacitto, bho gotama''. ``vasavattii vaa avasavattii vaa''ti? ``vasavattii, bho gotama''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, vaase.t.tha, sapariggahaa vaa tevijjaa braahma.naa apariggahaa vaa''ti? ``sapariggahaa, bho gotama''. ``saveracittaa vaa averacittaa vaa''ti? ``saveracittaa, bho gotama'' ^a^V1.0224^ea^. ``sabyaapajjacittaa vaa abyaapajjacittaa vaa''ti? ``sabyaapajjacittaa, bho gotama''. ``sa.mkili.t.thacittaa vaa asa.mkili.t.thacittaa vaa''ti? ``sa.mkili.t.thacittaa, bho gotama''. ``vasavattii vaa avasavattii vaa''ti? ``avasavattii, bho gotama''.

[03] 551^b^.^eb^ ``iti ^a^T1.0308^ea^ kira, vaase.t.tha, sapariggahaa tevijjaa braahma.naa apariggaho brahmaa. api nu kho sapariggahaana.m tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m apariggahena brahmunaa saddhi.m sa.msandati sametii''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''. ``saadhu, vaase.t.tha, te vata, vaase.t.tha, sapariggahaa tevijjaa braahma.naa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apariggahassa ^a^P1.0248^ea^ brahmuno sahabyuupagaa bhavissantii''ti, neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``iti kira, vaase.t.tha, saveracittaa tevijjaa braahma.naa, averacitto brahmaa...pe0... sabyaapajjacittaa tevijjaa braahma.naa abyaapajjacitto brahmaa... sa.mkili.t.thacittaa tevijjaa braahma.naa asa.mkili.t.thacitto brahmaa... avasavattii tevijjaa ^a^M1.0233^ea^ braahma.naa vasavattii brahmaa, api nu kho avasavattiina.m tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m vasavattinaa brahmunaa saddhi.m sa.msandati sametii''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''. ``saadhu, vaase.t.tha, te vata, vaase.t.tha, avasavattii tevijjaa braahma.naa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa vasavattissa brahmuno sahabyuupagaa bhavissantii''ti, neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] 552^b^.^eb^ ``idha kho pana te, vaase.t.tha, tevijjaa braahma.naa aasiiditvaa {aadisitvaa (ka0)} sa.msiidanti, sa.msiiditvaa visaara.m {visaada.m (sii0 pii0), visatta.m (syaa0)} paapu.nanti, sukkhatara.m {sukkhatara.na.m (ka0)} ma~n~ne taranti. tasmaa ida.m tevijjaana.m braahma.naana.m tevijjaairi.nantipi vuccati, tevijjaavivanantipi vuccati, tevijjaabyasanantipi vuccatii''ti.

[03] 553^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T1.0309^ea^ vutte, vaase.t.tho maa.navo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bho gotama, sama.no gotamo brahmaana.m sahabyataaya magga.m jaanaatii''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, vaase.t.tha. aasanne ito manasaaka.ta.m, na ito duure manasaaka.ta''nti? ``eva.m, bho gotama, aasanne ito manasaaka.ta.m, na ito duure manasaaka.ta''nti.

[03] 554^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, vaase.t.tha, idhassa puriso manasaaka.te jaatasa.mvaddho. tamena.m manasaaka.tato taavadeva avasa.ta.m ^a^P1.0249^ea^ manasaaka.tassa magga.m puccheyyu.m. siyaa nu kho, vaase.t.tha, tassa purisassa ^a^V1.0225^ea^ manasaaka.te jaatasa.mvaddhassa manasaaka.tassa magga.m pu.t.thassa dandhaayitatta.m vaa vitthaayitatta.m vaa''ti? ``no hida.m, bho gotama''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``amu hi, bho gotama, puriso manasaaka.te jaatasa.mvaddho, tassa sabbaaneva manasaaka.tassa maggaani suviditaanii''ti.

[03] ``siyaa kho, vaase.t.tha, tassa purisassa manasaaka.te jaatasa.mvaddhassa manasaaka.tassa magga.m pu.t.thassa dandhaayitatta.m vaa vitthaayitatta.m vaa, na tveva tathaagatassa brahmaloke vaa brahmalokagaaminiyaa vaa pa.tipadaaya pu.t.thassa dandhaayitatta.m vaa vitthaayitatta.m vaa. brahmaana.m caaha.m, vaase.t.tha, pajaanaami brahmaloka~nca brahmalokagaamini~nca pa.tipada.m, yathaa pa.tipanno ca brahmaloka.m upapanno, ta~nca pajaanaamii''ti.

[03] 555^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M1.0234^ea^ vutte, vaase.t.tho maa.navo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bho gotama, sama.no gotamo brahmaana.m sahabyataaya magga.m desetii''ti. ``saadhu no bhava.m gotamo brahmaana.m sahabyataaya magga.m desetu ^a^T1.0310^ea^ ullumpatu bhava.m gotamo braahma.ni.m paja''nti. ``tena hi, vaase.t.tha, su.naahi; saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m bho''ti kho vaase.t.tho maa.navo bhagavato paccassosi.

[03] 556^b^.^eb^ bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``idha, vaase.t.tha, tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m, sammaasambuddho...pe0... ^a^P1.0250^ea^ (yathaa 190-212 anucchedesu eva.m vitthaaretabba.m). eva.m kho, vaase.t.tha, bhikkhu siilasampanno hoti...pe0... tassime pa~nca niivara.ne pahiine attani samanupassato paamojja.m jaayati, pamuditassa piiti jaayati, piitimanassa kaayo passambhati, passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedeti, sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati.

[03] ``so mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati ^a^P1.0251^ea^. tathaa dutiya.m. tathaa tatiya.m. tathaa ^a^V1.0226^ea^ catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, vaase.t.tha, balavaa sa"nkhadhamo appakasireneva catuddisaa vi~n~naapeyya; evameva kho, vaase.t.tha, eva.m bhaavitaaya mettaaya cetovimuttiyaa ya.m pamaa.nakata.m kamma.m na ta.m tatraavasissati, na ta.m tatraavati.t.thati. ayampi kho, vaase.t.tha, brahmaana.m sahabyataaya maggo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, vaase.t.tha, bhikkhu karu.naasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati. tathaa dutiya.m. tathaa tatiya.m. tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena ^a^T1.0311^ea^ cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M1.0235^ea^, vaase.t.tha, balavaa sa"nkhadhamo appakasireneva catuddisaa vi~n~naapeyya. evameva kho, vaase.t.tha, eva.m bhaavitaaya upekkhaaya cetovimuttiyaa ya.m pamaa.nakata.m kamma.m na ta.m tatraavasissati, na ta.m tatraavati.t.thati. aya.m kho, vaase.t.tha, brahmaana.m sahabyataaya maggo.

[03] 557^b^.^eb^ ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, vaase.t.tha, eva.mvihaarii bhikkhu sapariggaho vaa apariggaho vaa''ti? ``apariggaho, bho gotama''. ``saveracitto vaa averacitto vaa''ti? ``averacitto, bho gotama''. ``sabyaapajjacitto vaa abyaapajjacitto vaa''ti? ``abyaapajjacitto, bho gotama''. ``sa.mkili.t.thacitto vaa asa.mkili.t.thacitto vaa''ti? ``asa.mkili.t.thacitto, bho gotama''. ``vasavattii vaa avasavattii vaa''ti? ``vasavattii, bho gotama''.

[03] ``iti ^a^P1.0252^ea^ kira, vaase.t.tha, apariggaho bhikkhu, apariggaho brahmaa. api nu kho apariggahassa bhikkhuno apariggahena brahmunaa saddhi.m sa.msandati sametii''ti? ``eva.m, bho gotama''. ``saadhu, vaase.t.tha, so vata vaase.t.tha apariggaho bhikkhu kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apariggahassa brahmuno sahabyuupago bhavissatii''ti, .thaanameta.m vijjati.

[03] 558^b^.^eb^ ``iti kira, vaase.t.tha, averacitto bhikkhu, averacitto brahmaa...pe0... abyaapajjacitto bhikkhu, abyaapajjacitto brahmaa... asa.mkili.t.thacitto bhikkhu, asa.mkili.t.thacitto ^a^V1.0227^ea^ brahmaa... vasavattii bhikkhu, vasavattii brahmaa, api nu kho vasavattissa bhikkhuno vasavattinaa brahmunaa saddhi.m sa.msandati sametii''ti ^a^T1.0312^ea^? ``eva.m, bho gotama''. ``saadhu, vaase.t.tha, so vata, vaase.t.tha, vasavattii bhikkhu kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa vasavattissa brahmuno sahabyuupago bhavissatiiti, .thaanameta.m vijjatii''ti.

[03] 559^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, vaase.t.thabhaaradvaajaa maa.navaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama! seyyathaapi, bho gotama, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti. evameva.m bhotaa gotamena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito ^a^M1.0236^ea^. ete maya.m bhavanta.m gotama.m sara.na.m gacchaama, dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasake no bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupete sara.na.m gate''ti.
